item.text: (pha) @#/ ! /gsang sngags rgyud 'bum gyi skor bzhugs so/ /
(黃) 秘密經第十四部
@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya su bar+n+Na pra b+hA sot+ta ma sU tren+d+ra rA dza nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod
skad du/ 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'-i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i
mdo/ baM po dang po/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang /
byang chub sems dpa' dang rang sangs rgyas dang 'phags pa nyan thos thams cad la phyag 'tshal
lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bya rgod phung po chos kyi dbyings/ /zab
mo sangs rgyas spyod yul na/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs nas ni/ /dag cing rdul rnaMs
med pa yis/ /byang chub sems dpa' mchog rnams la/ /mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po ste/ /
mnyan na shin tu zab pa dang / /yongs su brtags na zab pa nyid/ /gser 'od dam pa 'di 'chad do/ /
phyogs bzhir sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni/ /byin gyis brlabs kyis byin brlabs pa/ /mi 'khrugs pas ni shar phyogasu/ /rin chen tog gis lho phyogasu/ /'od dpag
med kyis nub phyogasu/ /rnga sgra yis ni byang phyogasu/ /sdig pa thams cad bzhig pa'i phyir/ /bshad pa dam pa bkra shis pa/ /sdig pa'i las rnams zad byed pa/ /bde ba thams cad sbyin
byed pa/ /sdug bsngal thams cad 'jigs byed pa/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gzhi/ /dpal kun gyis ni legs brgyan pa/ /byin gyis brlabs te brjod par bya/ /sems can gang dag
dbang po nyams/ /tshe zad pa dang tshe nyams dang / /phun sum tshogs min gang chags dang / /lha rnams brgyab kyis phyogs pa dang / /mdza' sdug skye bo sdang ba dang / /bran gza' la sogs
gtses pa dang / /phan tshun thun pa ma yin dang / /nor 'gribs pas ni gnod pa dang / /mya ngan ngal dang gnod pa dang / /'jigs pa dang ni phongs pa dang / /gza' dang rgyu skar byad stem dang / /
mi bzad gdon gyis nyen pa dang / /mya ngan ngal las byung ba yi/ /rmi lam sdig pa mthong na yang / /des ni rab bkrus gtsang ma yin/ /mdo sde dam pa mnyan par bya/ /gang dag yid dge
sems dang zhing / /gos gtsang rnams kyis rab brgyan te/ /zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba/ /mdo sde mnyan par byed na ni/ /mdo sde 'di yi gzi brjid kyis/ /srog chags
kun gyi gnod pa dag /shin tu mi bzad 'di 'dra ba/ /de dag rtag tu zhi bar 'gyur/ /'jig rten skyong ba bdag nyid dang / /blon po tshogs kyi dbang phyug bcas/ /gnod sbyin bye ba dus ma yis/ /

de dag la ni bsrung bar byed/ /lha mo chen mo dbyangs can dang / /nai rany+dza nar gnas pa dang / /'byung po'i ma mo 'phrog ma dang / /sa'i lha mo brtan ma dang / /tshangs pa'i dbang dang lha dbang dang / /
klu dbang mthu chen rnams dang ni/ /mi 'am ci dbang lha min dbang / /de bzhin namakha' lding dbang rnams/ /sde dang stobs dang bzhon pa dang / /bcas te de dag der lhags nas/ /nyin dang
mtshan mo mi g.yel bar/ /de dag la ni bsrung bar byed/ /zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba ste/ /bskal pa bye bar rnyed dka' ba/ /mdo 'di rab tu
bshad par bya/ /gang dag mdo 'di nyan pa dang / /gang dag gzhan la thos byed dang / /gang su rjesu yi rang dang / /gang dag mchod pa byed pa rnams/ /de dag lha dang klu dag dang / /mi dang mi
'am ci dag dang / /lha min gnod sbyin du ma yis/ /bskal pa bye bar mchod par 'gyur/ /srog chags bsod nams med pa rnams/ /de dag bsod nams phung po ni/ /mtha' yas grangs
kyang med pa dang / /bsam gyis mi khyab skye bar 'gyur/ /phyogs bcu'i rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / /de bzhin zab mor spyod pa yis/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang / /zab
rab tu bzung bar 'gyur ba yin/ /gtsang ma'i gos rnams rab bgos la/ /dri zhim pa yi gos 'chang zhing / /byams pa'i sems ni nyer bzhag nas/ /g.yel ba med par mchod par bya/ /
rang gi sems ni dri med cing / /rgya che bar yang rab byed la/ /sems kyang shin tu dang byed kyis/ /mdo sde dam pa mnyan par gyis/ /gang dag mdo 'di nyan pa ni/ /de dag mi nang legs par 'ongs/ /
mi yi srid pa legs par thob/ /'tsho ba bde bas 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /gang gi rna ba'i bu gar yang / /bshad pa 'di ni grag 'gyur ba/ /de dag dge rtsa sbyangs pa ste/ /sangs rgyas mang

pos rab tu bsngags/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ gleng bzhi'i le'u zhes bya ste dang po'o// // yang de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na/ byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mdzes pa'i tog ces bya ba/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po la rim gro byas pa

zhig gnas pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'di lta ste/ lo brgyad bcu zhig thub ste/ 'di ltar sku tshe thung snyam nas/ de yang 'di snyam du sems te/

bcom ldan 'das kyi kyang 'di skad du/ rgyu gnyis dang rkyen gnyis kyis tshe ring bar 'gyur te/ gnyis gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ srog gcod pa spangs pa dang / kha zas rab tu sbyin pa'o zhes gsungs te/ bcom
ldan 'das shAkya thub pas ni/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa mang po nas/ srog gcod pa spangs par gyur pa nas/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi bar du yang dag par blangs par gyur/

zas kyang phyi nang gi dngos po rnams sems can dag la yongasu btang ste/ tha na rang gi lus kyi sha dang khrag dang rus pa dang rkang gis kyang sems can ltogs pa rnams tshim par mdzad na/ zas gzhan gyis lta ci

smos snyam mo/ /de nas skyes bu dam pa de sangs rgyas la song ba'i yid la byed pa dag las/ 'di lta bu'i tshul gyis bsam pa 'di dag sems pa na/ de'i khyim yangs shing rgya che la bai DUr+ya sngon po las grub pa/
lha'i rin po che du mas spras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas kha dog bsgyur ba/ lha'i las 'das pa'i spos kyis khyab par gyur to/ /khyim de'i phyogs bzhi nas lha'i rin po che'i khri bzhi
byung bar gyur te/ khri de dag las kyang lha'i khri lha'i ras bcos bu'i rin po che phrugs rnams bting ba dag byung bar gyur to/ /khri de dag las kyang lha'i me tog pad ma rin po che du ma spras
pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas kha dog bsgyur ba dag byung ngo / /pad ma de dag las kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhi byung bar gyur te/ shar phyogs nas ni de bzhin gshegs
pa mi 'khrugs pa byung / lho phyogs nas ni de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog byung / nub phyogs nas ni de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med byung / byang phyogs nas ni de bzhin rta sgra byung
ste/ seng ge'i khri de dag las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag byung ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi
stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar dang / phyogs bcu kun tu 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bar dag snang bas khyab par gyur/ lha'i me tog dag gi char yang bab/
lha'i sil snyan gyi sgra yang byung ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir sems can thams cad kyang lha'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur te/ sems can dbang po

ma tshang ba rnams ni dbang po thams cad dang ldan par gyur/ sems can dmus long dag gis ni migis gzugs rnaMs mthong / seMn 'on pa dag ni rna bas sgra rnams thos/ seMn smyos pa dag ni dran pa so sor rnyed/ seMn seMs g.yengs ba
dag ni sems mi g.yeng bar gyur/ sems can sgren mo dag ni gos bgos par gyur/ sems can bkres pa dag ni lto 'grangs bar gyur/ sems can skom pa dag ni skom ngom par gyur/ sems can

nad kyis btab pa dag ni nad dang bral bar gyur/ lus kyi dbang po nyams pa dag ni dbang po tshang bar gyur te/ 'jig rten du ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos rnams rgya cher byung bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
mdzes pa'i tog gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong nas ngo tshar du gyur te/ de tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das de dag ga la ba de logasu thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag rnams par rjes su dran la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i yon tan rjesu dran zhing / bcom ldan 'das shAkya

thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad la the tshom za bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'di ltar lo brgyad bcu zhig thub ste sku tshe thung ba 'di ji lta bu/ 'di ci zhig snyam du bsam pa de sems shing 'dug par gyur to/ /
de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis dgongs shing mkhyen bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu khyod 'di snyam du/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub

pa 'di ltar sku tshe thung ngo snyam du ma sems shig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ma gtogs par/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten

dang bdud dang bcas pa dang tshangs pa dang dge sbyongs dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i nang na/ bcoMs de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad kyi mtha'/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bar

du yang rtogs par nus pa nged kyisu yang ma mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis de bzhin bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bshad pa brjod ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus

lha'i bu 'dod pa na spyod pa rnams dang gzugs na spyod pa rnams dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang namakha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po'i bar dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag
khrig brgya bstong phrag du ma 'dus nas/ byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i rtog gi khyim der lhags so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la/ bcom ldan 'das

shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bshad pa tshigs su bcad de mdor bka' stsal pa/ rgya mtsho chu rnams thams cad kyi/ /thig pa dag ni bgrang bar nus/ /shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad/ /sus kyang bgrang

bar mi nus so/ /ri rab rnams ni thams cad kyang / /phra rab rdul du bgrang bar nus/ /shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad/ /sus kyang bgrang bar mi nus so/ /sa la gang dag yod pa yis/ /rab tu phra rdul ji
ji snyed pa/ /thams cad bgrang bar nus srid kyi/ /rgyal ba'i sku tshe'i tshad mi nus/ /gal te la las nam mkha' la/ /sna 'ga' zhig gis dpag 'dod kyang / /shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad/ /sus kyang

bgrang bar mi nus so/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di srid bzhugs/ /bskad pa dag ni 'di snyed cig /bskal pa bye ba brgya dag bces/ /grangs ni rnyed par mi rung ngo / /gang phyir de yi rgyu dang ni/ /rkyen yang rnaMs pa gnyis

yin te/ /sdig pa'i tshe ba spangs pa dang / /kha zas mang po byin pa ste/ /de phyir bdag nyid chen po de'i/ /sku tshe'i tsha grangs ni mi rnyed do/ /bskal pa 'di snyed cig ce 'aM/ /grangs med pa'i de bzhin te/ /de bas the tshom med par 'gyur/ /the tshom

cung zad ma za shig /rgyal ba'i sku tshe tha ma yi/ /grangs ni gang du mi dmigs so/ /de nas de'i tshe 'khor der slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze kau di n+ya zhes bya ba dang / bram ze stong phrag du mas bcom ldan 'das
la mchod pa byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i sgra thos nas 'phral la 'dus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/
gal te bcom ldan 'das seMn thaMd la thugs brtse ba/ thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ phan par bzhed pa/ sems can thams cad la pha ma lta bu/ mi mnyams pa dang mnyam par gyur pa/ zla ba lta bu snang

bar mdzad pa/ shes rab dang ye shes chen po'i nyi ma shar ba lta bu lag shing / gal te khyod sems can thaMd la sgra can zin bzhin du gzigs na/ bdag la dam pa zhig stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsu~M

bar gyur to/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyis mthus 'khor der lid tsa bi gzhon nu 'jig rten thaMd kyis mthong na dga' ba zhes bya ba de spobs pa skyes nas/ slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze kau di n+ya la 'di skad ces smras so/ /

ci bram ze chen po khyod/ bac+doMs la dam pa gcig gsol lam/ bdag gi khyod la dam pa zhig sbyin no/ /bram zes smras pa/ lid tsa bi gzhon nu bdag ni bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang ring srel gyi phye ma bgos
pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ring bsrel yung 'bru tsam la bsten par 'dod do/ /ring bsrel yung 'bru tsam de mngon par mchod na/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi bdag po 'ba' zhig thob ces

grag go/ /kye lid tsa bi gzhon nu gser 'od dam pa'i mdo nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thaMd kyis shes par bka' ba/ khong du chud par dka' ba de lta bu'i mtshan nyid dang yon tan dang ldan pa gser 'od dam pa'i mdo chad ces
grag gis nyon cig /kye lid tsa bi gzhon nu gser 'od daM pa'i mdo ni/ de ltar shes par dka' zhing rtogs par dka' bas na/ kho bo cag mtha' khob kyi gling gi bram ze rnams ni/ gang cangs na sems can
rnams myur du sum bcu rtsa gsuM pa'i bdag po 'thob par 'gyur ba'i ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam za ma tog gi nang du bcug la bcangs kyang rung ngo / /kye lid rtsa bi gzhon nu khyod ci de bzhin gshegs pa
las ring bsrel yung 'bru tsam gsol nas/ ring bsrel gyi za ma tog tu bcug te bcangs pas seMn rnams sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i bdag po thob par mi 'dod dam/ kye lid tsa bi gzhon nu kho bos ni
dam pa de lta bu gsol to/ /de nas lid tsa bi gzhon nu 'jig rten thams cad kyis mthong na dga' bas/ slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze kau di n+ya la tshigs su bcad pa dag gi slar smras pa/ nam zhig

gang gA'i chu rgyun la/ /me tog rnam ni skye ba dang / /bya rog dmar por 'gyur ba dang / /khu byug dung mdog 'drar 'gyur dang / /'dzam bur lta la'i 'bru chags dang / /'bra gor a mra'i dog pa chags/ /de yi
tshe na yungs 'bru tsam/ /ring srel du ni gsal bar 'gyur/ /nam zhig ru sbal spu rnam las/ /gos su legs par btag gyur te/ /dgun gyi grang ba sel byed pa/ /de tshe ring srel yod par 'gyur/ /nam zhig

sbrang bu'i rkang lags las/ /yang thog legs par byas gyur te/ /brtan zhing rab tu mi g.yo ba/ /de tshe ring srel yod par 'gyur/ /naM zhig srin bu pad ma kun/ /so ni dkar por skyes gyur te/ /rno zhing chen por gyur

pa na/ /de tshe ring srel yod par 'gyur/ /mtho risu ni 'dzeg pa'i phyir/ /naM zhig ri bong rwa rnams las/ /skas ni legs par byas gyur pa/ /de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur/ /nam zhig skas ni der 'dzegs te/ /byi bas zla ba bza' ba dang / /

sgra gcan la yang gnod byed pa/ /de tshe ring srel yod par 'gyur/ /grong na rgyu bas sbrang bu yis/ /nam zhig rdza ma 'i chang 'thungs te/ /khyim na gnas par byed 'gyur ba/ /de tshe ring srel yod par 'gyur/ /

nam zhig bong bu bder gyur la/ /mchu dmar bim pa 'drar gyur cing / /glu gar rnams la mkhas gyur pa/ /de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur/ /nam zhig 'ug pa bya rog rnams/ /dben par dong nas brtse ba dang / /phan tshun

'thun par gyur pa na/ /de tshe ring srel yod par 'gyur/ /pa la sha yi lo ma rnams/ /rin chen sna gsum gdugs gyur te/ /char 'bab skyabasu nam gyur pa/ /de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur/ /nam zhig rgya mtsho'i gru bo che/ /

'phrul 'khor dang ni g.yor mor bcas/ /thang la byung te 'gro ba na/ /de tshe ring srel yod par 'gyur/ /nam zhig bya ni 'ug pa yis/ /ri bo spos kyi ngad ldang ba/ /chu la thogs te 'gro 'gyur ba/ /de tshe ring bsrel yod par

'gyur/ /slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze kau di n+yas tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag thos nas/ lid tsa bi gzhon nu 'jig rten thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag slar smras pa/ legaso legaso

gzhon nu mchog /rgyal ba'i sras po tshigs po che/ /dpa' zhing thabs la mkhas ldan pa/ /lung bstan pa ni dam pa thob/ /'jig rten mgon po skyobs pa po/ /de bzhin gshegs pa che ba nyid/ /bsam gyis mi khyab go rim

bzhin/ /gzhon nu bdag las mnyan par gyis/ /sangs rgyas yul ni bsam mi khyab/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams mtshungs pa med/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rtag tu zhi/ /sangs rgyas thaMd yang dag byung / /sangs rgyas thaMd

kha dog mtshungs/ /'di ni sang+yas chos nyid yin/ /bac+doMs ni bcos ma min/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ma skyes te/ /rdo rje lta bur sra ba'i sku/ /sprul pa'i sku ni ston par mdzad/ /drang srong chen po'i ring bsrel ni/ /
yungs 'bru tsam zhes bya ba med/ /sku la rus pa khrag med na/ /ring srel yod par ga la 'gyur/ /sems can rnams la pan pa'i phyir/ /thabs kyis ring bsrel bzhag par mdzad/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos

kyi sku/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings/ /chos ston mdzad pa ci 'dra ba/ /bac+doMs kyis sku de 'dra/ /bdagis 'di thos shes nas ni/ /bdag gis dam pa gsol bar byas/ /de nyid kho na lung bstan phyir/ /gtaM

gleng ba ni bdag gis byas/ /de nas lha'i bu sum khri nyi stong gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bstan pa zab mo de dag thos nas/ thams cad kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed

de/ de dag yid kyis kun tu rtog pa rab tu dga' nas sgra dbyangs gcig tu tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sangs rgyas mya ngan yong mi 'da'/ /chos kyang nub par mi 'gyur te/ /sems can yongasu smin mdzad

phyir/ /yongasu mya ngan 'da' ba ston/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan bsam mi khyab/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa'i sku/ /seMn rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /bkod pa rnams pa sna tshogs ston/ /de nas byang chub seMs dpa'

mdzes pa'i rtog gis/ sangs rgyas bac+doMs de dag dang skyes bu dam pa de gnyis las bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bstan pa thos nas/ tshim zhing mgul la yi rang shing rab tu dga' ste dga' ba dang yid bde

ba skyes nas dga' ba dang mgul ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ seMn tshad med grangs med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu seMs skyeso/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang mi snang bar gyur to/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas byung ba seMs dpa' mdzes
pa'i tog gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam na/ gser gyi rnga kun du sna ba 'di lta ste/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba zhig mthong ngo / /phyogs thams cad na yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med

dpag tu med pa dag rin po che'i shing drung na/ rin po che bai DUr+ya'i khri rnaMs la bzhugs shing / 'khor brgya stong du mas yongasu bskor te/ mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston pa mthong ngo / /de nas yang skyes bu braM ze'i gzugs

lta bu zhig rnga de rdung ba mthong ste/ rnga'i sgra de las bstan pa'i tshigasu bcad pa 'di lta bu dag byung ba thos so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i rtog gnyid sad ma thag tu/ bstan pa'am tshigasu bcad pa

de dag rjesu dran no/ /rjesu dran nas kyang de'i mtshan mo zad pa dang / rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung ste/ srog chags stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu bya rgod phung po'i ri ga la ba dang / bac+doMs ga la ba der song
ste phyin nas/ bac+doMs kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bac+doMs la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i
tog gis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logasu thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ rmi lam na gang rnga'i sgra las bstan pa'i tshigasu bcad pa thos pa de dag gsol to/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i
rgyal po las/ rmi laM mthong ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste gsum pa'o// // nub gcig g.yel ba med par yang / /bdag gis rmi laM rmis pa ni/ /mdzes pa'i rnga chen mthong ba ste/ /thaMd du ni gser gyi 'od/ /
nyi ma ji lta bzhin du 'bar/ /kun tu rnam par lha nge ste/ /phyogs bcu rnamasu snang bar gyur/ /kun tu rin chen shing drung na/ /rin chen bai DUr+ya dag gi/ khri la sangs rgyas rnams bzhugs te/ /
brgya stong phrag ni du ma yi/ /'khor dbus mdun gyis bltas pa mthong / /bram ze'i gzugs ni 'dra ba zhig /rnga chen rab du brdung ba mthong / /de yis de la brdung ba dang / /tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag
byung / /gser 'od dam pa'i rnga chen sgra yis ni/ /stong gsum 'jig rten 'jig rten gsum 'di na/ /ngan song sdug bsngal gshin rje'i sdug bsngal dang / /dbul ba'i sdug bsngal ma lus zhi bar shog /
rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di yis ni/ /'jig rten rmongs pa thaMd zhi gyur cig /ji ltar thub dbang 'jigs med 'jigs zhi ltar/ /sems can 'jigs med 'jigs dang bral bar shog /ji ltar 'khor

bar kun mkhyen thub dbang po/ /'phags pa'i yon tan kun dang ldan pa ltar/ /skye dgu ting 'dzin byang chub yan lag gi/ yon tan ldan zhing yon tan rgya mtshor gyur/ /rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di yis ni/ /
sems can thaMd tshangs pa'i dbyangs ldan gyur/ /sangs rgyas byang chub dam pa mchog rig shog /chos kyis 'khor lo dge ba bskor gyur cig /bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab bzhugs par shog /
'gro la phan phyir chos kyang ston gyur cig /nyon mongs 'joms gyur sdug bsngal sel bar shog /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug zhi gyur cig /sems can gang dag ngan song sar gnas te/ /
rus pa'i lus la me lce rab 'bar ba/ /de dag rnga chen sgrags pa thos gyur cig /sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig thos shog /sems can kun gyis tshe rabs brgya dag dang / /skye ba stong

phrag bye bar skye dran shog /thub pa'i dbang po rtag du du gyur cing / /de dag gi ni rgya chen gsung thos shog /rnga bo che yis sgra skad 'di yi ni/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang rtag tu 'grogs rnyed gyur/ /

sdig pa'i las rnams rnam par spongs par shog /bya ba dge ba rnams ni spyod gyur cig /mi dang lha dang srog chags thams cad kyis/ /de dag bsam dang smon lam gang yin pa/ /rnga bo che yi sgra sgra skad 'di

yi ni/ /de dag rnams kyi de kun rdzogs gyur cig /seMn gang dag sems dmyal mi bzad skyes/ /lus la me lce kun tu rab tu 'bar/ /skyabs med mya ngan bcas shing yongs 'khyam pa/ /me rnams de dag rab tu zhi
bar shog /sems dmyal yi dgas mi yi 'jig rten na/ /sems can sdug bsngal mi bzad drag po gang / /rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di yis ni/ /de dag rnams kyi sdug bsngal kun zhi shog /rten med dpung gnyen
med pa dang / /skyabs med par yang gyur pa dag /de rnams la ni skyob pa dang / /dpung gnyen rten mchog bdag gyur cig /sangs rgyas rkang gnyis dam pa dag /thugs brtse thugs rje ldan pa'i thugs/ /
gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ /bzhugs pa bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /bdagis sngon cad sdig pa'i las/ /shin tu mi bzad gang bgyis pa/ /stobs bcu'i spyan bsngar bdag mchis te/ /
de dag thams cad bshags par bgyis/ /pha ma dag tu mi 'dzin dang / /sangs rgyas rnamasu mi 'dzin dang / /dge ba dag tu mi 'dzin pas/ /sdig pa bdag gis gang bgyi dang / /phyug pa'i rgyags
pas dregs pa dang / /rigs dang longs spyod rgyags pa dang / /gzhon pa'i rgyags pas dregs pa yis/ /bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyi dang / /nyes bsaMs nyes par smras pa dang / /nyes par bgyi pa'i
las rnams dang / /nyes pa'i dmigasu ma ltas pas/ /bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang / /byis pa'i blo'i 'jug pa dang / /mi shes mun pa'i seMs dang ni/ /sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang gyur dang / /
nyon mongs rnam par 'khrug sems dang / /rtsed mo dga' ba'i dbang nyid dang / /mya ngan dang ni nad dbang dang / /nor gyis mi chog nyes pa yis/ /bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang / /'phags min skye bo

'dre ba dang / /phrag dog ser sna'i rgyu dang ni/ /g.yo dang dbul ba'i nyes pa yis/ /bdagis sdig pa gang bgyi dang / /phongs pa byung ba'i dus kyi tshe/ /'dod pa rnams kyi 'jigs rgyu dang / /phyug po ma yin
gyur pa yis/ /bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang / /g.yo ba'i sems kyis dbang nyid dang / /'dod dang khro ba'i dbang dag dang / /bkres dang skom gyi nyen pa yis/ /bdagis sdig pa gang bgyis dang / /

bza' ba dag dang btung ba dang / /bud med rgyu dang gos kyi phyir/ /nyon mongs gdung ba sna tshogs kyis/ /bdagis sdig pa gang bgyi dang / /lus dang ngag dang yid kyis sdig /nyes par spyad pa rnaMs gsum
bsags/ /'di 'dra'i tshul gyis gang bgyis pa/ /de dag thaMd bdag 'chagaso/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang chos rnam dang / /de bzhin nyan thos rnams la yang / /gus pa ma lags gang bgyis pa/ /
de dag thams cad bdag chags so/ /gang yang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang / /gus pa ma lags bgyis pa rnams/ /de dag thaMd bdag chags so/ /dam chos smra
ba rnaMs la yang / /gus pa ma lags bgyis pa dang / /chos la'ang gus par ma bgyis pa/ /de dag thams cad bdag 'chagaso/ /bdagis rtag tu mi shes pas/ /dam pa'i chos ni spangs pa dang / /
pha ma rnaMs la ma gus dang / /de dag thaMd bdag chagaso/ /blun pa dang ni byis pa dang / /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang / /nga rgyal dregs pa bsgribs bgyis pa/ /de dag thaMd bdag chags so/ /
bdag ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du/ /stobs bcu rnams la mchod par shog /bdag gis phyogs bcur sems can rnams/ /bsdug bsngal kun las 'don gyur cig /sems can

bsaM gyi mi khyab kun/ /sa cu la ni dgod par bgyi/ /sa bcu la ni gnas nas kyang / /thams cad de bzhin gshegs gyur cig /ji srid sdug bsngal rgya mtsho las/ /de kun mthar bgyi nus srid du/ /sems can re re'i phyir yang

ni/ /bskal pa bye bar spyad par bgyi/ /gser 'od dam pa zhes bgyi ba/ /las rnams thams cad byang bgyid pa/ /zab mo dag ni ston pa ni/ /seMn de dag bstan par bgyi/ /gang gis bskal pa stong rnaMsu/ /sdig pa

shin tu mi bzad bgyis/ /lan cig rab tu bshags pa yis/ /de dag thaMd byung bar 'gyur/ /gang gis las kyi sgrib pa rnaMs/ /myur du yang dag zad 'gyur ba/ /gser 'od dam pa dge ba yi/ /bshags pa 'di dag bshags

nas ni/ /rin chen 'byung gnas mchog bcu po/ /sa bcu la ni gnas par bgyi/ /sangs rgyas yon tan snang bar bgyi/ /srid pa'i mtsho las sgral bar bgyi/ /sangs rgyas rgya mtsho chu bo dang / /yon tan rgya mtsho zab mo de/ /

sangs rgyas yon tan bsaM yas kyis/ /thaMd mkhyen du rdzogs par bgyi/ /ting 'dzin brgya phrag stong rnaMs dang / /gzungs rnaMs bsaM gyis mi khyab dang / /dbang stobs byang chub yan lagis/ /stobs bcu dam
par 'gyur bar bgyi/ /dgongs pa'i thugs kyis sangs rgyas rnaMs/ /bdag la rnaMs par gzigs su gsol/ /thugs rje ldan pa'i thugs kyis ni/ /nongs par rab tu gzung du gsol/ /bdag gis bskal pa

brgya rnaMsu/ /sngon chad sdig pa gang bgyis pa/ /de phyir bdag ni mya ngan seMs/ /phongs dang mya ngan 'jigs pas gzir/ /sdig pa'i las la 'jig par bgyid/ /yid ni rtag tu dman par 'gyur/ /gang dang gang du spyod bgyid pa/ /
bdag ni gang du 'ang dga' ma mchis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad thugs rje ldan/ /'gro ba kun gyi 'jigs sel bas/ /nongs par rab tu gzung du gsol/ /'jigs pa dag las bdag thar mdzod/ /bdag
gi nyon mongs las rnams kyi/ /dri ma de bzhin gshegs pas shol/ /sangs rgyas rnaMs kyis bdag la ni/ /snying rje'i chu yis bkru bar gsol/ /sdig pa thaMd bshags par bgyi/ /sngon chad bdagis
gang bgyis dang / /da ltar bdagi sdig pa gang / /de dag thams cad bdag chagaso/ /nongs par bgyis pa'i las rnaMs kun/ /slan chad mi bgyid bsdaM par bgyi/ /bdagis nongs par bgyis pa
gang / /sdig de bcas par mi bya'o/ /lus kyi las ni rnaMs gsuM dang / /ngag gi rnam pa bzhi dag dang / /yid kyi rnam pa gsum po rnams/ /de dag thams cad bdag chagaso/ /lus kyi bgyis
dang ngag gi las/ /yid kyis rnam par bsams pa dang / /las rnaMs gsum po bgyis pa dag /de dag thams cad bdag chagaso/ /mi dge las bcu spangs nasu/ /dge ba bcu po rten bgyis te/ /
sa bcu la bdag gnas par bgyi/ /stobs bcu mchog tu 'gyur bar bgyi/ /bdagis sdig pa'i las gang dag /mi 'dod 'bras bu thob bgyid pa/ /sangs rgyas spyan sngar mchis nas ni/ /
de dag thams cad bshags par bgyi/ /'dzam bu gling 'dir gang dag dang / /'jig rten khams ni gzhan dag tu/ /gang rnams dge ba'i las bgyid na/ /de dag kun la yid rang ngo / /lus dang ngag

dang yid kyis kyang / /bdagis bsod nams gang bsgrubs pa/ /bdagis dge ba'i rtsa ba des/ /byang chub mchog la reg par bgyi/ /srid 'gro nyam ngar byis pa'i blo yis ni/ /shin tu mi zad sdig pa gang bgyis pa/ /
stobs bcu mi mnyam spyan sngar mchis nas ni/ /sdig pa de kun so sor bshags par bgyi/ /skye ba nyam nga srid pa nyam nga dang / /'jig rten nyam nga g.yo sems nyam nga dang / /lus kyi

spyod pa nyam nga sna tshogs kyis/ /bdagis sdig pa gang bsags de chagaso/ /byis pa blun byas nyon mongs nyam nga dang / /sdig pa'i grogs dang phrad pa nyam nga dang / /srid pa nyam nga 'dod chags nyaM
nga dang / /zhe sdang nyam nga gti mug nyam nga dang / /ngal ba'i nyam nga dus kyi nyam nga dang / /bsod nams bsgrubs pa nyam nga dag gis kyang / /rgyal ba mi mnyam mngon sum mchis nas ni/ /sdig
pa de kun so sor bshags par bgyi/ /sangs rgyas gser mdog ri sna ri rab 'dra/ /yon tan rgya mtsho 'dra la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal ba de dag rnam la skyabasu mchi/ /rgyal ba de dag kun la
mgos phyag 'tshal/ /gser mdog gser ni dri ma med pa gser gyi 'od/ /dri med rnam dag bai dUr+ya'i yan lag spyan/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma dpal gzi grags 'bar 'byung ba'i gnas/ /thugs
rje'i 'od zer dag gis mun pa mun nag bsal/ /yan lag rab tu dri med rab bzang rnam par mdzes/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma yan lag dri med gser 'dras khyab/ /nyon mongs mes gdungs yid can
'bar ba'i me 'dra ba/ /thub pa'i zla ba'i 'od zer dra bas tshim par mdzad/ /mtshan mchog suM bcu gnyis kyis dbang po yan lag mdzes/ /dpe byad bzang po dag gis yan lag rnam par mdzes/ /

dpal gzi bsod nams 'bar 'khrugs 'od zer dra ba yis/ /'jig rten gsum na mun khrod nyi ma bzhin du bzhugs/ /dri med rgya chen kha dog sna tshogs bai dUr+ya/ /skya reng dmar dang dngul dang shel bzhin yan lag dmar/ /

'od zer dra ba rnam pa sna tshogs legs brgyan pas/ /thub chen khyod ni nyi ma bzhin du de bzhin mdzes/ /mya ngan 'khrug pa 'chi chu rga ba'i dba' rlabs can/ /'khor ba'i klung chen phungs pa'i chu bor lhung
ba la/ /sdug bsngal rgya mtsho mchog tu rtsub cing shug drag pa/ /bde gshegs nyi ma'i 'od zer mang po rnams kyi skems/ /yan lag gser gyi mdog tu rnam par snang / /ye shes 'byuM gnas
'jig rten gsum kun mchog /rab mdzes mtshan gyis yan lag rnams spras pa/ /sangs rgyas gser sku 'bar la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ji ltar rgya mtsho'i chu ni dpag med dang / /
ji ltar sa la sa rdul mtha' yas dang / /ji ltar ri rab rdo mtha' tshungs med dang / /ji ltar namakha'i mtha' la mtha' yas pa/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas te/ /sems can
kun gyis shes par mi nus so/ /bskal pa du mar gzhal cing bsams kyang ni/ /yon tan mtha' ma shes par mi nuso/ /chu ni skra yi rtse mo'i tshad tsam dang / /rdor bcas rir bcas
rgya mtshor bcas pa ni/ /bskal pa bgrangs na shes par nus kyang srid/ /sangs rgyas yon tan pha mthar shes mi nus/ /yon tan kha dog snyan dang grags pa dang / /dge
ba'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i sku lus dang / /dpe' byad bzang po brgyad bcus brgyan pa yis/ /sems can thams cad de 'drar gyur par shog /
bdag gis dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis/ /'jig rten mi ring sangs rgyas 'gyur bar bgyi/ /'gro la phyan phyir chos kyang bstan par bgyi/ /sems can sdug bsngal
mang gzir thar bar bgyi/ /stobs bcas sder bcas bdud las rgyal bar bgyi/ /chos kyi 'khor lo dge ba bskor bar bgyi/ /bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab gnas par bgyi/ /bdud rtsi'i chu yis

sems can tshim par bgyi/ /ji ltar sngon gyi rgyal ba'i rdzogs pa ltar/ /pha rol phyin drug bla med rdzogs par bgyi/ /nyon mongs gzhom zhing sdug bsngal bsal bar bgyi/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug zhi bar bgyi/ /skye

ba brgya dang skye ba bye ba stong / /bdag ni rtag tu skye ba dran par bgyi/ /thub pa'i dbang po rtag tu dran par bgyi/ /de yi gsung ni rgya chen thos par bgyi/ /bdag ni dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas 'grogs

pa rnyed par bgyi/ /sdig pa'i las rnams rnam par spang bar bgyi/ /dge ba'i 'byung gnas dge rnams spyad par bgyi/ /zhing rnams kun na srog chags thams cad kyang / /'jig rten dag na sdug bsngal kun zhi gyur/ /sems can

dbang po ma tshang yan lag nyams/ /de kun de'u re dbang po tshang bar shog /gang dag nad btab nyam chung lus nyams dang / /phyogs bcu dag na skyabs med gyur pa rnams/ /de kun myur du nad las thar gyur cig /nad med

stobs dang dbang po rnyed par shog /gang dag rgyal po chom rkun sbre'u sdigs bsad thug dang / /sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs brgya yi phongs gyur pa/ /sems can nyam thag gyur cing sdug bsngal de dag kun/ /
'jigs mchog mi bzad brgya po de las thar gyur cig /gang dag brdegs shing bcing bas bcings gzir ba/ /phongs pa sna tshogs dag na gnas gyur cing / /nyon mongs stong phrag du mas dkrugs nas kyang / /
'jigs pa mi bzad mya ngan sna tshogs rnyed/ /de dag thams cad bcings las grol gyur cing / /brdeg pa dag ni brdeg las thar bar shog /bsad pa rnams kyang srog dang ldan gyur cig /phongs gyur thams
cad 'jig pa med par shog /sems can gang dag bkres srid skom gyis gzir/ /de dag zas skom sna tshogs rnyed par shog /long bas gzugs rnams sna tshogs mthong gyur cig /'on pas yid 'ong
sgra rnams thos par shog /gcer bu rnams kyis sna tshogs gos rnyed gyur/ /sems can dbul pos gter rnams rnyed par shog /nor 'bru rin chen sna tshogs mang po'i/ /sems can thams cad bde dang ldan
par shog /gang yang sdug bsngal tshog bar non ma gyur/ /sems can thams cad blta na sdugs pa dang / /gzugs bzang mdzes shing tshul du shis par shog /rtag tu bde ba du ma rdzogs gyur cig /yid

kyis zas skom rab 'byor bsod nam dag /bsams ma thag tu de dag grub gyur cig /rdza rnga cang te'u pi bang sgra snyan dang / /chu mig mtshe'u dang rdzing bu lteng kha dang / /gser gyi pad ma ud pal pad ma can/ /zas

skom gos nor mu tig nor bu dbyig /rgyan gser rin chen sna tshogs bai dU r+ya/ /de dag bsams ma thag du grub gyur cig /'jig rten gang na'ang sdug bsngal sgra ma byung / /sems can gcig kyang mi 'phrod mthong

ma gyur/ /de dag thams cad kha dog rgya chen dang / /phan tshun du ni 'od byed gyur par shog /mi yi 'jig rten phun sum tshogs gang yod/ /de dag gang du bsams par skye bar gyur/ /bsam pa thams cad bsam
ma thag tu yang / /bsod nams 'bras bu yongasu rdzogs par shog /spos dang phreng ba dag dang byug pa dang / /gos dang phye ma me tog sna tshogs dag /ljon shing dag las dus gsum 'bab par shog /
sems can de dag len cing dgar gyur cig /de bzhin gshegs pa bsam yas thams cad dang / /
rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang / /rdul bral dri med bsten pa'i chos la yang / /phyogs bcu rnams su mchod pa byed par shog /'gro ba dman pa thams cad spong gyur cig /
mi khom brgyad po dag las 'das par shog /dal ba'i rgyal po dam pa thob gyur cig /rtag tu sangs rgyas 'grogs pa thobs par shog /rtag tu mthon po'i rigasu skye bar shog /nor dang 'bru yi mdzod rnams

'byor gyur cig /snyan dang grags dang gzugs dang kha dog gis/ /bskal pa du mar legs par brgyan par shog /bud med thams cad rtag tu phor gyur te/ /dpa' zhing rtul phod mkhas shing gsal bar shog /de kun rtag

tu byang chub phyir spyod gyur/ /pha rol phyin pa drug la spyod par shog /phyogs bcu dag na rin chen shing dbang drung / /sangs rgyas bde bzhugs rin chen bai dU r+ya'i/ /khri la bzhugs pa dag ni mthong gyur cig /chos bstan

pa yang de dag thos gyur shog /bdag gis sdig pa'i las rnams bsgrub pa ni/ /srid pa nyam ngar sngon chad gang bsgrubs pa/ /sdig las gang dag mi 'dod 'bras thob pa/ /de dag thams cad ma lus zad gyur cig /
sems can gang dag srid par bcings nas su/ /'khor ba'i zhags pa'i thags pas dam bcing pa/ /shes rab lag gis bcings pa bkrol bar shog /sdug bsngal rnams las myur du thar cig /sems can gang

dag 'dzam bu'i gling 'di dang / /gang dag 'jig rten khams ni gzhan rnams na/ /bsod nams sna tshogs zab mo rnams byed pa/ /de dag kun la rjes su yi rang ngo / /lus dang ngag dang yid kyis bsgrubs pa yi/ /bdag

gis rjes su yi rang bsod nams de/ /bdag ni smon grub 'bras bu yod par shog /byang chub rdul bral bla med thob gyur cig /gang dag rtag dang dri ma bral ba dang / /dri med yid kyis phyag 'tshal bstod pa dang / /yongs

su bsngo ba brjod pa 'di yis ni/ /bskal pa drug bcur ngan song spong bar gyur/ /tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa 'di dag gis/ /skyes pa bud med bram ze rgyal rigs las/ /thal sbyar 'dug ste rgyal ba gang bstod pa/ /

tshe rabs kun tu skye ba dran par 'gyur/ /yan lag dbang po kun gyis yan lag brgyan/ /bsod nams yon tan sna tshogs rnams dang ldan/ /mi dbang rgyal pos rtag du de mchod de/ /de dang de dag tu ni de 'drar 'gyur/ /gang dag

rna ba'i bu gar bshags pa 'di ni grag 'gyur ba/ /de dag sangs rgyas gcig gis gan nas dge ba byas ma yin/ /gnyis la ma yin bzhi la ma yin lnga min bcu la min/ /de ltar sangs rgyas stong gis gan nas dge ba

byas pa yin/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las bshags pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bzhi pa'o// // 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/
bam po gnyis pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rig kyis lha mo byang chub yang dag par bsdus pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rig kyis lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po gser gyis lag
pa'i dbang po zhes bya ba des/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa pad ma'i 'byung gnas 'dis/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mngon par
bstod do/ /rgyal ba gang dag sngar gyur gang byung dang / /phyog bcu'i 'jig rten dag na gang bzhugs pa/ /rgyal ba de dag rnams la phyags bgyi'o/ /rgyal ba de dag kun la bdag gis bstod/ /
thub dbang zhi zhing rab zhi rnams par dag /sku ni gser gyis mdog tu rab tu gda'/ /dbyangs rnams kun gyis sangs rgyas gsungs snyan te/ /tshang pa'i sgra dbyangs rab tu bsgrag pa'i gsung / /

bung ba rma bya ud pal sngon po'i dbu/ /mthon mthing lcang lo bya ni tsa sha 'dra/ /kha ba dung ltar rab tu dkar ba'i tshems/ /rtag tu gser ltar rnam par mdzes par gda'/ /spyan ni ring zhing mthon mthing

dri ma med/ /u pal sngon po rab tu rgyas pa 'dra/ /ljags ni che zhing legs la pad ma'i mdog /pad ma 'drar snang pad ma'i zer ba 'dra/ /zhal gyis mdzod spu pad ma dung dang 'dra/ /bai dU r+ya'i mdog 'dra g.yas

su 'khyil/ /thub pa'i zla ba phra zhing zla ba zad pa 'dra/ /sku yi lte ba bung ba gsal ba bzhin/ /zhal la mtho ba'i shangs ni rtag tu lhag ge ste/ /'jam zhing sa la'i gser ltar kha dog bzang / /rtag par rgyun tu rgyal

ba thams cad kyi/ /ro mchog 'jam zhing dam pa mchog rab 'phags/ /spu yi bu ga nas ni re re skyes/ /spu rnams skyes pa g.yas su 'khyil ba ste/ /mthon mthing 'od 'bar 'tsher zhing lcang lo can/ /rma bya'i mgrin
sdug 'dra bar sngo la mdzes/ /bltas ma thag tu sku yis rnams par bgyi/ /phyogs bcu 'jig rten dag ni thams cad gang / /'jig rten gsum na sdug bsngal mtha' yas zhi/ /bde ba kun kyi sems can rnams kyang
tshim/ /sems dmyal 'gro dang dud 'gro'i 'gro ba dang / /yi dgas lha gnas mi yi 'gro rnams su/ /sems can de dag thams cad bde bas tshim/ /ngan song 'gro ba rnams ni thams cad zhi/ /kha dog mdog bzang

gser dang 'dra ba'i 'od/ /btso ma'i gser ltar rab tu snang ba'i sku/ /bde gshegs zla ba rab tu dri med zhal/ /'dzum zhing rnam mdzes shin tu dri med zhal/ /gzhon nu btsas 'drar sku lus yag lag 'jam/ /seng ge

'dra bar rtsal gyis gnon pa'i mchog /phyag ring phyag ni rab tu ring ba ste/ /sa la'i lcug ma rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin/ /'dom gang 'od 'bar 'od zer rab tu gtong / /nyi ma stong ltar rab tu lhag ge'o/ /thub pa'i dbang po'i sku

mchog dri ma med/ /zhing rnams mtha' yas thams cad rab tu snang / /sangs rgyas 'od ni rnams par lhang nges bas/ /zhing rnams mtha' yas brgya stong rnams su yang / /mtshan byed zla ba nyi ma mang po dag /de dag

thams cad 'od ni med par gyur/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma 'jig rten sgron ma ste/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma brgya phrag stong rnams ni/ /zhing rnams mtha' yas stong phrag rgya dag na/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma sems can mthong / /

bsod nams stong phrag brgya dang ldan pa'i sku/ /yon tan kun kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i sku/ /glang chen dbang pa'i sna 'dra rgyal ba'i phyag /phyag dang zhabs 'od rab mdzes dri ma med/ /sa yi steng gi rdul dang mtshungs 'dra

snyed/ /phra ba'i rdul snyed sangs rgyas gang 'das dang / /gang dag phra ba'i rdul snyed byung ba dang / /gang dag rdul ba'i rdul snyed bzhugs pa'i/ /rgyal ba de dag la ni rab dang ba'i/ /ngag yid lus kyis me tog dbul

ba dang / /spos rnams dbul dang bsngags pa brgya dag dang / /dge ba'i sems kyis kyang ni phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal ba'i yon tan gang dag dger gyur pa/ /snying po mchog rab sna tshogs du ma te/ /bdag gis
bskal pa stong du lce brgya yis/ /sangs rgyas yon tan brjod par mi nus so/ /rgyal ba gcig gis yon tan rnams kyang ni/ /lce stong gis kyang cung zad brjod mi nus/ /bdag gis rgyal ba dag ni
thams cad ni/ /yon tan lce brgyas brjod par ga la nus/ /lhar bcas 'jig rten thams cad mtshor gyur te/ /srid pa'i rtse mo man chad chus gang ba/ /skra yi rtse mos dpag par nus srid kyi/ /
bde gshegs rnams kyis yon tan gcig la min/ /lus dang ngag yid rab tu dang ba yis/ /rgyal ba kun la bdag gis bsngags bstod pas/ /bdag gis bsod nam 'bras bu mchog bsags gang / /des ni
sems can rgyal ba reg gyur cig /de ltar rgyal pos sangs rgyas rnams bstod nas/ /rgyal po 'di ltar smon lam 'debs pa ni/ /ma 'ong bskal pa mtha' yas rnams su yang / /gang dang gang du bdag ni skye ba

na/ /rmi lam du ni 'di 'dra'i rnga blta zhing / /der ni bshags pa 'di 'dra mnyan par bgyi/ /rgyal bstod pad ma 'byung rgyal 'di 'dra ba/ /skye ba de dang der ni rnyed par bgyi/ /sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas mtshungs med dang / /gang

yang bskal pa stong du rnyed dka' ba/ /de dag rmi lam du yang mnyan par bgyi/ /nyin gyur tshe yang de dag bshad par bgyi/ /sems can sdug bsngal mtsho las thar bar bgyi/ /pha rol phyin pa drug po rdzog par bgyi/ /phyi nas byang chub bla med thob par bgyi/ /bdag gi

zhing ni lhod pa med gyur cig /rnga phul rnams par smin pa'i 'bras bu dang / /rgyal ba thams cad la yang bstod pa'i rgyus/ /shakya thub dbang mngon du blta bar bgyi/ /der ni bdag gis lung bstan thob gyur cig /gser gyi lag

pa'i dbang dang gser gyi 'od/ /bdag gi khye'u ni gang yin 'di gnyis kyang / /der ni bu pho de dag gnyi ga dang / /byang chub bla med lung stan thob par shog /sems can gang dag gnas dang rten med cing / /bskyabs dang bral
nas phongs par gyur pa dag /de dag la yang ma 'ong dus rnams dang / /skyob dang dpung gnyen skyabs dang rten gyur shog /sdug bsngal kun 'byung zad pa byed gyur cig /dge ba kun gyi 'byung gnas gyur
par shog /sngon mtha' 'das pa de dag ji srid pa/ /ma 'ongs bskal par byang chub spyad par bgyi/ /gser 'od dam pa yi ni bshags pa yi/ /bdag gis sdig pa'i rgya mtsho skams par shog /
bdag gis las kyi rgya mtsho zad gyur cig /bdag gi nyon mongs rgya mtsho zad par shog /bdag gi bsod nams rgya mtsho rdzogs gyur cig /ye shes dri med snang ba dam pa yi/ /bdag gi
ye shes rgya mtsho rnams dag shog /yon tan kun gyi rgya mtshor gyur par shog /byang chub yon tan ring chen rdzogs gyur cig /gser 'od pa'i bshag pa'i stobs kyis ni/ /bdag gis bsod nams rab

tu snang bar shog /bdag gis byang chub snang ba rnams dag gyur/ /ye shes dri med snang ba dam pa yi/ /bdag gis lus kyi 'od ni snang bar shog /bsod nam snang ba lhag ger bya ba'i phyir/ /'jig rten gsum
na khyad par 'phags gyur cig /bsod nams stobs dang rtag tu ldan par shog /sdug bsngal rgya mtsho las ni sgrol ba dang / /bde ba kun gyi rgya mtsho 'dra ba yis/ /ma 'ongs bskal par byang chub spyad
par bgyi/ /'jig rten gsum na sngon mthar ji snyid gshegs/ /de dag zhing ni rgyal ba thams cad kyi/ /yon tan mtha' yas khyad 'phags ci 'dra ba/ /yon tan mtha' yas rnams kyis bdag gis zhing / /
ma 'ong dus na de 'drar gyur par shog /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa med tog pad ma'i
'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /bsam gyis mi khyab mdo rnams gzhan dag du/ /stong pa'i chos
rnams rab tu rgyas bshad de/ /de ltar bas na mdo mchog dam pa 'dir/ /stong pa'i chos rnams mdo tsam bshad pa yin/ /sems can blo chung rnam par mi shes pas/ /chos rnams thams cad shes

par mi nus te/ /de lta bas na mdo mchog dam pa 'dir/ /stong pa'i chos rnams mdo rtsam bshad pa yin/ /sems can kun gyis ci nas shes 'gyur dang / /sems can 'byung bya'i phyir ni snying rje'i dbang / /thabs

dang tshul dang rgyu gzhan rnams kyis ni/ /mdo mchog dam pa dbang po 'di bshad do/ /lus 'di grong khyim stong pa ji bzhin te/ /dbang po rnams ni dmag dang chom kun 'dra/ /de dag thams cad grong cig gnas

mod kyi/ /de dag phan tshun rnam par mi shes so/ /mig gi dbang po gzugs gyur rnams la rgyug /rna ba'i dbang po sgra la rnam par spyod/ /sna yi dbang po sna tshog dri rnams 'phrog /lce yi dbang po rtag tu ro la rgyug /lus

kyis dbang po reg pa dag la rgyug /yid kyi dbang po chos rnams rnam par spyod/ /dbang po drug po 'di dag phan tshun du/ /rang rang yul la rab tu 'jug par byed/ /sems ni sgyu ma lta bur g.yo ba yin/ /dbang po drug ni yul

la rnams spyod de/ /ji ltar mi zhig grong stong rgyug pa dang / /dmag dang chom kun dag dang gnas pa bzhin/ /ji ltar sems ni yul drug gnas bcas shing / /dbang po'i spyod yul dag kyang rab shes pa/ /de ltar sems ni

yul drug gnas bcas te/ /dbang pa'i spyod yul rnams kyang rab tu shes/ /gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri rnams dang / /ro dang reg bya de bzhin spyod yul chos/ /sems ni dbang po drug po thams cad la/ /dbang

por bzhugs pa bya bzhin g.yo bar 'gyur/ /dbang po gang dang gang du gnas bcas pa/ /dbang po de ni shes par bdag nyid byed/ /lus ni g.yo ba med cing byed pa med/ /snying po med cing rgyan las byung ba yin/ /yang
dag ma yin yongs su rtog las byung / /grong stong las kyi 'khrul 'khor 'dra bar gnas/ /sa dang me dang chu dang rlung rnams ni/ /gzhan tu gnas te phyogs dang phyogs na gnas/ /dper na sbrul gdug gnas

gcig ji bzhin te/ /rtag tu phan tshun mthun pa ma yin bzhin/ /khams kyi sbrul rnams bzhi po de dag kyang / /gnyis ni steng 'gro gnyis ni mthur du 'gro/ /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su gnyis gnyis te/ /

khams sbrul de dag thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/ /sa yi sbrul dang chu yi sbrul dag dang / /'di gnyis 'og tu zad par 'gyur ba yin/ /me yi sbrul dang rlung gi sbrul dag dang / /'di gnyis steng gi nam mkhar 'gro ba yin/ /

ji ltar sngon chad byed pa'i las rnams kyis/ /sems dang rnams shes kun tu gnas nas dong / /lha dang mi dang ngan song gsum dag tu/ /ji ltar byas pa'i las kyis srid par skye/ /bad kan rlung dang 'khris pa

zad gyur na/ /lus ni gcin dang ngan skyugs rnams kyis gang / /mngon par mi dga' srin bu'i phung por gyur/ /dur khrod dag na mthor ba shing bzhin gyur/ /lha mo khyod ni chos 'di rnams la ltos/ /'di la sems can de

bzhin gang zag dang / /chos rnams 'di dag thams cad stong pa ste/ /ma rig pa yi rkyen las byung ba yin/ /'byung ba chen po 'di dag che 'byung min/ /ma byung ba las byung zhing mi 'byung ste/ /gang gis phyir ni 'byung

ba mi 'byung ba/ /de phyir 'byung ba che zhes ngas brjod do/ /yod pa min zhing gzhar yang yod min la/ /ma rig pa'i rkyen las byung ba yin/ /ma rig 'di ni yod pa ma yin te/ /de bas ngas ni ma rig 'di bshad do/ /

'du byed rnams shes ming dang gzugs bcas dang / /skye mched drug dang reg dang tshor ba dang / /srid dang len dang de bzhin srid pa dang / /skye dang rga shi mya ngan gnod pa rnams/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bsam
gyis mi khyab pa/ /'khor ba'i 'khor lo ji ltar gnas pa dag /ma byung ba las byung dang mi 'byung dang / /tshal bzhin ma yin sems kyis rnam dpyad dang / /bdag gis lta bar gyur par bcad par gyis/ /

ye shes ral gris nyon mongs rgya mo grol/ /phung po'i gnas la stong par gyur par ltos/ /byang chub yon tan rgya chen reg par bgyis/ /ngas ni bdud rtsi grong khyer sgo yang phye/ /bdud rtsi khu ba'i snod kyang kun tu tan/ /

nga ni bdud rtsi'i grong khyer gnas der 'jug /nga ni bdud rtsi'i khu bas bdag tshim bya/ /ngas ni chos kyi rnga chen dam pa brdungs/ /ngas ni chos kyi dung gi mchog kyang bus/ /ngas ni chos kyi sgron ma mchog

'bar byas/ /ngas ni chos kyi char pa dam pa phab/ /nga ni nyon mongs dgra mchog rnams las rgyal/ /ngas ni chos kyi rgyal mtshan dam pa bsgreng / /srid pa'i mtsho las sems can rab tu bsgral/ /ngas ni ngan song gsum
gyi lam rnams bkag /sems can nyon mong me yis gdungs gyur pa/ /rten med gyur cing dpung gnyen med pa dag /srog chags nyon mongs mes gdungs zhi byas nas/ /bdud rtsi'i khu ba bsol bas tshim par byed/ /

gang phyir bskal pa du mar sngon chad ngas/ /'dren pa bsam gyis mi khyab mchod pa byas/ /chos kyi sku de yongs su tshol ba na/ /brtul zhugs brtan pas byang chub phyir spyad de/ /lag pa dang ni mig dang rkang pa dang / /

yan lag mchog dang bu sdug bu mo dang / /nor dbyig nor bu mu tig rgyan dang gser/ /bai dU r+ya'i dang rin chen sna tshogs btang / /stong gsum shing ljon thams cadang / /rtsa dang rtsa rnams thams cad dang / /nag tshal dag
dang sa las ni/ /skye ba thams cad bcad gtubs te/ /de dag thams cad phyer blags nas/ /rab tu phra ba'i rdul 'drar byas/ /nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor ji tsam par/ /phye ma'i phung po spungs nas ni/ /'di la
cha gsum dbye bar nus/ /sa la rdul ni yod pa rnams/ /stong gsum dag ni thams cad kyi/ /rdul khams bsam gyi mi khyab pa/ /sems can kun gyi shes pa gang / /de ni sems can gcig gir gyur/ /shes
pa de yis rdul rnams kyi/ /phye ma bgrang bar byed na ni/ /sems can kun las rab 'phags pa/ /ye shes rab ldan mi rnams kyis/ /thams cad bgrang bar nus srid kyi/ /rgyal ba'i mkhyen la mi nus so/ /
thub pa'i chen po'i ye shes gang / /skad cig gcig la 'jug pa yang / /bskal pa bye ba dus mar ni/ /gang du'ang bgrang bar mi nus so/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i las/ stong pa nyid

kyi le'u zhes bya ba ste drug pa'o// // de nas rgyal po chen po rnams thos kyi bu dang rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang rnams stan las langs te/
gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsug te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logasu thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser
'od dam pa'i mdo sde'i dbang po rgyal po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzigs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa/ byang chub sems
dpa'i tshogs thams cad kyi yongs su bzung ba/ lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis mchod pa/ lha'i dbang po'i tshogs thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ 'jig
rten skyong ba thams cad kyis mchod cing bsngags te/ /brjod nas rab tu bkur ba/ lha'i khang khyim thams cad snang bar bgyid pa/ sems can thams cad la mchog tu bde ba rab tu sbyin par bgyid pa/ sems
can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad skems pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad kyi rgyun gcod pa/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad rab tu bzlog pa/ mu ge'i
dgon pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ nad kyi dgon pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ gza' thams cad sel ba/ mchog tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ mya ngan dang nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi
bar bgyid pa/ gnod pa rnams pa sna tshogs rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ gnod pa brgya stong rab tu 'jom par bgyid pa lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po

'di 'khor gyi nang du rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad na/ chos nyan pa chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa bzhi lha'i lus 'dis gzi chen pos rnams par 'phel bar 'gyur
ro/ /bdag cag gis lus la brtson pa dang stobs dang mthu yang skyed par 'gyur/ gzi brjid dang dpal dang phun sum tshogs pa yang de dag gis lus la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag

cag rgyal po chen po bzhi ni chos dang ldan pa chos smra ba chos kyi rgyal po lags te/ brtsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni chos kyis lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang dri za dang mi 'am ci dang

lto 'phye chen po rnams kyi rgyal po bgyi'o/ /'byung po'i tshogs mi bzad pa snying rje ma mchis pa gzhan gyi mdangs 'phrog pa rnams bzlog par bgyi'o/ /brtsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi/

gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu rtag par rgyun tu lha'i mig rnam par dag pa/ mi las 'das pas 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad la blta bar bgyi bsrung bar

bgyi yongs su bskyang bar bgyi ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi 'jig rten skyong zhes ming du chags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang su dag 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir/

pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis yul 'jom par 'gyur ram/ mu ge'i gnod pa 'am nad kyi gnod pa 'am gnod pa sna tshog brgya dang gnod pa stong dang gnod pa brgya phrag stong dag gis gtses par 'gyur ba na/ btsun pa bcoM

ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa'i dge slong chos smra ba de dag la bskul ba bgyi'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi

rdzu 'phrul dang byin kyi brlabs kyis dge slong chos smra ba de dag la bkur ba na/ yul gang dang gang du mchi bar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yul de dang de dag tu rgya cher yang dag par ston par

'gyur te/ gang gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang gnod pa stong yul du 'byung ba 'di lta bu 'di dag rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po gang gis yul du mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa'i dge slong

chos smra ba de dag mchi bar 'gyur ba'i yul de dag tu gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yang bsnyen par 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam mi'i rgyal pos gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal

po 'di nyan te thos nas/ mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa'i dge slong de dag phyir rgol ba thams cad las kun tu bsrung bar bgyid/ yongs su bskyab pa dang yongs su 'dzin pa dang yongasu skyong bar bgyid na/
btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis/ mi'i rgyal po'i yul de thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kun tu bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung

ba dang yongs su bskyang ba dang zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po nam dge slong ngam dge slong ma 'am dge brnyen nam dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa la/
bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyi bde bar bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen bzhi/ mi'i rgyal po de'i yul thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams la bde ba'i yo
byad thams cad kyis/ bde ba dang yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs par bgyi'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam mi'i rgyal pos dge slong ngam dge slong ma 'am dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen

ma 'am/ mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa la sti stang du bgyid bla mar bgyid rim gror bgyid cing mchod na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis/ mi'i rgyal po de la rgyal po thams cad pas che

bsti stang du bgyi ches bla mar bgyi ches rim gror bgyi ches mchod par bgyi ste yul thams cad du yang rab tu sngags par bgyi'o/ /de nas bac+doMs kyi rgyal po chen po bzhi la legaso legaso zhes bya ba byin te rgyal po chen po dag legaso legs

so/ /rgyal po chen po khyod yang legs so legs so/ /'di lta ste khyod ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po la

bsnyen bkur byas pa chos dang ldan pa chos smra ba chos kyis lha dang mi rnams kyi rgyal po byas pa'o/ /'di lta ste khyed yun ring por sems can thams cad la phan pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ bde ba dang byams pa'i
sems dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa/ mi phan pa thams cad 'gog pa/ sems can thams cad la bde ba thams cad nye bar bsgrub par brtson

pa yin te/ rgyal po chen po khyed bzhis/ mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa dang rim gro byed par brtson pa de dag la kun tu srung bar gyis shig /yongasu bskyab pa dang / yong

su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig /de na rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog dang gnod sbyin brgya stong phra du ma dang bcas pa khyed bzhis 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang
da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos kyi tshul bsrungs par 'gyur ro/ /yongs su bskyangs ba dang yongs su bzung bar yang 'gyur ro/ /des nas rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog

dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang bcas pa khyed bzhi lha dang lha ma yin du g.yul 'gyed pa na rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /lha ma yin rnams pham par 'gyur ro/ /'di ltar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po pha

rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad 'dul bar byed pa 'di'i phyir/ dge slong ngam dge slong ma 'am dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa/ de dag la kun tu bsrung ba gyis shig /yongs su bskyab pa dang yongs su bzung ba

dang yongs su bskyang ba dang zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba gyis shig /de nas rgyal po chen po rnams thos kyis bu dang rgyal po yul 'khor bsrung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang
stan las langs te/ gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di ces gsol to/ /btsun

pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dus gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di/ grong ngam grong khyer ram grong rdal lam ljongs sam yul 'khor ram pho brang 'khor gang du spyod par 'gyur ba dang / mi'i rgyal po gang

dang gang gis yul du spyod par 'gyur ba dang / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal por gyur pa gang la la zhig lha'i dbang po'i dam tshig rgyal po'i bstan bcos 'dis/ rgyal po bgyid cing rtag par rgyun du gser 'od dam pa'i
mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan tam rim gror bgyid dam mchod par bgyid dam dge slong ngam dge slong ma 'am dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la yang bsti stang

bgyid btsun par bgyid rim gro bgyid cing mchod de rtag par rgyun tu gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyan na/ chos mnyan pa'i chu 'o'i chu chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi

dang / g.yog rnams dang gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma'i lha'i lus 'di dag gzi brjid chen po rnams par 'phel bar 'gyur/ bdag cag la brtson 'grus dang mthu dang stobs chen por yang bgyid par 'gyur/ bdag

gi gzi brjid dang dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa yang rnams par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang lus

bltar mi gda' bar bgyis te/ da ltar dang ma 'ong pa'i dus na grong ngam grong khyer ram grong rdal lam yul 'khor ram pho brang 'khor gang na/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di spyod par 'gyur
ba de dag tu mchi bar bgyi'o/ /mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i/ rgyal po 'di mnyan pa dang / rim gror bgyid pa dang mchod pa bgyid pa de dag la kun tu bsrungs bar bgyi'o/ /

yongs su bskyab pa dang yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang chad pa spang ba dang zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/ /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag dang yul 'khor de dag dang yul de
dag kyang kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /yongs su bskyab pa dang yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/ /yul de dag kyang 'jig
pa dang gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar bgyi'o/ /pha rol gyi dmag tshog rnams kyang slar bzlog par bgyi'o/ /mi'i rgyal po gang la la gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i

rgyal po 'di mnyan pa dang rim gro bgyid pa dang / mchod pa bgyid pa de'i dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po gzhan zhig mchis la/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du bdag
dpung gis tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig /yul der song ste/ yul de rnam par gzhig go snyam du sems bskyed na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe de'i dus na/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i

dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i gzi brjid kyi mthus dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de rgyal po gzhan dag dang g.yul 'gyed par 'gyur/ rang gi yul du phyin na yang / yul 'khrug par 'gyur/ rgyal po'i 'khrug par 'gyur/

rgyal po'i 'khrug pa mi bzad pa yang 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul du gza' dang nad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul du brel ba sna tshog brgya dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de

rang gi yul du phyin pa na/ gnod pa sna tshog brgya dang brel ba sna tshog brgya 'di lta bu 'byung ngo / /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de yan lag bzhi pa'i dmag bsogs te/ pha rol gyi dmag tshog

su mchi ba'i slad du rang gis yul nas byung te/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu yul der mchi 'tshal ba dang / gang gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di gnas pa'i yul de rnam

par gzhig 'tshal bar gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa/ gnod sbyin brgya stong du ma dang ldan cig lus mi gda' bar bgyis te der mchi bar bgyi'o/ /

pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de shul du zhug gsab pa kyang / de nyid nas ldog par bgyi'o/ /brel ba rnam pa sna tshog brgya dag kyang nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /bgegs kyang bgyi'o/ /'di lta ste yul der pha rol dmag tshogs de mchi
bar yang mi nus na/ yul gzhig par bgyid par lta ga la 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rgyal po chen po dag legs so legs so/ /rgyal po chen

po dag khyed yang legs te/ khyed bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba phrag khrig brgya stong du yang dag par bsgrub te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di'i phyir/ mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang

po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang rim gro byed pa dang mchod pa byed pa de dag la kun tu bsrung ba gyis shig /yongasu bskyab pa dang yongs su gzung ba dang yongs su bskyang ba dang chad pa spang ba dang zhi ba dang bde legasu 'gyur ba

gyis shig /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag dang grong khyer de dag dang yul 'khor de dag dang yul de dag kyang kun tu bsrung shig /yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang yongs su bskyang ba dang chad pa spang ba dang

zhi ba dang bde legasu 'gyur bar gyis shig /yul de dag kyang 'jigs pa dang gnod pa dang 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar gyis shig /pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams kyang zlog cig /'dzam bu'i gling

thams cad na gnas pa'i mi'i rgyal po dag mi 'thab pa dang mtshang mi 'dru ba dang mi brtsod pa dang mi 'gyed par bya ba la spro bar gyis shig /rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa khyed bzhi 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir nam

grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag na/ rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag rang rang gi yul la mngon par dga' ba dang / rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug des mngon par dga' ba dang / rang gi nor gyi phung pos phan tshun rnams

par mi 'tshe ba dang / phan tshun rnam par 'tshe ba mi bskyed pa dang / rang gis ji ltar sngon gyi las bsag pas rgyal po thob pa'i rang gis rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gis dga' ba dang / phan tshun du yul 'jig par mi byed

pa dang / yul gzhig pa'i phyir pha rol gyi gnod pa dang / 'dzam gling 'dir grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong dag na rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag phan tshun du byams pa'i sems su 'gyur/ byams pa'i sems

dang phan pa'i sems su 'gyur te/ phan tshun du mi 'thab mtshang mi 'dru mi brtsod mi 'gyed par rang rang gi yul dag na dga' bar 'gyur na/ de'i phyir rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa khyed bzhi 'dzam

bu'i gling 'di rgyal par 'gyur/ lo leg par 'gyur nyams dga' bar 'gyur/ skye bo mang po dang mis gang bar 'gyur/ sa yangs mdangs can du 'gyur/ dus dang zla ba dang zla ba phyed dang lo khyud kor thams cad kyang yang

dag pa'i dus dang ldan par 'gyur/ gza' dang rgyu skar dang zla ba dang nyi ma yang nyin mtshan du leg par rgyu bar 'gyur/ char pa'i rgyun yang sa la dus dus su 'bab par 'gyur/ 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can

rnams kyang nor dang 'bru thams cad 'byor par 'gyur/ long spyod che ba dang ser sna med par 'gyur/ stong ba dang ldan pa 'gyur/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par 'gyur/ phal cher bde 'gro mtho ri kyi 'jig rten du skye

bar 'gyur/ lha'i khang khyim rnam kyang lha dang lha'i bu rnam kyis gang bar 'gyuro/ /rgyal po chen po dag gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur la gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par gyur te rim gro byas mchod pa byas

dge slong ngam dge slong ma 'am dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la yang bsti tang byed bla mar byed rim gro byed chod par byed cing / rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa gnod sbyin stong phrag du ma

la snying brtse ba'i phyir rtag par rgyun tu gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan na/ chos nyan pa'i chu'i klung chos bdud tsi'i khu ba 'di khyed cag gi lus 'di dag tshim par 'gyur ro/ /khyed kyi lha'i lus 'di dag

gi gzi chen po yang rnam par 'phel lo/ /khyed kyi brtson 'grus dang mthu dang stobs kyang bskyed do/ /khyed kyi gzi brjid dang dpal dang phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam par 'phel lo/ /mi'i rgyal po des de

bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa nga la yang mchod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rgya chen po yangs pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /mi'i rgyal po des 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar

byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma la yang yo byad bsam gyis mi khyab pa rgya che ba yangs pa thams cad kyis mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /des na mi'i rgyal po de la bsrung ba chen po byas par

'gyur ro/ /des na mi'i rgyal po de la kun tu bsrung ba dang yongasu bskyab pa dang yongasu gzung ba dang yongasu bskyang ba dang chad pa spang ba dang zhi ba dang bde legasu 'gyur ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /btsun mo dam pa dang rgyal bu rnaMs

dang brgyal btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad dang rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor thams cad kyang bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur/ yongasu bskyab pa dang yongasu gzung ba dang yongasu bskyang ba dang chad pa spang ba dang zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur

ba byas par 'gyur/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor na gnas pa'i lha thams cad kyang ches gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang ches stobs dang ldan pa dang bde ba dang yid bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ dga' ba sna tshogs
myong bar 'gyur/ grong khyer de dag dang yul 'khor de dag kyang kun tu bsrungs bar 'gyur/ yongasu bskyangs par 'gyur/ gnod pa med par 'gyur/ dgra med par 'gyur/ pha rol gyi dmags tshogs thams

cad kyis mi rdzi ba dang gnod pa med pa dang 'khrug pa med par 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang rgyal po chen

po 'phags skyes po dang rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang dang de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po gang la la zhig gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yang nyan

'tshal bar 'gyur/ bdag nyid la yang bsrung ba chen po bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ btsun mo dam pa dang rgyal bu rnams dang rgyal po'i bu mo rnams dang btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs rnams la yang bsrung ba chen po bgyid

'tshal bar 'gyur/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag thams cad la yang zhi ba dang bde legasu 'gyur ba chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa mchog tu khyad par du 'phags pa bla na med pa bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ tshe 'di

la bdag gi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par 'phel bar bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ rgyal po nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis pa

yongasu 'dzin 'tshal bar 'gyur/ bdag gi yul thams cad kyang kun tu bsrung 'tshal bar 'gyur/ yongasu bskyang 'tshal bar 'gyur/ rang gi yul na gnod pa ma mchis pa dang dgra ma mchis pa dang pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis

mi rdzi ba dang nad 'go ba ma mchis pa dang 'khrug pa ma mchis par bgyid 'tshal bar gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po des g.yeng ba ma mchis pa'i sems dang gus pa dang bcas pa dang ri mo dang bcas pas

gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di bsti stang du bgyis te mnyan par bgyi'o/ /gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan pa'i slad du/ mi'i rgyal po des rgyal po'i pho brang khyad par du 'phags

par mchis bar bgyi'o/ /der mchis nas kyang rgyal po'i pho brang spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag gdab cing me tog sil ma sna tshogs dgram par bgyi'o/ /spos chab sna tshogs kyi chag chag btab pa der
chos kyi khri mthon po rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa bsham par bgyi'o/ /phyogs der gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan par bgyi'o/ /
mi'i rgyal po des lus bkru bar bgyi'o/ /gos dri rab tu bda' ba gos sar pa mdzes pa bgos nas rgyan sna tshogs kyis rgyan par bgyi'o/ /bdag gi stan rab tu dma' ba gding bar bgyi ste/
stan de la mchis nas rgyal po'i rgyags pas dregs par mi bgyi'o/ /der rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la chags par mi bgyi'o/ /rgyags pa dang nga rgyal dang dregs pa thams cad rnam par spangs pa'i sems

kyis gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyi'o/ /dge slong chos smra ba de la yang ston par 'du shes bskyed par bgyi'o/ /mi'i rgyal po des de'i tshe de'i dus na/ btsun mo dam pa dang rgyal

bu rnams dang rgyal po'i bu mo rnams dang btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs rnams la sdug pa dang phan pas blta bar bgyi'o/ /btsun mo dam pa dang rgyal bu rnams dang rgyal po'i bu mo rnams la tshigs snyan pa smra bar bgyi'o/ /

btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad pa tshigs snyan pa smra bar bgyi'o/ /chos nyan pa'i mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs sbyor du stsal bar bgyi'o/ /dga' ba bsam gyis mi khyab cing mtshungs pa ma mchis pas
bdag tshims par bgyi'o/ /dga' ba dang bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas bde bar bgyi'o/ /dbang po bde bar bgyi'o/ /bdag nyid don chen po thob par bsam par bgyi'o/ /bdag dga' ba chen

pos dga' bar bgyi'o/ /rab tu dga' ba chen po bskyed nas chos smra ba bsu bar bgyi'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po

dag de'i tshe de'i dus na mi'i rgyal po des gos thams cad dkar po sar pa mdzes pa bgo bar bya'o/ /spud pa dang rgyan sna tshogs kyis bdag legs par rgyan par bya'o/ /gdugs dkar po yang gzung bar bya'o/ /

rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang rgyal po'i bkod pa chen pos bkra shis tha dad pa sna tshogs thogs te/ rgyal po'i pho brang de nas byung ba chos smra ba bsu ba'i phyir der 'gro bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi'i rgyal pos der gom

pa ji snyed bor ba de snyed kyi bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi 'khor ba phyir bsnyil bar 'gyur/ de snyed kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal rigs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong thob par 'gyur/ der gom pa ji snyed

bor ba de snyed du tshe 'di la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'phel bar 'gyur/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar gnas yangs shing rgya che ba lha'i gzhal med khang rin po che sna bdun

las byas pa dag thob par 'gyur/ mi rnams kyi rgyal rigs lha'i rgya che zhing rgya che ba brgya stong phrag du ma thob par 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du dbang phyug chen po thob par 'gyur/ tshe ring bar 'gyur/ yun ring du

'tsho bar 'gyur/ spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ tshigs gzung bar 'os par 'gyur/ grags pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ brjod pa shin tu rgya che bar 'gyur/ bsngags par 'os par 'gyur/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin

du bcas pa'i 'jig rten la phan par 'gyur/ lha dang mi rnams kyi bde ba rgya che zhing rgya che ba thob par 'gyur/ stobs che bar 'gyur/ tshan po che chen po'i stobs kyi shug dang ldan zhing gzug bzang bar 'gyur/ mdzes pa dang lta na sdug

pa dang / kha dog bzang po rgyas pa chog dang ldan par 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad par 'gyur/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnaMs rnyed par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa yongasu gzung bar

'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po dag yon tan gyi phan yon 'di lta bu dag mthong nas/ mi'i rgyal po des dpag tshad tsam du chos smra ba bsu bar bya/ dpag tshad brgya dang / dpag tshad stong du yang bsu bar bya/

chos smra ba de la ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /'di snyam du yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa deng bdag gi rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir 'jug par 'gyur
ro/ /deng de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa bdag gi rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir bshos gsol bar 'gyur ro/ /deng bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa

dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i chos 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa mnyan par bya'o/ /deng bdagis chos nyan pa 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byu~Mb

las phyir mi ldog par bya'o/ /deng bdagis de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma mnyes par byas par 'gyur ro/ /deng bdagis 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas

bcom ldan 'das rnaMs la mchod pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang shing rgya che ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /deng bdagis sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal

thams cad shin tu rgyun bcad par 'gyur ro/ /deng bdag gis tshangs pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma 'thob pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /deng bdagis

brgya byin nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dus ma thob pa dag dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /deng bdag gi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma 'thob pa dag

gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /deng bdag gis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma 'khor ba las yongasu thar bar byas par 'gyur ro/ /deng bdag gis bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa

bla na med pa yangs shing rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab da yongasu bzung bar 'gyur/ deng bdagis btsun mo'i 'khor kyi tshogs thams cad la bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro/ /deng bdag gis rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir zhi ba dang

bde legasu 'gyur ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa mchog tu khyad par du 'phags pa bla na med pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /deng bdagis yul 'di thams cad kun du bsrungs par 'gyuro/ /yongasu bskyangs pa dang gnod pa med pa

dang dgra med pa dang pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad kyis mi rdzi ba dang nad 'go ba med pa dang 'khrug pa med par 'gyuro snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po dag dge slong ngam dge slong ma'am dge

snyen nam dge snyen ma gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dzin pa dag la mi'i rgyal po de dam pa'i chos la gus pa 'di lta bus bsti stang byed bla mar byed rim gro byed mchod pa byed cing / rgyal po chen po khyed

bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / lha'i tshogs de dag dang gnod sbyin brgya stong du ma dag la shas kyi dam pa byin na/ mi'i rgyal po de bsod nas mngon par 'du byed pa dang dge ba mngon par 'du byed pa de dang tshe 'di'i lugs kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po

phyug chen po bsaM gyis mi khyab pa des rnaMs par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe 'di la rgyal po'i gzi brjid chen po bsaM gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /dpal dang phun sum tshogs pa dang gzi brjid kyis kyang brgyan

par 'gyur ro/ /phyir rgol ba thams cad dang dgra thams cad chos dang 'thun pas shin tu tshar gcod par 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /

btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur la/ de chos la gus pa de lta bus gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyan la dge slong ngam dge slong ma'am dge snyen nam dge snyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po'i 'dzin pa de

dag la yang bsti stang bgyid bla mar bgyid rim gro bgyid mchod pa bgyid cing / rgyal po chen po bdag cag gis slad du rgyal po'i pho brang de shin tu dag par phyag dar bgyid/ spos chab sna tshogs kyi chag chag legs par 'debs la/ bdag cag

rgyal po chen po bzhi dang lhan cig thun mong du chos nyan pa de nyan cing bdag dang lha thams cad kyi slad du dge ba'i rtsa bar shas cung zad cig sbyin pa bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dge slong chos smra ba de chos kyi stan la mchis ma thag tu mi'i rgyal po

des bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi'i don gyi slad du spos sna tshogs kyis bdug par bgyi'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po de la mchod pa'i slad du bdug pas bdug ma thag tu spos sna tshogs rnam las

spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi khri shing dag byung bar gyur ste/ de dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la bdag cag rgyal po chen po bdag cag bzhi'i rang rang gi khang pa'i steng gi bar snang la spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi khri shing dag gi gdug

rnamasu gnas par 'gyur/ spos dri rgya chen po yang mnam par 'gyur/ gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang bar 'byung bar 'gyur zhing sna ba des bdag cag gi khang pa rnams kyang snang ba bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das spos dang

bdug pa sna tshogs kyi khri shing dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la mi 'jed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / lha mo chen mo dbyangs can dang lha mo chen mo brtan ma dang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang

dag shes dang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nor bu bzang dang 'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgya'i 'khor

dang ldan pa dang klu'i rgyal po chen po ma dros pa dang klu'i rgyal po chen po rgya mtsho dang de dag gis rang rang gi khang pa'i steng gi bar snang la byung ste spos dang gdug pa sna tshogs kyi khri shing gi gdugs rnamasu gnas par 'gyur/ spos dri sna

tshogs rgya chen po yang mnaM par 'gyur/ khang pa rnaMs kyi nang du gser du sna ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing snang ba des gnas thaMd snang bgyi par 'gyuro/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang bac+doMs kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di

skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po dag rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi'i rang gi khang pa rnaMs kyi steng gi bar sna la spos dang gdug pa sna tshogs kyi khri shing de dag gdugs rnaMsu gnas par ma zad do/ /de ci'i phyir
zhe na/ rgyal po chen po dag mi'i rgyal po des gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa'i phyir/ spos sna tshogs de dag gis bdugs ma thag tu lag na spos snod gcig thogs pa de las

spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi khri shing rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khaMs 'di thams cad na gang na zla ba bye ba phrag brgya dang nyi ma bye ba phrag

brgya dang / rgya mtsho chen po bye ba phrag rgya dang ri'i rgyal po ri rab bye ba phrag rgya dang ri'i rgyal po 'khor yug dang 'khor yug chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag rgya dang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris

kyi lha bye ba phrag brgya dang sum bcu rtsa gsum bye ba phrag brgya nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min du nye bar song ba'i bar gyi lha bye ba phrag brgya dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khaMs de dag thams cad du sum

bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris bye ba phrag brgya po thams cad na lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang naMkha' lding dang mi'aM ci dang lto phye chen po'i tshogs rnaMs kyi rang rang gi kha~M pa dag gi steng gi bar snang la spos dang bdug pa sna

tshogs kyi 'khri shing de dag gdugs rnamasu gnas par 'gyur/ spos dri rgya chen po yang mnam par 'gyur/ lha'i khang pa rnamasu gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba yang 'byung bar 'gyur zhing snang ba des kyang

lha'i khang pa rnams snang ba byas par 'gyuro/ /rgyal po chen po dag 'di ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na lha'i khang pa thams cad kyi steng gi bar snang la spos dang bdug pa'i 'khri shing de dag

gdugs rnaMsu gnas pa de bzhin du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa'i phyir mi'i rgyal po des spos sna tshogs de dag gis bdugs ma thag tu gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i

rgyal po 'di'i gzi brjid kyi mthu spos dang bdugs pa sna tshogs kyi khri shing dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la kun tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khaMs du ma gang gA'i klung gi bye ma

snyed dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong rnaMsu/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi steng gi bar snang la spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing gis

bdugs rnaMsu gnas par 'gyur/ de dag kyang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma la spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs rgya che zhing rgya che ba mnam par 'gyur/ gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing sna ba des

kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag du ma gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag snang ba byas par 'gyuro/ /rgyal po chen po dag chos 'phrul de lta bu de dag byung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag du ma gang

gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag chos smra ba de la dgongs par 'gyur skyes bu daM pa legs so legaso/ /skyes bu daM pa khyod gser 'od daM pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po tshul 'di lta bu zab mor snang ba 'di lta bu yon tan bsaM gyi mi khyab pa dang ldan pa

dang 'di lta bu 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chad par 'dod pa khyod yang legaso legaso zhes bya ba'i sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /su tha na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa'i sems can de dag kyang

dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan par mi 'gyur na/ gang dag 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang 'chad pa dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang 'khor la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skyes bu

dam pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di thos ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /'phags

pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po gsum pa/ de nas phyogs bcu kun tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag

na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na bzhugs pa dag gis de'i tshe de'i du na tshig cig dang ngag cig dang sgra skad gcig gis dge slong chos smra ba chos kyi stan la 'dug

pa de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /skyes bu dam pa khyod ma 'ongs pa'i du na byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur/ skyes bu daM pa khyod byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par song ste/ shing gi rgyal po'i drung du 'dug nas 'jig rten
