bu sa Te/ na ra kan+te/ kA mi Ni/ kam+bu/ da ra ki ru ru ta ra/ ba ra Ni/ pra kr-i ti/ dA~MSh+Te/ mi li ta le/ hi ti hA se/ a ba le tu ba le/ pi la~M ke/ baT+Ti baT+Ti ti ke/ a Dan+hu be/ ba Ti tum+me/ phyogs bcu kun du lhas char phob shig /bcom ldan 'das la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /sa la dga' bas chu dbab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo/ /i ri dza ye/ go do hi kA ye/ b+h+ring+ga ri kA ye/ a ru tsi/ na ru tsi/ naT+Te/ badzre badzre naT+Te/ u da ya na/ pri ye/ a le ta le/ ku la tA le/ nA rA

ya Ni/ pA rA ya Ni/ pa sh+ya ni/ spaR+sha ni/ 'gro lding ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams grub par gyur cig /swA hA/ ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ngas bstan cing rjes su yi rang nas dge slong kun dga' bos dge slong sa ri
la bde legs su 'gyur bar byas pa de bzhin du bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig /sba ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur
ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug bsad pa dang / mtshams bcad pa dang / sa bcing ba gyis shig /lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig /

ston brgya mthong bar shog shig /kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' byams pas bshad cing rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /tad ya thA/ shi ri shi ri shi ri/ b+ha dre/ dz+yo ti dz+yo ti/ dz+yo ti b+ha dre/ ha re ha re ha re/

ha ri ni/ dan+te sha ba re shi be/ shU la pA Ni ni bo d+hi bo d+hi/ bo d+hi bo d+hi bo d+hi/ sa twe bo d+hi/ pa ri tsA ra ni ye swA hA/ kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas smras shing rjesu yi rang ba'o/ /tad ya thA/

hi li hi li/ mi li mi li mi li ni/ tsa~M ka ri/ ki ri ki ri ki ri ki ri ki ri ki ri yi/ brah+mA rat+na/ ka raN+Da ke/ be Do hu phus+sa/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ha ra ha ra/ phu ru phu ru phu ru phu ru phu ru phu ru swAhA/ dug bcoM mo/ /dug nges par bcoM mo/ /sang+yas kyi gzi brjid kyis dug

nges par bcoM mo/ /rang sang+yas kyi bzi brjid kyis dug bcoM mo/ /dgra bcoM pa'i gzi brjid kyis dug bco~M mo/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i gzi brjid kyi dug bco~M mo/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i gzi brjid kyi dug bcoM mo/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i gzi brjid

kyi dug bcoM mo/ /bden par smras ba'i gzi rjid kyis dug bcoM mo/ /tshangs pa'i me dbal gyi gzi brjid kyis dug bcoM mo/ /dbang po rdo rje'i gzi brjid kyis dug bcoM mo/ /khyab 'jug gi 'khor los dug bcoM mo/ /gshin rje'i be bcon gyi dug

bcoM mo/ /chu lha'i zhags pas dug bcoM mo/ /lha ma yin gyi sgyus dug bcoM mo/ /klu'i rig sngags kyi dug bcoM mo/ /drag po'i mdung tses dug bcoM mo/ /skem byed kyi mdung thung gis dug bcoM mo/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen

mos dug bcom mo/ /dug nges par bcoM mo/ /dug sa'i nang du song shig /bdag dug thams cad dang / be'u lta bu'i dug dang / ha la ha la'i dug dang / nag po brtseg pa'i dug dang / mche ba'i dug dang / rtsa ba'i dug dang / kha zas kyi dug dang /

phye ma'i dug dang / lta ba'i dug dang / glog gi dug dang / sprin gyi dug dang / sbrul dang / byi ba dang / srin bu ki ta dang / lu ta dang / ka na b+ha dang / sbal pa dang / sbrang bu dang / bung ba dang / ba ta ri dang / tre ma bu ga dang / tre la ta'i dug dang /

mi'i dug dang / sdig pa'i dug dang / mi ma yin pa'i dug dang / dogs pa'i dug dang / sman pa'i dug dang / rig sngags kyi dug las bde legs su gyur cig /dug thams cad las bdag bde legs su gyur cig /kun dga' bo rig

sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni lha rnams kyi dbang po rgya byin gyis smras shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /tad ya thA/ dza lA/ dzan+tu le mA lA/ dzan+tu le/ tsa pe Ti/ dzan+tu le/ ma tha ni/ g+ha ta ni/ gra sa ni/ ha ri shi ri hu ti shi ri/ ta ru ta ru Na ba ti/

ha ha ha ha ha/ sing he/ d+hi ti d+hi ti/ ku ru ku ru/ ba sa re badzre/ tu Ta tu Ta si/ ba Ta ba Ta si/ si li si li/ ka pi li/ ka pi li/ mU le/ hA hI hU/ sdang ba dang / rab tu sdang ba thams cad rab tu rmugs par bya'o/ /lags pa dang / rkang pa dang / yan lag

dang / nying lag dang / sum bcu pa'i lha dang bcas te chad pas bcad par bya'o/ /uSh+Ti gi ni/ su ra pa te/ brti/ badzra badzra badzra badzra badzra pa ta ye swA hA/ kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni rgyal po chen po bzhis smras shing rjes su

yi rang ba'o/ /tad ya thA/ dz+wa la dz+wa la Na/ ta pa ta pa na/ d+ha ma d+ha ma na/ sa ra sa ra Na/ ku Ti ku Ti/ mu Ti mu Ti/ mi Ti mi Ti/ sa ra sa ra/ ma ra ma ra/ ha ra ha ra/ ta ra ta ra/ ti ri ti ri/ Ta Ta Ta Ta Ta/ dA dA dA dA dA/ bA bA bA bA bA/ ha la ha la ha la ha la ha la/ sid+hi/ sid+hi/

sid+hi/ sid+hi/ sid+hi/ swasti/ swasti/ swasti/ swasti/ swasti/ sbod gtong dang / gshin brje'i pho nya dang / mtshan mo nag mo dang / dus kyi zhags pa dang / 'chi bdag gi chad pa dang / tshangs pa'i chad pa dang / dbang po'i chad pa dang / drang srong gi chad pa dang /

lha'i chad pa dang / klu'i chad pa dang / lha ma yin gyi chad pa dang / rlung lha'i chad pa dang / nam mkha' lding gi chad pa dang / dri za'i chad pa dang / mi 'am ci'i chad pa dang / lto phye chen po'i chad pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi chad pa dang / srin po'i chad pa dang /

yi dgas kyi chad pa dang / sha za'i chad pa dang / 'byung po'i chad pa dang / grul bum gyi chad pa dang / srul po'i chad pa dang / lus srul po'i chad pa dang / skem byed kyi chad pa dang / smyo byed kyi chad pa dang / grib gnon kyi chad pa dang / brjed byed

kyi chad pa dang / gnon po'i chad pa dang / ro langs kyi chad pa dang / rgyal po'i chad pa dang / chom rkun gyi chad pa dang / me'i chad pa dang / chu'i chad pa dang / chad pa thams cad las bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig /lo brgya 'tsho bar

gyur cig /ston brgya mthong bar shog shig /kun dga' bo khyod kyis klu~M gi rgyal po rnams kyi ming zung shig /'di lta ste/ klung gi rgyal po gang gA dang / klung gi rgyal po sid d+hu dang / klung gi rgyal po pak+Shu dang / klung gi rgyal po sI ta dang /

klung gi rgyal po mda' 'byung dang / klung gi rgyal po khyim ldan dang / klung gi rgyal po gshin rje sel dang / klung gi rgyal po gya gyu dang / klung gi rgyal po rgyas 'bab dang / klung gi rgyal po zhag bral dang / klung gi rgyal po zhi ba 'dzin dang / klung gi

rgyal po sa ldan dang / klung gi rgyal po zla ba'i cha dang / klung gi rgyal po dbyangs can dang / klung gi rgyal po ru sbal can dang / klung gi rgyal po chu dron can dang / klung gi rgyal po chu mchog can dang / klung gi rgyal po zang 'dab dang / klung gi rgyal po sbrang rtsi can

dang / klung gi rgyal po spa ldan dang / klung gi rgyal po bu ram shing ldan dang / klung gi rgyal po ba glang ldan dang / klung gi rgyal po 'phags pa can dang / klung gi rgyal po rtse sbyin dang / klung gi rgyal po mdza' bzang dang / klung gi rgyal po kun gyi bshes

dang / klung gi rgyal po 'chi med dang / klung gi rgyal po me tog pad ma dang / klung gi rgyal po rnga len dang / klung gi rgyal po dngos bzang dang / klung gi rgyal po rab bzang dang / klung gi rgyal po dka' thub sbyin dang / klung gi rgyal po dri bral dang / klung

gi rgyal po skyon bral dang / klung gi rgyal po klung chen dang / klung gi rgyal po gser ldan dang / klung gi rgyal po ba lang sbyin mchog can dang / klung gi rgyal po gsang srung dang / klung gi rgyal po ba lang can dang / de dag dang / gzhan yang gang dag sa'i
dkyil 'khor 'dir 'bab pa'i chu klung de dag thams cad la gang dag rgyun du gnas pa/ gzugs tha dad pa/ gzugs mi sdug pa/ gzugs mang ba/ gzugs mtha' yas pa/ 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can/ gzugs sna

tshogs pa'i lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / rlung lha rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / dri za rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / srin po rnams dang /

yi dgas rnams dang / sha za rnams dang / 'byung po rnams dang / grul bum rnams dang / srul po rnams dang / lus srul po rnams dang / skem byed rnams dang / smyo byed rnams dang / grib gnon rnams dang / brjed byed rnams dang /

gnon po rnams dang / zas su mdangs za ba rnams dang / zas su mngal za ba rnams dang / zas su khrag 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su sha za ba rnams dang / zas su tshil za ba rnams dang / zas su zhag za ba rnams dang / zas

su rkang za ba rnams dang / zas su btsas pa za ba rnams dang / zas su srog 'phrog pa rnams dang / zas su gtor ma za ba rnams dang / zas su phreng ba za ba rnams dang / zas su 'bras bu za ba rnams dang / zas su me tog za ba rnaMs

dang / zas su dri za ba rnams dang / zas su gdug pa za ba rnams dang / zas su lo tog za ba rnams dang / zas su sbyin sreg za ba rnams dang / zas su rnag 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su phyi sa za ba rnams dang / zas su gcin 'thung

ba rnams dang / zas su mchil ma za ba rnams dang / zas su ngar snabs za ba rnams dang / zas su snabs za ba rnams dang / zas su lhag ma za ba rnams dang / zas su skyugs pa za ba rnams dang / zas su mi gtsang ba za ba rnaMs

dang / zas su gtor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba de dag gis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig /lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig /ston brgya mthong bar shog shig /kun dga' bo khyod kyis

ri'-i rgyal po rnams kyi ming zung shig /'di lta ste/ ri'-i rgyal po ri rab dang / ri'i rgyal po gangs can dang / ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldan dang / ri'i rgyal po rtse brgya pa dang / ri'i rgyal po seng ldeng can dang / ri'i rgyal po gser logs

dang / ri'i rgyal po 'od 'dzin dang / ri'i rgyal po mu khyud 'dzin dang / ri'i rgyal po khor yug dang / ri'i rgyal po khor yug chen po dang / ri'i rgyal po dbang po'i brag dang / ri'i rgyal po tshangs pa ldan dang / ri'i rgyal po dpal

ldan dang / ri'i rgyal po blta na sdug dang / ri'i rgyal po shin du rgyas dang / ri'i rgyal po rin chen 'byung gnas dang / ri'i rgyal po srin bu can dang / ri'i rgyal po nor bu rdza dang / ri'i rgyal po thags bzang ris dang / ri'i rgyal po rdo rje

'byung gnas dang / ri'-i rgyal po 'gram pa ldan dang / ri'i rgyal po lha min 'bab dang / ri'i rgyal po glog 'od dang / ri'i rgyal po khyab gnas dang / ri'i rgyal po zla 'od dang / ri'i rgyal po brag bzang dang / ri'i rgyal po nyi ma mdzes dang / ri'i rgyal po

thigs pa dang / ri'i rgyal po 'bigs byed dang / ri'i rgyal po zla ba'i brag dang / ri'i rgyal po sna tshogs brtsegs dang / ri'i rgyal po ma la ya dang / ri'i rgyal po gser gyi rtse mo dang / ri'i rgyal po kun nas 'gro dang / ri'i rgyal po lag bzang dang /

ri'i rgyal po nor bu ldan dang / ri'i rgyal po sde bzang dang / ri'i rgyal po tshangs pa'i mchu dang / ri'i rgyal po rig byed srung dang / ri'i rgyal po ba lang rno dang / ri'i rgyal po sna tshogs phreng dang / ri'i rgyal po mi 'jigs sna tshogs dang / ri'i rgyal po ral

gri dang / ri'i rgyal po gdung ba dang / ri'i rgyal po mig bsku dang / ri'-i rgyal po mu dza dang / ri'i rgyal po ri dgas can dang / ri'i rgyal po 'joms byed dang / ri'i rgyal po ti se dang / ri'i rgyal po mi mjed dang / ri'i rgyal po nye dkar dang / ri'i rgyal po tsan dan

phreng dang / ri'i rgyal po stobs 'dzin dang / ri'i rgyal po dbang chen dang / ri'i rgyal po dus 'bri byed dang / ri'i rgyal po skem byed dang / ri'i rgyal po ba lang srung dang / ri'i rgyal po bya rog sgra dang / ri'i rgyal po bstan pa 'dzin dang / sa'i dkyil

'khor 'dis ni ri'i rgyal po 'di dag dang / bzhan dag kyang yod pa de la lha rnams dang / klu rnaMs dang / lha ma yin rnaMs dang / rlung lha rnams dang / naM mkha' lding rnaMs dang / dri za rnams dang / mi 'aM ci rnaMs dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams dang / gnod sbyin

rnams dang / srin po rnams dang / yi dgas rnaMs dang / sha za rnaMs dang / 'byung po rnams dang / grul bum rnams dang / srul po rnaMs dang / lus srul po rnaMs dang / skem byed rnam dang / smyo byed rnams dang / grib gnon rnaMs dang / brjed byed rnaMs

dang / gnon po rnams dang / rig sngags 'chang grub pa rnams dang / rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa gang dag rgyun tu gnas pa de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig /lo rgya

'tsho bar gyur cig /ston brgya mthong bar shog shig /sdig pa thams cad sol cig /dge ba rnaMs snang bar gyur cig /mi dge ba sol cig /don rnaMs la snang bar gyis shig /gnod pa rnaMs sol cig /mtshan mo bde

legs nyin bde legs/ /nyi ma'i gung gi bde legs dang / /nyin mtshan kun gyi bde legs dag /sangs rgyas kun gyis bdag la stsol swA hA/ kun dga' bo khyod kyi rgyu skar gang dag naM mkha' la rgyu zhing snang bar byed pa rnaMs

kyi ming zung shig /'di lta ste/ smin drug dang ni snar ma dang / /mgo dang lag dang nam so dang / /rgyal ni bkra shis phun sum tshogs/ /de bzhin skag ste bdun po yin/ /de ltar rgyu skar bdun po 'di dag ni shar gyi sgo na gnas

pa dag ste/ gang dag shar phyog srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa dag go/ de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig /lo rgya 'tsho bar gyur cig /ston rgya mthong bar shog shig /mchu ni

mi 'dza' 'joms pa dang / /de bzhin gre dang dbo gnyis dang / /me bzhi nag pa sa ri dang / /sa ga ste ni bdun pa yin/ /de ltar rgyu skar bdun po 'di dag ni/ lho phyogs kyi sgo na gnas pa dag ste/ gang dag lho phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed

pa dag go/ de dag gi kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di bdag la srung ba gyis shig lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig /ston rgya mthong bar shog shig /lha 'tsham gzi rjid chen mo dang / /de bzhin snron dang snrums dang ni/ /chu stod dang ni chu smad dang / /

de ltar byi zhin gro zhin no/ /de ltar rgyu skar bdun po 'di dag ni nub phyogs kyi sgo na gnas pa dag ste/ gang dag nub phyogs bsrung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa dag go/ de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis

bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig lo brgya tsho bar gyur cig /ston brgya mthong bar shog shig /mon gru dang ni mon gre dang / /de bzhin khrums stod khrums smad dang / /nam gru dang ni tha skar dang / /bra nye ste ni bdun pa yin/ /de ltar rgyu skar bdun po 'di dag ni byang phyogs

na gnas pa dag ste/ gang dag byang phyogs bsrung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa dag go/ de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig /ston brgya mthong bar shog shig /kun

dga' bo khyod kyis gza' gang dag rgyu skar rnaMs kyi khrod na rgyu zhing 'grib pa dang / 'phel ba dang bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / lo legs pa dang / lo nyes pa dag kyang ston pa rnams kyi ming zung shig /'di lta ste/ gza' nyi ma dang / gza' zla ba

dang / gza' phur bu dang / gza' ba ba sangs dang / gza' spen pa dang / gza' mig dmar dang / gza' gza' lhag dang / gza' lha min dbang po sgra gcan dang / gza' du ba 'jug rings so/ /rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad ni/ /de ltar phyogs na bdun

bdun no/ /skar ma gza' bdun de bzhin te/ /rdzu 'phrul che zhing dka' thub che/ /nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang / /sum bcu tsa bdun tshang ba dag /'char ba dang ni nub pa na/ /'khor lo mtshon cha bzhin du rgyu/ /'jig rten du ni zad 'phel byed/ /gzi che rdzu 'phru

la chen po dag /rab tu dang ba'i seMs kyis su/ /rigs sngags rjes su yi rang byos/ /de dag gis kyang rigs sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig /lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig /ston brgya mthong bar shog shig /kun dga' bo

drang srong rnying pa brtul zhugs grub pa/ rig sngags grub pa/ grags pa 'bar ba/ klung dang ri la gnas pa/ dmod pa'i mtshon cha can/ dka' thub grags pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba de dag gi

ming brjod kyis khyod kyis zung shig /'di lta ste/ drang srong chen po brgyad pa zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po g.yon phyogs pa zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po g.yon phyogs lha zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po lha skyabs kyi bu zhes bya ba dang / drang

srong chen po 'od zer can zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po kun gyi bshes zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gnas 'jog ces bya ba dang / drang srong chen po grog mkhar ba zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'brog skyong gi bu zhes bya ba dang /

drang srong chen po 'drob skyong gi bu rgan po zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po ngan spong zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po ngan spong dga' zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'gro 'dzin ces bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'gro dga' zhes bya ba dang /

drang srong chen po 'jigs can zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po skal ldan shing rta zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po rgyun shes kyi bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po mdun du bdar zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po mgo bo che zhes bya ba dang / drang

srong chen po gshin rje'i me zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gnyis 'thung gi bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gnyis 'thung nag po'i bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po ljang sngo'i bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po ljang sngo'i tsha bo zhes bya

ba dang / drang srong chen po ngag mnyam zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'phags po zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po yang dag 'phags po zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po bzod pa smra zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po grags pa zhes bya ba dang /

drang srong chen po rab grags zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po bla ma zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po grub pa zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gru 'dzin ces bya ba dang / drang srong chen po rta bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gang can zhes bya ba dang /

drang srong chen po mig dmar zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po cha byad 'dzin zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gos ngan zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po mda' ltar snang ba zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po rgyags pa zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'od

ces bya ba dang / drang srong chen po pa ba sangs shes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po phur bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po rtsibs kyi mu khyud ces bya ba dang / drang srong chen po spen pa zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gza' lhag

ces bya ba dang / drang srong chen po dug sel zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po sa 'dzin zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po rwa gcig pa zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po drang srong ra zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gyur mid kyi bu zhes

bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gar ldan gyi bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po sgra'i bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'jigs byed ces bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'jigs byed glang po zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po ser skya zhes bya

ba dang / drang srong chen po gau ta ma zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po rta dmar zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po byis pa rtse zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po mis byin gyi bu bya ba dang / drang srong chen po ri bo zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po srin

bu 'dzin ces bya ba ste/ kun dga' bo drang srong chen po rnying pa 'di dag ni rig byed rnaMs byed pa/ gsang sngags rnams byed pa/ dmod pa 'dor ba/ brtul zhugs grub pa/ gzi brjid che ba grub pa/ pha rol gnon pa

grub pa dag ste/ de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di bdag la srung ba gyis shig /lo rgya tsho bar gyur cig /ston rgya thong bar shog shig /tad ya thA/ hi ri/ hi ri/ khi ri/ khi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ phu ri phu ri/ su ri su ri/ hi li hi li/ mi li

mi li/ si ri si ri/ Dab+phu/ Da Dab+phu/ gra sa ni/ ma tha ni/ da ma ni/ da ha ni/ g+hA ta ni/ pa tsa ni/ pa tsa ni/ ta pa ni/ tA pa ni/ ha na ni/ da ha ni/ dA ha ni/ da hA da hA/ da hA/ da la da la dA la ni/ pA Ta ni mo ha ni/ stam+b+ha ni/ dzam+b+ha ni/ swa yam+b+hu swA hA/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis skye dgu'i bdag

po chen po gang dag lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / rlung lha rnaMs dang / lha ma yin rnaMs dang / nam lding rnaMs dang / dri za rnaMs dang / mi 'aM ci rnaMs dang / lto phye chen po rnaMs dang / gnon sbyin rnaMs dang / srin po rnaMs dang / mi dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang /

seMn dmyal ba rnaMs kyi dge ba dang / mi dge ba la sogs pa'i dge ba'i khyad par grangs med pa dag gis 'jig rten gsum du rnaM par gzhag pa rnaMs kyi mi zung shig 'di lta ste/ skye dgu'i bdag po tshangs pa dang skye dgu'i bdag po bu can dang / skye

dgu'i bdag po za tshul gyi bu dang / skye dgu'i bdag po me dang / skye dgu'i bdag po gso ba dang / skye dgu'i bdag po mdun du bdar dang / skye dgu'i bdag po spu zing sel dang / skye dgu'i bdag po go byed dang / skye dgu'i bdag po mdzes gnas dang / skye

dgu'i bdag po zin po dang skye dgu'i bdag po lus mdzes dang / skye dgu'i bdag po rab dga' dang skye dgu'i bdag po mkhas pa dang / skye dgu'i bdag po gus yod de/ kun dga'o skye dgu'i bdag po bdag nyid chen po 'di dag ni gnas pa dang / 'gro ba'i 'byung po'i tshogs

srung ba'i phyir gnas pa dag go/ de dag gis kyang rig sngag kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig /lo rgya tsho bar gyur cig ston brgya thong bar shog shig /thogs pa med pa'i gsang sngags 'di dag gis kyang bsrung ba gyis shig /tad ya thA/ hi ri hi ri/

khi ri/ khi ri/ mi ri mi ri/ phu ri phu ri/ su ri su ri/ hi li hi li/ mi li mi li/ si ri si ri/ Dab+phu/ Da Dab+phu/ Dab+phu/ gra sa ni ma tha ni/ da ma ni/ da ha ni/ g+hA ta ni/ pa ca ni/ pA tsa ni/ ta pa ni/ tA pa ni/ ha na ni/ da ha ni/ dA ha ni/ da ha da ha da ha/ da la da la dA la ni pA Ta ni mo ha ni/ stam+b+ha ni/ dzam+b+ha ni swA hA/ kun

dga' bo khyod kyi dug chen po rnam kyi ming zung shig tad ya thA aN+Da rA paN+Da rA/ ka ra DA ke yU rA/ b+hU ta~M ga mA/ b+hu ta pa te/ bin+du pa ti/ si ri pa ti/ te dza pa ti/ te dzo gra pa te/ ya sho ba te/ ya sho gra ba te/ a ra DA/ ta ra DA/ ta ra ta ra DA/ dan+tA/ dza hA dzo hA/ dza lA/ mi lA ha lA pha lA/

gu hA/ ru tsi rA/ dan du rA/ i ri ki tsi kA/ kam+bA/ sha ta dan+du rA be pu le/ na ku le/ ki ri pi/ ta ra~M g+da r-i Sh+Ta/ a mra ma te dzAm b+'u ma ti/ ma d+hu ma ti/ ka ma li/ bi ma le kun+Da le/ a hi/ tu hi/ du he/ bag+ka bag+ka dU de bad sa nA b+he/ ma hA ga re/ tu lam+be lam+ba/ su lam+be/ swA hA/ kun dga' bo 'di

dag ni dug chen po dag ste/ de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig /sba ba dang / yongs su skyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang

bde legasu 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug gsad pa dang / mtshams bcad pa dang / sa cing ba gyis shig /lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig /ston brgya mthong bar shog shig /kun

dga' bo khyod kyis shing ljon pa rnaMs kyi ming zung shig /'di lta ste/ shing ljon pa chen po gser zhes bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po ser skya zhes bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po khyab gnas zhes bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po spre'u gnas

zhes bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po pad ma dkar po zhes bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po ser po zhes bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po mya ngan tshangs zhes bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po rna ldan ces bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po rgyas byed ces

bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po bil ba zhes bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po ts+'u ta zhes bya ba dang / shing ljon pa chen po de dag dang gzhan dag la lha gang dag gnas pa de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di bdag la bsrung ba

gyis shig /lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig /ston brgya mthong bar shog shig /kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun gyis gsungs shing rjesu yi rang ba ste/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnaM par gzigs kyis gsungs shing rjesu yi rang ba'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sang+yas gtsug tor can gyis gsungs shing rjesu yi rang ba'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thaMd skyob kyis gsungs shing rjesu yi

rang ba'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sang+yas 'khor ba 'jig gis gsungs shing rjesu yi rang ba'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sang+yas gser thub kyis gsungs shing rjesu yi rang ba'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis gsungs shing

rjesu yi rang ba'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ngas kyang da ltar bstan cing rjesu yi rang ba'o/ /kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni byang chub seMs dpa' byaMs pas kyang bshad cing rjesu yi rang ba'o/ /mi 'jed kyi bdag po

tshangs pas kyang smas shing rjesu yi rang ba'o/ /lha rnaMs kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang smras shing rjesu yi rang ba'o/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis kyang smras shing rjesu yi rang ba ste/ dri za'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung gis kyang smras shing rjesu yi

rang ba'o/ /grul bum gyi bdag po 'phags skyes pos kyang smras shing rjesu yid rang ba'o/ /klu'i rgyal po mig mi bzang gis kyang smras shing rjesu yid rang ba'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bus kyang smras shing rjesu yi rang ba'o/ /dri za'i sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dag dang / grul buM gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad

dag dang / klu'i sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dag dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dag dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lngas rtsen dang / 'phrog ma bu lnga brgya'i 'khor can gyis kyang smras shing rjesu yi rang ba'o/ /kun dga' bo rig

sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni lha'i gdon dang / klu'i gdon dang / rlung lha'i gdon dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon dang / naMkha' lding gi gdon dang / dri za'i gdon dang / mi 'aM ci'i gdon dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gdon dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon

dang / srin po'i gdon dang / yi dgas kyi gdon dang / sha za'i gdon dang / 'byung po'i gdon dang / grul buM gyi gdon dang / srul po'i gdon dang / lus srul po'i gdon dang / skeM byed kyi gdon dang / smyo byed kyi gdon dang / grib gnon gyi gdon dang /

brjed byed kyi gdon dang / gnon po'i gdon gyis 'gal bar bya ba ma yin no/ /gdon thaMd kyis 'gal bar bya ba ma yin pa'o/ /mdangs 'phrogs pa rnaMs dang / zasu mngal za ba rnaMs dang / srog 'phrog pa rnaM dang / zasu gtor ma za ba rnaM

dang / zasu sha za ba rnaMs dang / zasu khrag 'thung ba rnaMs dang / zasu zhag za ba rnaMs dang / zasu tshil za ba rnaMs dang / zasu rkang za ba rnaMs dang / zasu btsas pa za ba rnaMs dang / zasu dri za ba rnaMs dang / zasu me tog za ba rnaMs dang / zasu 'bras bu za ba rnaMs

dang / zasu lo tog za ba rnaMs dang / zasu sbyin sreg za ba rnaMs dang / zasu rnag 'thung ba rnaMs dang / zasu phyi sa za ba rnaMs dang / zasu gcin 'thung ba rnaMs dang / zasu mchil ma za ba rnaMs dang / zasu ngar snab za ba rnaMs dang / zasu snab za ba rnaMs dang /

zasu lhag ma za ba rnams dang / zasu skyug pa za ba rnams dang / zasu mi gtsang ba za ba rnams dang / zasu gtor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba rnams kyis 'gal bar bya ba ma yin no/ /gshed byed dang / bsgyur ba'i las dang byad dang / g.yeng

byed dang / ro langs dang / sems sgyur ba dang / sbod stor dang / bza' nyes dang / skyug nyes dang / gnod sgrib dang / gnod bltas dang / bri nyes dang / bsgom nyes dang / gnod pa rnaMs kyis 'gal bar bya ba ma yin pa'o/ /rims nyin cig pa dang / nyin gnyis

pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa dang / nyin bdun pa dang / zla ba phyed pa dang / zla ba gcig pa dang / nyi ma phyed pa dang / nyin mo pa dang / yud tsam pa dang / rtag pa'i rims dang / rams drag po dang / 'byung po'i rims dang / rlung las gyur pa dang /

mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / 'dus pa las gyur pas 'gal bar bya ba ma yin pa'o/ /rims thams cad kyis 'gal bar bya ba ma yin pa'o/ /glad pa na ba dang / gzhogs phyed na ba dang / yi ga 'chis pa dang /

mig nad dang / sna nad dang / kha nad dang / mgul nad dang / snying nad dang / lkog ma'i lha gor na ba dang / rna ba na ba dang / so na ba dang / snying na ba dang / rtsib logs na ba dang / rgyab na ba dang / lto na ba dang / mkhur ba na ba dang / chu so na ba dang / skye gnas na ba dang / rab tu

rked pa na ba dang / brla na ba dang / byin pa na ba dang / lag pa na ba dang / rkang pa na ba dang / yan lag na ba dang / nying lag na bas 'gal bar bya ba ma yin no/ /shu ba dang / g.ya' ba dang / 'brum bu phra mo dang / mdze dang / 'bras dang / phol mig dang / g.yan pa dang / me

dbal dang / lhog pa rnaMs kyis 'gal bar bya ba ma yin pa'o/ /nad thaMd dang / dug thaMd dang / sdang ba thaMd dang / 'jigs pa thaMd dang / yams kyi nad thaMd dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa thaMd dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa thaMd kyis 'gal bar bya ba

ma yin pa'o/ /kun dga' bo gang gis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di las 'gal bar byas na lag na rdo rjes de'i mgo bo tshal pa bdun du 'gems par 'gyuro/ /ro/ /sangs rgyas dang / byang chub seMs dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos thaMd kyi gzi

brjid kyis de'i snang ba ma rung bar 'gyuro/ /seMs ma rung bar 'gyuro/ /'phags pa'i gang zag rnaMs bslus par 'gyuro/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis kyang gshur zhes bya ba la thug gi bar gyi gsang sngags rnaMs kyis de la sdug bsngal

chen po byed par 'gyuro/ /lha rnaMs kyi dbang po rgya byin yang suM bcu rtsa gsuM pa'i tshogs kyis bskor te/ rdo rjes de'i mgo 'geMs par 'gyuro/ /tshangs pa'i gzi brjid kyis kyang de'i 'byor pa thal bar rlog par 'gyuro/ /kun dga' bo su

zhig gis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bsrung ba byas saM/ skud pa btags na des bsrung ba'i pa'i rig pa ni chad pas bral bar 'gyuro/ /chad pas bcad pa'i rigs pa ni gzhu gtsog pas so/ /gzhu gtsog pa'i rigs

pa ni spyo bas so/ /spyo ba'i rigs pa ni dam bca' bas so/ /dam bca' ba'i rigs pa ni spu zing zhes bya bas so/ /spu zing zhes bya ba'i rigs pa ni de bzhin du thar bar 'gyuro/ /de la rgyal po'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ chom rkun gyi

'jigs pa mi 'byung / me'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo / /chus 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyuro/ /de'i lus la dugis mi tshugs te/ mtshon gyis kyang ma yin no/ /bde bar gnyid kyis log cing bde bar sad par 'gyur ro/ /bde ba dang / gnod pa med pa dang /

'jigs pa med par 'gyuro/ /phyir rgol ba bcom pa dang / dgra choms par 'gyuro/ /rmas pa med par 'gyuro/ /'jigs pa thaMd las thar bar 'gyuro/ /bde bar yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur te/ kun dga' bo sngon gyi las kyi rnaM par smis pa ni ma gtogs so/ /

kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni ha cang char che ba'aM/ char dkon pa'i tshe bklag par bya'o/ /des ni klu thaMd spro bar 'gyur te/ char chen po ni gcod par byed/ char dkon pa'i tshe ni rigs kyi bu'aM/ 'aM/ rig kyi bu mo de'i bsaM pa ci srid par char 'bebs

par 'gyuro/ /kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di dran pas kyang 'jigs pa dang dgra thaMd zhi bar 'gyur na su dum bur ma gyur cing rdzogs par 'chang ba'aM/ bde legasu 'gyur ba byas pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ kun dga'o khyod kyi rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di zung shig /

'khor bzhi po dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge snyen dang / dge snyen ma rnams bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i phyir rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo dgra thaMd rab tu zhi bar byed pa 'di kun chub par gyis shig chongs shig lhogs shig tad ya thA yA ba ti/

d+hA ba ti/ d+ha ra ki la hu lu hu lu me swA hA/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnaMs/ /de dag 'jig rten dug gsuM te/ /sang+yas bac+doMn dug med pa/ /sang+yas bden pas dug bcoM mo/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnaMs/ /de dag 'jig rten dug gsuM ste/ /bac+doMn chos ni dug med pa/ /chos

kyi bden pas dug bcoM mo/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnaMs/ /de dag 'jig rten dug gsuM ste/ /bac+doMn dge 'dun dug med pa/ /dge 'dun bden pas dug bcoM mo/ /sang+yas kun gyi stobs gang dang / /dgra bcom rnaMs kyi grags ga~Mng dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzi brjid kyis/ /

nges ni bde legs 'gyur bar byas/ /kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mos dug bcoM mo/ /dge slong sa ri bde legasu gyur cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bac+doMs la legaso zhes gsol te/ bac+doMs kyi ltar mnyan nas bac+doMs kyi

zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsuM bskor ba byas nas dge slong sa ri ga la ba der song te phyin pa dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis dge slong sa ri la chad pa spang bar byas te/ yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu bzung ba dang / yongs

su skyang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legasu 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug gsad pa dang / mtshams bcad pa dang / sa bcing ba byas ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bsrung ba dang / bde legasu 'gyur

ba byas pas tshe dang ldan pa dge slong sa ri nad de las sos so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa dge slong sa ri bac+doMs ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bac+doMs kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te ci ltar gyur pa thaMd

bac+doMs la gsol nas/ bac+doMs kyis gnang ste phyogs cig tu 'khod do/ /de nas bac+doMs kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di'i mthu mthong ngam/ kun dga' bos bac+doMs

de bzhin du gsung ba de la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du ma 'tshal/ bac+doMs kyis yang bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo 'di ltar rgya mtsho chen po bzhi ni skaMm yang srid/ sa ni naMkha' la 'phags

kyang srid/ zla ba dang nyi ma ni sa la lhung yang srid/ klung ni rgyun las ldog kyang srid kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' ni gzhan du 'gyur mi srid do/ /de nas bac+doMs kyis tshe dang ldan kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de lta bas na rigs

sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di la 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge snyen dang / dge snyen ma rnaMs mos par gyi shig tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bac+doMs la legaso zhes bya ba gsol te/ bac+doMs kyi ltar mnyanas

'khor bzhi po dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnaMs rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di la mos par byaso/ /bac+doMs kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa

sa ri dang lha dang / lha ma yin dang / rlung lha dang / namakha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi 'aM ci dang / lto phye chen po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa gang dag 'khor der 'dus te khod pa de dag thaMd yi rang te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis

gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len dra bo d+hi dang / dz+nyA na sid d+hi dang / shAkya pra b+ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing

zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ zhus dag go/ / @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma hA pra ti sa rA bid+yA rA dz+nyI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo/ sangs rgyas

dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i lhun po chen po'i zom na/ khang pa brtsegs pa rdo rje chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sa'i gnas/ rdo rje chen po'i

dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pas legs par brgyan pa/ rdo rje chen po'i rdzing gi rin po che dang / pad ma'i 'od kyis snang bar byas pa/ sa phyogs rdo rje chen po'i bye ma bdal ba/ rdo rje chen por byin gyis brlabs

pa/ 'khor gyi khyams rdo rje chen po las byas pa/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi rdo rje'i seng ge'i khri chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis rnam par mdzes pa/ chos bstan pa dang / cho 'phrul can sangs rgyas thams cad kyi

byin gyi rlabs kyi byin gyi brlabs pa chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi nges par 'byung ba na/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi thams cad kyang skye ba gcig

gis thogs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa/ mthu chen po thob pa/ rdo rje chen po'i rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar rnam par 'phrul pa dang /

cho phrul chen po kun du ston pa/ sems kyi skad cig brang cig yud tsam cig la sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / spyod pa'i rjesu 'jug pa'i chos stan pa sna tshogs snyan cing rgya che la zab cing yang ba dang /

spobs pa dang / cho 'phrul dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa chen po'i sprin gyis mchod pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang / gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzin dang /

dbang po dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / sa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po dang / byams pa dang / snying rje

dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang / byams pa'i stobs dang / bden pa dang / yongasu byang ba'i sems kyi rgyun dang ldan pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po dang /

rdo rje'i lus dang / rdo rje'i blo gros dang / lag na rdo rje dang / rdo rje 'dus pa dang / rdo rje mthu bo che dang / rdo rje rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rdo rje brtsegs pa dang / rdo rje phung po dang / rdo rje bzang po dang / byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i tog dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi dang / nyan thos chen po rab tu mang po thams cad kyang
dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ srid par kun du sbyor ba chad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang / cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam par
'phrul pa'i mthu chen po thob pa/ lta ba chags pa med pa/ thams cad kyang dri ma dang bral ba thob pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi sa bon nges par bsregs pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/

tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka pe na dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa mau gal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa skul

byed dang / tshe dang ldan dga' byed dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung dang / de dag la sogs pa nyan thos chen po rab tu mang
po dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu grangs med dpag tu med pa/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag dang / mi 'jed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la sogs

pa tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / lha'i bu rab 'thab bral g.yog 'thab bral ris kyi lha'i bu dang bcas pa dang / yongasu dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha'i
bu thams cad kyi 'khor can dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags zangs ris dang / stobs can dang / rab sim dang / sgra gcan dang / rnam par snang byed dang / de dag la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi dbang po

tshad med/ grangs med/ dpag tu med pa rnams dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / 'jog po dang / nor rgyal gyi bu dang / dung skyong dang / stobs kyi rgyu dang / pad ma dang / pad ma chen po dang / de dag la sogs pa klu'i

rgyal po tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams dang / mi 'aM ci'i rgyal po ljon pa mi'aM ci'i rgyal po g.yog du ma can dang / dri za'i rgyal po zur phud lnga pa dri za'i rgyal po g.yog du ma can dang / rigs sngags 'chang gi rgyal po don thams

cad grub pa rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po g.yog du ma can dang / namakha' mkha' lding gi rgyal po gser mig namakha' lding gi rgyal po g.yog du ma can dang / gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu dang / nor bu bzang dang / gang ba

bzang dang / lngas brtsen gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po g.yog du ma can dang / 'phrog ma bu lnga brgya'i g.yog du ma can dang / 'jig rten gyi ma bdun dang / srin mo chen mo bdun dang / drang srong gi mchog chen po bdun dang /

bar snang la rgyu ba'i rgyu skar dang / gza' thams cad kyi lha rnams dang / phyogs kyi lha rnams dang / phyogs 'tshams kyi lha rnams dang / sa'i lha dang / dbyangs can dang / 'byung po rnams dang / bgegs

rnams dang / log 'dren rnams dang / yi dgas rnams dang / 'byung po rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams dang / ri'i rgyal po thams cad dang / 'jig rten skyong ba chu lha g.yog rgya mtsho'i lha thams cad dang bcas pa dang /

'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / lag na be con dang / bden bral dang / me'i lha dang / rlung gi lha chen po bdun dang / dbang bdag chung ma dang bcas pa g.yog bye ba khrag khrig 'buM phrag du ma can dang / sred med kyi bu

g.yog dang bcas pa dang / byin pa po dang / phreng ba can dang / zla ba can dang / lcags can dang / tshogs kyi bdag po chen po dang / sprin ta la la dang / log 'dren gyi dbang po bgegs log 'dren gyi dbang po

g.yog du ma can dang / shing bseb kyi lha drug bcu dang / sring mo bzhi ming po dang bcas pa dang / rdo rje'i lu gu rgyud dang / rdo rje'i pho nya mo drug bcu rtsa bzhi dang / rdo rje'i sde dang / lag bzang dang / gtsug gis 'gro rdo rje'i

ris kyi 'khor du ma dang bcas pa dang / de las gzhan pa sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / namakha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto phye chen

po dang / 'byung po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / grib gnon dang / smyo byed dang / brjed byed dang / skem byed dang / sgrub pa dang / sbrul 'dzin bcas pa dang / gnon po tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag dang /

lha'i bu nyi ma dang / lha'i bu zla ba dang / nub ka'i lha dang / nang par gyi lha dang / dus kyi lha thams cad dang / sa'i lha dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das des chos kyi 'khor lo ni shin du bskor/

sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ni shin du yongasu mthar phyin/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs ni shin du yongasu rdzogs/ thams cad mkhyen pa ni shin du yongasu bzang / byang chub chen po'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa dang sa ni

brnyes/ skyes bu chen po'i tshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyi brgyan pa'i sku ni rab du 'bar/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad ni dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus rnam par spras/ dbu'i gtsug ni seMs can thaMd kyis bltar mi mthong / bdud

kyi las thams cad la ni mkhas/ sems can thaMd kyi seMs dang spyod pa ni shes/ spyan rnaM pa lnga ni mnga'/ rnaM pa thaMd kyi mchog dang ni ldan/ thaMd mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ni ldan/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang ni ldan/ bdud dang phas

kyi rgol ba'i tshogs thams cad ni bcom/ grags pa dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pas ni 'phags/ khyu mchog dang / seng ge'i sgra ni sgrogs/ ma rig pa'i mun pa ni kun du bsal/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs

med dpag tu med par sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / thabs dang / stobs dang / smon lam dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bya dka' ba'i spyod pa las ni

phyir ma log /sku ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byed bzang po brgyad bcus brgyan te/ rab tu mdzes shing rdo rje rin po che'i pad ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri chen po rdo rje rin po che dang / mu tig dang / dril bu

g.yer ka'i dra ba du ma sgra 'byung ba/ rtsa ba'i drung na rdo rje rin po che'i stegs bu du ma shin du brtan par gnas pa/ rdo rje rin po che'i chu srin du ma'i kha nas byung ba'i mu tig dmar po'i phreng ba bres pa'i phang bshams pa/ rin po che du ma

pad ma'i snying po la chags pa/ rin po che la chags pa/ rin po che ke ke ru dang / ke ke ru chen po dang / an da rnyil dang / an da rnyil chen po dang / dun las kyi 'od zer chen po 'tsher bas snang bar byas te kun nas mdzes pa/ gdugs

rtsa ba dang bcas pa/ rdo rje rin po che'i shar bu du mas rnam par brgyan pa/ bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas rnam par brgyan pa/ bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas kun nas bskyabs pa/ dpag bsam gyi shing du mas rgyas par mdzes

par byas pa/ rdo rje rin po che'i khri ri rab tsam la bzhugs te/ gser gyi ri bo'i rgyal po ltar dpal ni 'bar/ sa phyogs ni nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par brgyan/ zla ba nya ba ltar 'jig

rten thams cad la sdug par ni snang / dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa chen po ltar/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni shin du rgyas shing chos ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/

don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba/ yang dag par rab tu ston to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer gyi dra ba

sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing kun du ston pa zhes bya ba bkye ste/ 'od zer gyi dra ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bas khyab par byas par gyur to/ /sangs kyi zhing gang dag na sangs

rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag seng ge'i khri bkod pa du ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzhal med khang na nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge

bsnyen ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad dang thabs gcig tu chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang

mnyam pa de dag thams cad kyang snang ba des khyab par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor phal po che la bka' stsal pa/ sems can kun la snying brtse'i phyir/ /nyes par byas dang gnod pa kun/ /rab 'jom so sor

'brang ba yi/ /gzungs 'di rab tu bshad par bya/ /'di ni thos pa tsam gyis kyang / /sdig pa kun ni zad par 'gyur/ /sems can kun la bde ba sbyin/ /nad do cog las grol bar byed/ /sems can kun la snying brtse bas/ /

lus can ngan 'gror 'gro ba rnams/ /de dag thams cad skyab pa'i phyir/ /'jig rten dag gi mgon pos gsungs/ /'di yis bsrung ba byas na ni/ /lha ma yin gyi gnas su 'jug /de bzhin lcang lo can dang ni/ /srin po'i

gnas kyi sar yang 'gro/ /'byung po klu dang sha za rnams/ /mi bzad 'jigs pa'i g.yul 'byed par/ /'byung po tshogs rnams thams cad dang / /dgra bo cog gis mi tshugs so/ /ming tsam bzung ste brjod byas kyang / /

skem byed smyo byed brjed byed dang / /mkha' 'gro ma dang sha za dang / /gdon rnams rab tu brlag par 'gyur/ /so sor 'brang ba'i gzi brjid kyis/ /gzi chen mdangs rnams za ba dang / /mi yi skye dgu rnams 'tshe ba/ /de dag

thams cad rengs byed 'gyur/ /byad stems mi bzad gang yin dang / /pha rol dmag tshogs phung bar byed/ /sngags kyi las kyis gnod mi 'gyur/ /rtsa ba'i las las rnam par grol/ /dug dang dug sbyar mes mi tshugs/ /mtshon

dang chus kyang tshugs mi 'gyur/ /lce 'bab glog gis mi tshugs te/ /dus kyi rlung gis gnod mi 'gyur/ /rig pa'i rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis/ /dgra kun rab tu 'jom par 'gyur/ /de yi don rnams thams cad 'grub/ /rtag

tu rgyal ba thob par 'gyur/ /gang gis rtag tu mgul pa 'am/ /lag par rig pa btags na ni/ /de yi dgos pa yod do cog /'grub 'gyur 'di la the rtsom med/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang / /sangs rgyas rnams dang

rang 'dren dang / /de bzhin klu'i rgyal po dang / /lha dbang rnams ni rtag tu bsrung / /so sor 'brang ba'i gzungs 'dzin la/ /nyan thos sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /rig pa'i lha mo rdzu 'phrul che/ /rtag tu bsrung ba byed par 'gyur/ /

lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin dbang / /de bzhin rgyal po bzhi rnams kyang / /de la nyin dang mtshan rnams su/ /bsrung bar byed de the tsom med/ /brgya byin lha dang bcas pa dang / /tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang chen dang / /dga' ba'i dbang po nag po

che/ /smin drug bu dang tshogs kyi dbang / /ma mo'i tshogs rnams thams cad dang / /de bzhin bdud ris gzhan rnams dang / /drang srong gzi brjid che rnams dang / /rdzu 'phrul chen po'i lha rnams dang / /de kun so sor

'brang ba yi/ /gzungs 'dzin de la bsrung bar byed/ /sangs rgyas bdag nyid che rnams dang / /rig pa'i lha mo stobs chen dang / /bdag gi ma dang khro gnyer dang / /lha mo sgrol ma lcags kyu dang / /rdo rje lu gu rgyud

dang dkar/ /de bzhin dkar mo chen mo dang / /nag mo che dang pho nya dang / /de bzhin rdo rje pho nya gzhan/ /zhags pa bzang dang rdo rje zhags/ /lag na rdo rje stobs po che/ /rig pa lha mo rdo rje phreng / /bdud rtsi thabs sbyor byed

pa dang / /gzhan gyis mi thub lha mo che/ /rna ba nag mo stobs chen mo/ /dpal yon ldan pa skal chen dang / /rna cha gdub kor pad ma 'dra/ /me tog so can nor bu gtsug /skra mdog mdzes dang kham pa mo/ /lha mo gzi

brjid chen mo dang / /dpal yon ldan pa glog phreng can/ /srin mo ral pa gcig pa dang / /sangs rgyas bsrungs shes bya ba dang / /skal ba chen po mi thod can/ /lang ka'i bdag po dpal yon can/ /gzhan yang lha mo

mang po rnams/ /sems can rjes su 'dzin byed dag /rig pa gang gi lag na gnas/ /de la bsrung ba byed par 'gyur/ /'phrog ma dang ni lngas brtsen dang / /dung can dang ni so brtsegs ma/ /dpal gyi lha mo dbyangs can yang / /

de'i rjes 'gro rtag tu bsrung / /so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di/ /bud med gang zhig rtag 'chang na/ /de'i thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /rtag par mngal na bu pho chags/ /mngal rnams na yang bde bar skye/ /sbrum ma

dag kyang bde bar 'gyur/ /nad dang sdig pa thams cad kyang / /'jig par 'gyur te the tsom med/ /bsod nams ldan zhing stobs dang ldan/ /nor dang 'bru yang rtag tu 'phel/ /tshigs kyang gzung du 'os pa dang / /mchod

pa'i 'os su 'gyur ba yin/ /bud medang ni skyes pa 'ang rung / /gtsang ma gang zhig 'chang bsrel na/ /de ni sems can thams cad dag /thar bar bya phyir brtson par 'gyur/ /rtag tu bde bar 'gyur ba yin/ /nad do cog kyang

rnam par spangs/ /slas dang skye bo mang bcas pa'i/ /rgyal po 'ang de yi dbang du 'gyur/ /phun sum tshogs pa rtag tu 'bar/ /bsod nams phung po rnam par 'phel/ /deng yi bsam pa thams cad 'grub/ /dkyil 'khor kun du

zhugs pa yin/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi bka' bzhin du/ /de ni kun du dam tshig shes/ /rmi lam ngan pa rmi mi 'gyur/ /sdig pa thams cad 'phrog pa'i mchog /sdig pa rnams dang de bzhin du/ /dgra yang rab tu phung bar byed/ /

gza' kun rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir/ /ye shes dbang phyug chen pos gsungs/ /'dod pa thams cad sbyin par byed/ /de phyir rtag tu bcang bar bya/ /'byung po'i tshogs rnams nga la nyon/ /da ni rab tu 'di brjod do/ /de

bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ \u0f00 bi pu la bi pu la/ gar+b+he/ bi pu la bi ma le/

bi pu la gar+b+he/ bi ma le/ dza ya gar+b+he/ badzra dz+wA lA gar+b+he/ ga ti ga ha ne/ ga ga na bi sho d+ha ne/ sarba pA pa bi sho d+ha ne/ \u0f00 gu Na pa ti/ ga ga na/ pi tsA ri Ni/ ga ga re Ni/ gi gi gi ri/ gi ri Ni gi ri ni/ ga ma ri/ ga ma ri/ ga ha ga ha/

garga ri garga ri/ ga ga ri/ ga ga ri/ ga~M b+ha ri/ ga~M b+ha ri/ ga b+hi ga b+hi/ ga hi ga hi/ ga ma ni/ ga ma ni/ ga ma ni/ ga ri ga ri/ gu b+ha gu b+ha/ gu ha gu ha/ gu ru gu ru gu ru Ni/ tsa le gu ha Ni/ gu ha ni/ gu ru Ni/ tsu lu tsu lu/ tsa le

tsa le/ mu tse le mu tse le/ dza ye bi dza ye/ sarba b+ha ya bi ga te/ satwa sarba gar+b+ha sa~M rak+Sha Ni/ si ri si ri/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ mi ri mi ri/ gi ri gi ri/ g+hi ri g+hi ri/ g+hi ri g+hi ri/ sa man+ta maR+sha ni/ bcom ldan 'das ma sems can 'dren ma kun nas 'dren ma/
dgra thams cad 'joms par mdzad ma/ bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / nad 'go ba thams cad dang / nad thams cad las bsrung du gsol/ bsrung du gsal/ tsi ri tsi ri/ bi ri bi ri/

d+hi ri d+hi ri/ bi ga ta/ A ba ra Na/ bi sho d+ha ne/ bi bi d+ha/ A pa ra Na/ bi nA sha ni/ mu ri mu ri/ mu tsi mu tsi/ mu li mu li/ tsi li tsi li/ ki li ki li/ mi li mi li/ ka ma le/ bi ma le/ dza ye bi dza ye/ dza yA/ ba he dza ya ba ti/ bi she

Sha ba ti/ bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa chen po'i cod pan dang / phreng ba mnga' ba cha byad rnam pa sna tshogs mang po mnga' ba/ bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i lha mo chen mo/ sdig pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba/ bdag

la thams cad du kun nas bsrung du gsol/ bsrung du gsol/ hu ru hu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ rak+Sha rak+Sha ma ma/ mgon ma mchis pa/ skyabs ma mchis pa/ dpung gnyen ma mchis pa/ bdag la bsrungs du gsol/ bsrung du gsol/

bdag sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar mdzad du gsol/ tsan+De tsan+De/ tsan+De tsan+De/ tsaN+De Ni/ tsan+De Ni/ be ga ba ti/ sarba duSh+Ta ni bA ra Ni/ bi dza ya/ bA hi ni/ hu ru hu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ tu ru tu ru/ A yuHpA li ni/

su ra ba ra pra ma tha ni/ sarba de ba ga Na pU dzi te/ tsi ri tsi ri/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ sa man+ta a ba lo ki te/ pra b+he pra b+he/ su pra b+he/ su pra b+ha/ bi shud d+he/ sarba pA pa bi sho d+ha ne/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ d+ha ra ni/ d+ha re d+ha re d+ha ra/ su mu su mu/ su mu su mu mu su mu su/ ru ru

tsa le/ tsA la ya/ dpal gyi sku mnga' ba/ bdag la gnod par sems pa las bskyab du gsol/ bdag gi bsam pa rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/ dza ya ka ma le/ k+Shi Ni k+Shi ni/ pa ra da/ a~M ku she/ \u0f00 pad+ma bi shud d+he/ sho

d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ shud d+he shud d+he/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ ma~M ga la bi shud d+he/ pa bi tra mu khi/ khaD+ge ni khaD+ge ni/ kha ra kha ra/ dz+wa le ta shi kha re/ sa man+ta a ba lo ki ta pra b+he/ su pra b+ha bi shud d+he/ sa man+ta pra sA ri ta/

A bA ba si ta shud d+ha/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ sarba d+he ba ga Na/ gra ha na k+Sha tra/ sa ma A kaR+Sha ni/ sa t+ya pra ti/ \u0f00 hrI traM ta ra ta ra/ tA ra ya tA ra ya/ glang po che'i lta ltangs kyis gzigs ma/ bdag sgral du gsol/ la hu la hu/

hu lu hu lu/ hu du hu du/ tu ru tu ru/ ki Ni ki Ni/ k+Shi Ni k+Shi Ni/ hu Ni hu Ni/ sarba gra ha b+ha k+Sha Ni/ ping ga li ping ga li/ mu tsu mu tsu/ tsu mu tsu mu/ su mu su mu tsu mu tsu mu su bi tsa re/ ta ra ta ra/ bcom ldan 'das ma glang po che'i

blta stangs kyis gzigs ma/ thams cad du kun nas phyogs thams cad bcing ba dang / rdo rje'i ra ba dang / rdo rje'i zhags pa'i bcing bas bdag 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las bsgral du gsol/ badzra dz+wA lA bi shud d+he/

b+hu ri b+hu ri/ b+ha ga ba ti/ gar+b+ha saM sho d+ha ni/ ku k+Shi sam pU ra Ni/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ tsa la tsa la/ dz+wA li ni/ lha'i chus kun du char dbab tu gsol/ a mr-i ta baR+Sha Ni de ba ta/ a ba tA ra Ni/ bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung rab bdud rtsi

mchog gi sku dang ldan pa bdag la dbang bskur du gsol/ 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / bkra mi shis pa dang / sdig pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba/ gnod sbyin
dang / srin po dang / klu thams cad 'joms pa/ gnod pas 'jigs skrag pa/ bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / nad 'go ba thams cad dang / nad thams cad las thams cad du rtag par
bsrung du gsol/ bsrung du gsol/ ba la ba la/ ba la ba ti/ dza ya dza ya/ bi dza ya/ bi dza ya/ thams cad du dus kun du bdag rgyal bar mdzad du gsol/ bdag la rig pa chen mo 'di grub par mdzad du gsol/

dkyil 'khor chen po bsgrub tu gsol/ gsang sngags rnams bsgrub tu gsol/ bgegs rnams gzhom du gsol/ dza ya dza ya/ sid d+h+ya sid d+h+ya/ sid+d+h+ya sid+d+h+ya/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ s+'u tsa ya s+'u tsa ya/ pU ra Ni pU ra Ni/
bdag gi bsam pa rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/ rig pa thams cad las byung ba'i sku can/ rgyal ba lhag par rgyal ba can/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po rnam par dag pa bcom ldan 'das ma bzhugs su gsol/
bzhugs su gsol/ dam tshig bskyang du gsol/ 'jigs pa mi bzad pa chen po brgyad las bdag la gzigs su gsol/ sa ra sa ra/ pra sa ra pra sa ra/ sarba A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ni/ sa man+ta A ka

ra man+Da la bi shud d+he/ bi ga te bi ga ti/ bi ga ta ma le/ sarba ma la bi sho d+ha ni/ k+Shi Ni k+Shi Ni/ sarba pA pa bi shud d+he/ ma la bi ga ti/ dza ya ba ti/ te dzo te dzo ba ti/ badzra badzra ba ti/ 'jig rten gsum du byin gyis brlabs pa la swA hA/

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba la swA hA/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba la swAhA/ lha thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba la swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

snying pos byin gyis brlabs pa la swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig grub pa la swA hA/ dbang po dang ldan pa dbang pos rnam par bltas pa la swA hA/ tshangs pa dang tshangs pa gnas pa la swA hA/ khyab 'jug

gis phyag byas pa la swA hA/ dbang phyug chen pos phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa la swA hA/ rdo rje 'dzin lag na rdo rje'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyis byin gyis brlabs pa la swA hA/ yul 'khor srung la swA hA/

'phags skyes po la swA hA/ mig mi bzang la swA hA/ rnam thos kyi bu la swA hA/ rgyal po chen po bzhis phyag byas pa la swA hA/ gshin rje la swA hA/ gshin rjes mchod cing phyag byas pa la swA hA/ chu lha la swA hA/

rlung lha la swA hA/ rlung la chen po la swA hA/ me lha la swAhA/ klus rnam par bltas pa la swA hA/ lha'i tshogs rnams la swA hA/ klu'i tshogs rnams la swA hA/ gnod sbyin gyi tshogs rnams la swA hA/ gshin rje'i

tshogs rnams la swA hA/ srin po'i tshogs rnams la swA hA/ dri za'i tshogs rnams la swA hA/ lha ma yin gyi tshogs rnams la swA hA/ nam mkha' lding gi tshogs rnams la swA hA/ mi 'am ci'i tshogs rnams la swA hA/ lto 'phye chen po'i

tshogs rnams la swA hA/ mi rnams la swAhA/ mi ma yin pa rnams la swA hA/ gdon thams cad la swA hA/ 'byung po thams cad la swA hA/ yi dgas la swA hA/ sha za la swA hA/ brjed byed la swA hA/ gnod byed la swA hA/ grul buM la swAhA/ \u0f00 d+hu ru d+hu ru swA hA/

tu ru tu ru swA hA/ mu ru mu ru swA hA/ ha na ha na sarba sha t+r+'uM swA hA/ da ha da ha sarba duSh+TA nAM swA hA/ pa tsa pa tsa sarba pra t+yar+thi kA pra t+ye mi hrA tAM swA hA/ gang dag bdag la mi phan par 'dod pa de dag thams cad kyi lus dz+wa la ya sarba duSh+TaM tsit+tA ni swA hA/ 'bar ba la

swA hA/ rab tu 'bar ba la swA hA/ rdo rje 'bar ba la swA hA/ me lce 'bar ba la swA hA/ kun du 'bar ba la swA hA/ nor bu bzang la swA hA/ gang ba bzang po la swA hA/ nag po chen po la swA hA/ ma mo'i tshogs la swA hA/ gnod sbyin mo rnams la swA hA/ srin mo

rnams la swA hA/ nam mkha'i ma mo rnams la swA hA/ rgya mtsho na gnas pa rnams la swA hA/ mtshan mo rgyu ba rnams la swA hA/ nyin mo rgyu ba rnams la swA hA/ dus gsum du rgyu ba rnams la swA hA/ dus ma yin par rgyu ba rnams la swA hA/

zas su mngal za ba rnams la swAhA/ mngal 'dzin pa la swA hA/ hu lu hu lu/ swA hA/ \u0f00 swA hA/ swaHswA hA/ b+hu swA hA/ b+hu ba swA hA/ b+hur b+hU ba swA hA/ tsi Ti tsi tsi Ti swA hA/ bi Ti ba Ti swA hA/ d+hA ra Ni swA hA/ d+hA ra ni swA hA/ ag+ni swA hA/ te dzo

ba bu swA hA/ tsi li tsi li swA hA/ mi li mi li swA hA/ si li si li swA hA/ bud+d+h+ya bud+d+h+ya swA hA/ sid+d+h+ya sid+d+h+ye swA hA/ maN+da la ban d+he swA hA/ sI mA ban d+he swA hA/ d+ha ra Ni b+han d+he swA hA/ sarba sha truM NAM b+hany+dza ya swA hA/ dzam+b+ha ya dzam+b+ha ya swA hA/ stam+b+ha

ya stam+b+ha ya swA hA/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da swA hA/ b+hin+da b+hin+da swA hA/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza swA hA/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha swA hA/ mo ha ya mo ha ya swA hA/ ma Ni bi shud d+he swA hA/ sUr+ye swA hA/ sUr+ya bi shud d+he swA hA/ sho d+ha ni swA hA/ bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/ tsan+De tsan+De pa ri

pU ra Na tsan+d+re swA hA/ gra he b+h+yaHswA hA/ nak+Sha tre b+h+yaHswA hA/ shi bi b+h+ye swA hA/ shAn+ti b+h+yaHswA hA/ pu Sh+Ti b+h+yaHswA hA/ sba s+t+ya ya ne b+h+yaHswA hA/ shi ba ka ri swA hA/ sha~M ka ra swA hA/ shAn+ti ka ri swA hA/ puSh+Ti ka ri swA hA/ ba la bar+d+hi ni ka ri swA hA/

shrI ka ri swA hA/ shrI bar+d+hi ni swA hA/ shrI dz+wA le ni swA hA/ mu tsi swA hA/ na mu tsi swA hA/ ma ru tse swA hA/ be ga ba ti swA hA/ \u0f00 bcom ldan 'das ma de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku mchog dri ma dang bral ba/ bdag gi

sdig pa thams cad zhi bar mdzad du gsol/ bdag bde legs su gyur cig /oM mu ni mu ni/ bi mu ni bi mu ni/ d+ha ri tsa la tsa la ni/ b+ha ga ba ti/ b+ha ya bi ga te/ b+ha ya ha ri Ni/ bo d+hi bo d+hi/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ bud d+hi li bud d+hi li/ sarba

ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya dzuSh+Te swA hA/ \u0f00 mu ni mu ni mu ni ba re/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig pa'i dbang bskur ba/ rdo rje'i go cha chen po'i phyag rgyas btab pa thams cad kyis bdag la dbang bskur du gsol/ sarba ta thA ga ta

hr-i da ya/ a d+hiSh+ThA ti badzre swA hA/ bram ze chen po rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo/ kun nas me lce'i phreng ba rnam par dag pas rgyas pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu phyag rgya dang / snying po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gzung 'di

rig kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos thos ma thag tu sdig pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /bram ze chen po rig pa 'di gang gi snying la gnas par gyur pa de'i lus rdo rjer rig par bya'o/ /de'i lus la

mes mi tshugs so/ /ci mngon zhe na/ gang gi tshe grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas na/ gzhon nu sgra gcan zin bzang po mngal du zhugs pa de'i tshe shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma bdag nyid me'i nang du mchongs pa dang / der pad ma

dag byung ste/ de'i tshe gzhon nu sgra gcan zin bzang po mngal na gnas bzhin du rig pa 'di yid la byas so/ /rig pa 'di rjes su dran pa tsam gyis me de skad cig de nyid la bsil bar gyur to/ /de nas shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho
ma'i lus la mes ma reg go/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rig pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /bram ze chen po rgyu des na mes mi tshig go/ dug gis kyang srog dang 'bral bar
mi nus so/ /de ci lta zhe na/ bram ze chen po gang gi tshe grong khyer chen po bde bar pha rol tu 'gro ba zhes bya ba na/ tshong dpon mdzod stobs can gyi bu rig pa smra bar
gyur to/ /de'i rig pa'i stobs des klu'i rgyal po 'jog po bkug go/ bkug nas kyang bag med pa'i dbang gis ma bcings pas des khros nas de la bzung ba dang / de tshor ba mi bzad pa myong nas ji ltar yang

bdag ni srog dang bralo snyam du sheso/ /de nas smra ba can mang po bos kyang 'ga' tsaM gyis kyang dug las gso bar ma nuso/ /de nas grong khyer chen po bde bar pha rol tu 'gro ba na dge snyen ma dri ma med par dag pa zhes bya ba

snying rje chen po dang ldan pa zhig gnas pa des rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo 'di kha ton du sheso/ /de de'i gnasu song te phyin pa dang / rig pa chen mo 'di rjod do/ /des de la lan cig brjod pa tsam gyis de dug med par byas shing de dran pa rnyed par

byas te/ sdug bsngal chen po de las yongasu thar bar byas nas rig pa chen mo'i snying po 'di cho ga ci ltar bka' stsal ba bzhin du tshongs dpon gyi bu de'i snying la gnas par byas so/ /bram ze chen po gzhan yang ci ltar yongasu shes

na/ rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba'i grangasu chud pa zhig grong khyer chen po bA ra NA si na sngon yongasu rgyu ba'i tshe/ de'i shar phyogs kyi 'tshams kyi stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po des dpung gi tshogs

yan lag bzhi pa go bskon te/ grong khyer chen po bA ra NA si kun nas skor te/ gzhom par bshamaso/ /de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin de la blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis grong khyer
'phrog la thug na thabs gang gis pha rol gyi dmag tshogs gzhom par bgyi/ bka' stsal du gsol zhes byas pa dang rgyal pos khyed 'tsher 'grib chung ngur gyis shig /rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba

chen mo zhes bya ba yod do/ / ngas des dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa 'di pham par bya'o/ /thal ba bzhin du bya'o zhes bsgo ba dang / blon po rnams kyis mgo btud de rgyal po chen po sngon bdag cag gis nam
yang ma thos pa 'di ci zhig lags shes smras pa dang / rgyal pos ngas de mngon sum du bya'o zhes bsgo'o/ /de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin spos chu sna tshogs kyi mgo bkrus te/ gos gtsang ma bgos nas

rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo 'di cho ga bzhin du bris te/ mgo'i gtsugi skra'i nang du bzhag nas rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo 'di nyid kyis go cha byas te/ g.yul gyi nang du zhugs pa dang / gcig pu dpung gi tshogs yan lag

bzhi pa thaMd phaM par byas te/ ji srid skyabasu dong ba de srid du 'dis tshar bcad nas stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de cig pu btang ngo / /braM ze chen po de ltar na rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyi snying

po dang / phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs pa/ mthu chen po 'di mngon sum du gyur pa yin te/ mngon sum du gyur to snyam du gzung bar bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd dang mtshungs pa nyid du blta bar bya'o/ /phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus

na seMs tshe thung ba rnams dang / bsod naMs chung ba rnaMs dang / longs spyod chung ba rnaMs la phan par 'gyur blta'o/ /braM ze chen po gang la la zhig rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di cho ga bzhin du bris te lag

pa 'aM/ mgul du gtags na de de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyis byin gyis brlabs par rig par bya'o/ /de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur rig par bya'o/ /rdo rje'i lus yin par rig par bya'o/ /de de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi ring bsrel gyi snying po can yin par rig par bya'o/ /de de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyi spyan yin par rig par bya'o/ /de rdo rje chen po'i lusu rig par bya'o/ /de 'bar ba 'od 'phro ba'i

lus dang ldan par rig par bya'o/ /de mi shig pa'i go cha can du rig par bya'o/ /de dgra thams cad rab tu 'jom par rig par bya'o/ /de sgrib pa dang sdig pa thaMd 'jom par rig par bya'o/ /de seMs can dmyal ba'i
'gro ba rnams sbyong bar rig par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon yongasu shes pa yin te/ bram ze chen po phyogs gzhan zhig na dge slong ma dad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la bslab pa 'dral ba/

ma byin par len pa/ bza' ba 'du ba'i sgo 'phrog pa/ dge 'dun gyi dang / phyogs bzhi dang / tshogs kyi rdzasu gyur pa de thaMd gang dag gir byin gyis brlabs te za ba zhig du gzhan zhig na nad tshab chen pos btab pa

dang / bsdug bsngal chen po'i tshor ba myong ngo / /nyon mongs te skyabs med dpung gnyen med nas ku co'i sgra chen po 'byin to/ /bram ze chen po de nas phyogs de na dge bsnyen zhig gnas pa des sgra de thos so/ /thos nas

kyang dge slong ga la ba der song ste phyinas rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di bris te/ dge slong de'i mgul du btags so/ /rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo dge slong de'i mgul du btags ma thag

du tshor ba thaMd ni rab tu zhi/ nad thaMd las ni yongasu thar te/ sos par gyur nas de'i mtshan mo zad pa dang / dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag ste 'chi ba'i dus byas so/ /lus de bor ba dang / seMn dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyes

so/ /de'i ro de yang dge slong dag gis sgang bu zhig la bzhag go/ rig pa chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo de yang de'i mgul du btags pa bzhin du gnaso/ /dge slong de mnar med pa der skyes ma thag tu sems can

dmyal ba'i sems can de dag gis sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad rab tu zhi nas sems can dmyal ba'i seMs de dag thaMd bde ba thaMd kyis tshim par gyur to/ /mtshaMs med pa'i me phung po chen po gang yin pa de

dag thaMd kyang yongasu zhi bar gyur to/ /de nas gshin rje'i mi de dag thaMd ngo mtshar skyes nas chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje la nges pa'i tshigs 'di dag rgyas par brjod do/ /seMs can las las skyes pa yi/ /sdug bsngal
mi bzad rab tu zhi/ /shin tu ngo mtshar 'di ni lha/ /sems dmyal nyam nga rnaMs na gda'/ /lus can lus la rtag gnas pa'i/ /me ma mur de rab tu zhi/ /sog le rnams kyis gsheg ma mchis/ /spu gri'i sos

yang gcod mi bgyid/ /lcags sdong shal ma ri yang chag /lcags zangs thaMd rab tu zhi/ /ral gri lo ma can nags na/ /las skyes lo ma gnod mi 'gyur/ /chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje khyod/ /mi rnaMs la ni chos kyi

ston/ /rgyu 'di mi chung bdag cag la/ /khyod kyis brjod par mdzad pa'i rigs/ /de nas chos kyi bdag nyid can/ /chos nges chos kyi rgyal po des/ /snying rje'i bsam pa nyaMs rnaMs kyi/ /'di 'dra'i tshig de thos

gyur nas/ /myur du 'di ni ci yin smros/ /'di ni ci 'dra yang smros shig /de nas mi bzad gshin rje'i mi/ /gnod pa'i rgyun can de dag gis/ /chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje la/ /'di skad kyi ni tshig smraso/ /
mnar med rab tu nyam nga bar/ /sems can chen po 'di skyes lha/ /gang gi ming ni mnar med pa/ /des na de ni nyam ngar brjod/ /gang gis sems can bde bgyis pa/ /rnam pa sna tshogs las la gzigs/ /

'di ni kun du bde gyur nas/ /slar yang lha'i gnasu mchis/ /chos kyi rgyal po gshin rjes kyang / /mthong nas ngo mtshar smras pa ni/ /'di ni rdzu 'phrul che ba ste/ /'di ni tshe rabs snga lus tshe/ /ci ltar sku
gdung brgya mang pos/ /ston pa'i mchod rten mdzes pa ltar/ /so sor 'brang ba mgul btags pas/ /de yi lus ni de bzhin mdzes/ /de nas sems can dmyal ba'i bsrung ma gnod sbyin de dag

gis chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje la 'di skad ces smraso/ /lha ci ltar na 'di so sor 'brang ba zhes bgyi/ chos kyi rgyal pos smras pa/ gang gi tshig rnaMs so sor dran/ /de ni ngan 'gror 'gro mi 'gyur/ /so sor 'brang ba bsgoMs

pa yi/ /shes rab can de bde 'gror 'gro/ /sems can dmyal ba'i srungs ma khyed/ /rab tu rgyas dang ldan par dong / /der ni sgang bu mthon po la/ /lha rnams kyis ni bskor ba ltos/ /de thong seMs can thaMd la/ /

byams pa'i seMs su 'gyur bar gyis/ /de nas gshin rje'i mi de dag de nyid kyi nub mo rgyas pa dang ldan pa dong ngo / /de tshe der ni de dag gis/ /rgyal po'i pho brang nye ba na/ /sgang bu de yi khor yug na/ /'bar ba gcig

gis gang bar mthong / /mi ro zhig gi mgul pa na/ /so sor 'brang ba btags pa 'ang mthong / /lha dang klu dang dri za dang / /gnod sbyin srin po mi 'am cis/ /kunas 'khor bar bskor nas ni/ /bla na med pa'i mchod pa byed/ /

de la gnod sbyin de dag gis/ /so sor 'brang ba'i sgang zhes btags/ /de nas gnod sbyin de dag gis chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje'i nges pa de rtogs te slar log nas lha khyod kyis bka' stsal pa bzhino zhes rgyas par brjod

do/ /de skad ces smras ma thag tu tshigs de smras pa'i tha ma la seMs can chen po de sems can dmyal ba'i lus de bor nas sum bcu rtsa gsuM pa'i lha rnaMs kyi nang du skyeso/ /rgyu des na sngon so sor 'brang ba'i lha'i bu zhes

bya'o/ /bram ze chen po des na sngon chad yongasu sheso/ /de'i phyir so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di gdon mi za bar gzung bar bya'o/ /yi ger bri bar bya/ bklag par bya'o/ /cho ga bzhin du rtag tu lus la btags nas bcang

bar bya ste/ de rtag du sdug bsngal zhing nyams thag pa thaMd las yongasu thar bar 'gyur/ ngan 'gro'i 'jigs skrag pa thaMd las rgal bar 'gyuro/ /glogis 'gyel bar byed mi nuso/ /glog gis ci ltar mi nus zhe na/ braM ze chen

po sngon yongasu shes te/ grong khyer chen po chog shin kun rdzub na/ tshong dpon chen po dri med dung zhes bya ba nor mang ba/ gser shin tu 'byor pa/ mdzod dang / bang ba kun gang zhing phun suM tshogs pa zhig gnas te/ ded dpon zhes bya bar

grags so/ /de nas ded dpon chen po de gru bo che de rnyed nas/ rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa dang / nya mid rnams kyis de'i gru de bzung nas/ rnam par gzhig par 'dod pa'i klu rnams kyang 'khrugs te/ 'brug sgra chen po sgrog go /

glog dang skar mda' yang gtong ngo / /rdo rje'i lce 'bebs par yang bshamaso/ /de nas tshong pa de dag sdug bsngal chen pos seMs non to/ /klu 'khrugs pa chen po de dang / glog dang skar mda' dang / rdo rje'i lce 'bebs

pa dang / nya mid de dag gis kyang gru bo che bzung bar mthong nas ku co'i sgra chen po bton te/ de dag lha khyad par can rnaMs la gsol ba btab kyang 'ga' tsam yang de dag gi dpung gnyen du ma gyur to/ /de nas de dag

tshong dpon sems rab tu brtan pa'i gan du song nas de dag gis snying rje rje skad du tshig 'di skad smraso/ /seMs can chen po khyod kyis bdag cag skyab cing 'jigs pa chen po las thar bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas ded dpon

chen po seMs brtan pa blo gros chen po des tshong ba khrugs 'khrugs par gyur pa rnams la tshig 'di skad smras so/ /ma 'jigs ma 'jigs tshong pa rnams/ /khyed cag brtan par deng shig dang / /khyed rnaMs sdug bsngal chen
po yi/ /rgya mtsho che las ngas sgral lo/ /de nas yid ni brtan gyur nas/ /tshong pa rnams kyis tshig 'di smras/ /seMs can chen po 'di ci lags/ /bgegs bral myur du bka' stsol cig /blo gros chen po

khyod kyi mthus/ /bdag cag ji srid 'tsho ba'i tshe/ /ye shes che ba'i bdag nyid gsungs/ /slad na khyod kyis ci zhig bgyi/ /de nas 'dron mang bdag po yis/ /de dag la ni tshig 'di brjod/ /nga la so sor 'brang ba yi/ /

rig pa chen por grags pa yod/ /gnod byed thaMd sel bar byed/ /stobs chen pha rol gnon byed pa/ /des ni rab tu sdug bsngal ba'i/ /'jigs pa che las ngas sgral lo/ /de nas ded dpon chen po de'i tshe rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo 'di bris nas

rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags pa dang / rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags ma thag tu nya mid de dag thams cad kyis gru bo che de me lce gcig tu gyur pa mthong ngo / /de nas

klu de dag byams pa'i yid kyis de dag gi drung du lhags nas mchod pa bya bar bshamaso/ /nya myid de dag kyang rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di nyid kyi mthus tshig nas byer te zhi bar gyur to/ /'dron po phal po che de dag kyang

klu chen po de dag gis rin po che'i gling chen por phyin par byas so/ /de ltar na ye shes dang ldan pa rig pa chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo ni de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyi byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ bram ze chen po rgyu des na 'di

rig pa chen mo zhes gragaso/ /'di ni nges par rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te bcing bar bya'o/ /rlung dang / grang ba dang / dus ma yin pa'i sprin dang / glog dang / lce 'bab pa thaMd rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi

'thab pa dang / brtsod pa las yongasu thar bar byed do/ /sbrang bu mchu ring dang / sha sbrang dang / byi ba dang / srog chags kyi rigs gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs lo tog ma rung bar byed pa thaMd mthu med cing rab tu zhi bar 'gyuro/ /ri dgas dang /

bya dang / gcan zan gnod par sems pa thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyuro/ /me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo ma dang / nags tshal dang / sman dang / lo tog la sogs pa thaMd 'phel bar 'gyur te/ rab tu bro zhing zhim pa dang / 'jam par 'gyuro/ /

legs par yongasu smin par 'gyuro/ /ha cang char che ba dang / char dkon pa'i nyes pa rnaMs yongasu mi 'byung ngo / /char dusu 'bab cing / dus ma yin par mi 'bab par 'gyuro/ /yul de'i klu chen po gang yin pa de dag kyang dus dusu

char gyi rgyun legs par 'bebaso/ /yul gang na rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo zhes bya ba 'di spyod pa'i yul der seMn de dag gis shes par bya te/ spos sna tshogs dang / bdug pa sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs

kyis mchod cing bsti stang byas la/ tshon sna tshogs gyis dkris te rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags nas glu dbyangs dang / rol mo sil snyan byas te/ bskor ba byas nas lha rnams dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs

pas sems can chen po de dag gis bsaMs pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ re ba yongasu rdzogs par byed par 'gyuro/ /cho ga ci lta ba bzhin du de lta de lta bur 'grub ste/ bu pho 'dod na'ang khye'u 'grub/ /mngal na 'dzin pa dam

par 'gyur/ /mngal na bde bar skyes ba dang / /mngal nas bde bar btsas par 'gyur/ /mngal na dus bzhin skye ba dang / /dus bzhin rab tu btsas par 'gyur/ /cis mngon zhe na/ braM ze chen po snga ma bzhin du de nyon cig /yul mA

ga d+ha 'di nyid na/ rgyal po lag brkyang zhes bya ba de bu med par gyur to/ /ci'i phyir lag brkyang zhes bya zhe na/ rgyal po de btsas ma thag tu lag pa brkyang nas ma'i nu zho la bzung ste/ nu zho ngoms ngoms su 'thungaso/ /nu ma

de gnyis la reg ma thag tu gser gyi kha dog tu gyur to/ /dus kun tu nu zho 'phel bar gyur to/ /rgyu des na rgyal po lag brkyang zhes bya bar btags par gyur to/ /gzhan yang gang gi tshe rgyal po'i gan du skye bo slongs mo pa 'ongs

pa de'i tshe rgyal po de lag pa g.yas pa bar snang la brkyang ba dang / rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' de rgyu des sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa'i lha rnaMs kyis lha'i rin po che khyad par du 'phags pa gser dang / nor bu rnaMs kyis

lag pa gang bar byed do/ /rgyal po des kyang skye bo slong mo pa lhags pa rnaMs la rab tu byin no/ /bsams pa tsam gyis slongs mo pa thaMd la 'dod pa bzhin du bde ba phun suM tshogs pa thaMd byin no/ /bu pho 'dod pa'i phyir lha rnams

la mchod pa dang / bsti stang cher byas kyang bu pho ma rnyed nas de sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dag gis mchod rten rnaMs kyi mdun du bsti stang bya bar brtsaMs te mchod pa dang / bsti stang chen po byaso/ /sbyin pa yang byin to/ /

bsnyen gnas la yang nye bar gnas so/ /bsod nams chen po byaso/ /sbyin pa chen po de dag kyang mi zad par byin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bram ze chen po sngon byung ba yul ma ga d+ha 'di nyid na/ gyad yul zhes bya ba'i grong

khyer ku sha'i tshong dus chen po'i mchog na bac+doMs rin chen mang gi bstan pa la zhugs pa tshong dpon chos kyi blo gros zhes bya ba chos la sems dpa'i sems can chen po zhig gnas pa de seMs can thaMd la snying rje chen po'i

seMs nye bar gzhag nas rig pa chen po so sor 'brang ba 'di nyid las brtsaMs te chos ston to/ /de nas mi dbul po zhig gis chos de thos nas tshong dpon chen po de la tshig 'di skad ces bdag jo bo'i khab tu gla bgyi'o/ /

chos kyang nyan to/ /gang gi tshe bdagis cung zad rnyed par gyur pa de'i tshe bdag chos la mchod pa bgyid do/ /zhes smras nas/ de'i khyim na las byed cing chos kyang nyan to/ /dus gzhan zhig na/ de la tshong dpon des bi na

ra gcig byin pa dang / des sems can thaMd yongasu bskyab pa'i phyir byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas/ seMs can thaMd dang thun mong du byas nas rin po che snyim pas so sor 'brang ba chen mo la phul nas sbyin

pa'i 'bras bu chen po 'dis bdag dang sems can thaMd kyi dbul ba kun tu gcod par gyur cig ces smon lam de dag kyang btab bo/ /rgyu des na sbyin pa de yongasu mi zad par gyur to/ /de ltar bsod naMs mngon par
'du bya ba rnam pa mang po rnam pa du ma byas te/ lha rnams kyang mchod pa nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du mchod pa dang / de'i tshe gnas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis rmis bltas

su bstan te/ 'di skad du/ kye rgyal po chen po so sor 'brang ba chen mo zhes bya ba kun nas me lce'i phreng ba rnam par dag pas rgyas pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu phyag rgya dang / snying po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i

gzungs chen mo rig pa'i rgyal mo cho ga las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin du cho ga bzhin bris la btsun mo dam pa basmyung ba byas la/ cho ga bzhin du lus la btags na khyod bu pho yod par 'gyuro zhes bsgo'o/ /de nas

rgyal po de sad de mtshan mo zad nas rtsis dang / yi ge'i 'bru dang / rgyu skar dang / gza' rnam par 'byed pa'i bram ze rnams bsogs nas cho ga las 'byung ba bzhin du rgyu skar gyi rgyal po rgyal gyi nyin par btsun

mo dam pa lus shin tu legs par bkrus te/ basmyung ba byas nas rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brang ba 'di yang cho ga bzhin du bri ste btsun mo dam pa'i mgul du btags so/ /sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten rnaMs la

mchod pa chen po byas so/ /rin po che khyad par can du ma yang seMs can rnams la sbyin pa byin no/ /de nas zla ba dgu lon pa dang / bu pho gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa
mchog dang ldan pa zhig btsas so/ /bram ze chen po de ltar shes nas rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchod pa/ 'dod pa thams cad du 'gro ba/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa so sor
'brang ba chen mo dkon mchog ces grags so/ /'di ni rtag tu brgya byin gyi gtsug gi nor bu yin no/ /gang gi tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha ma yin rnams dang / g.yul chen po 'gyed
par 'dod pa de'i tshe 'di nyid kyis go cha byas nas spyi gtsug tu btags te/ lha ma yin thams cad pham par byas/ pha rol pham par byas nas dge ba dang / bde bas bde bar lha'i grong khyer du 'jug te/

lha ma yin thaMd kyis mi tshugs pa yin no/ /bram ze chen po de ltar na seMs dang po skyed pa nas bzung ste/ rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di 'chang ba'i byang chub seMs dpa' la bdud thaMs
cad kyis mi tshugs so/ /'di gang gi lus la btagasam/ mgul du btags pa de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par bsrung bar

'gyur ro/ /lha dang / mi dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i blon po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag thams bcad kyis kyang rtag par rgyun tu phyag bya zhing mchod pa dang / rim gro byed par 'gyur ro/ /lha dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'

lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen pos rjed cing mchod par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das bdud kyi dpung rab tu 'joms pas kyang de la sems can chen po zhes gsungs so/ /nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur

ro/ /de la yam gyi nad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / nad 'go ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyuro/ /seMn chen po de mya ngan thaMd dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /de la lha thams cad kyang rtag par rgyun tu bsrung ba dang /

bskyobs pa dang / sbed par byed par 'gyur ro/ /des gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gsang sngags chen po'i snying po 'di dag bris te/ rtag par rgyun tu lus la gdags shing bcang bar bya/ rtag par rgyun du yid la bya'o/ /

kha ton du bya'o/ /bsam pa thag pa nas bsgoms par bya'o/ /sdug bsngal ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / bkra mi shis pa'i dngos po thams cad rnams par 'jom par 'gyur ro/ /bde ba phun

sum tshogs pa thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'di ni gsang sngags kyi gzhi las thams cad byed pa dge ba rnam grub pa'o/ /tad ya thA/ \u0f00 a mr-i te a mri ta ba re/ ba ra ba ra/ pra ba ra bi shud d+he/ hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/

\u0f00 a mr-i ta be la ki n-i gar+b+ha sa~M rak+Sha Ni/ a kaR+Sha N-i hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ gzhan gyi mi thub pa'i snying po'o/ /\u0f00 bi ma le bi pu le/ dza ya ba re/ dza ya bA hi ni/ a mri te/ bi ra dze/ hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ \u0f00 b+ha ra b+ha ra/ sa~M b+ha ra sa~M b+ha ra/ in+d+ri ya ba la bi

sho d+ha ni/ ru ru tsa le hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ nye ba'i snying po'i rig pa'o/ /\u0f00 ma Ni d+ha ri badzri Ni ma hA pra te sa re hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ rab tu bsang ba'i snying po'o/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' ma lus pa thams cad thabs cig tu

'dus nas sgra dbyangs gcig tu gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gsungs te/ gsang sngags 'di dag ni rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo'-i snying po dang go cha'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd

kyi phyag rgyas btab pa'o/ /'di thos par yang rab tu dka' na yi ger bri ba dang / tshig tu 'don pa dang / klog pa dang / 'chang ba dang / gzhan la yang ston pa lta ci smos te/ de nas sangs rgyas la bya ba byas par rig par bya'o/ /'di ni de

bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rab tu sngags so/ /rjes su yi rang ngo / /lung stan to/ /so sor 'brang ba chen mo gzhan gyi mi thub pa'i gzung 'di mchog du dkon pa'o/ /so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di'-i ming thos
