'phral du rengs par byed/ /sbrul rta ne'u le ma he'i sha /bya rog 'ug sha stong phrag gcig /bsregs pas bsgrub bya 'bye bar nges/ /bra bo 'bras bu ra sha khrag /stong phrag gcig gis lkugs par 'gyur/ /

rnga mong bya rog rgan po'i sha /sA lu dmar til dkar po dang / /yung kar ser po la sogs pa/ /stong du bsreg pas skrod par byed/ /'bru lnga smad 'tshong rang byung gis/ /nam phyed nub tu kha bltas dbyug /me tog pad ma

dang bcas pa'i/ /kha dog dmar dang ldan pa yi/ /'od zer dmar ldan stong phrag gis/ /nges par 'gugs dang dbang du 'gyur/ /til bcas mar gyi sbyin bsreg ni/ /stong phrag byas na sdig pa 'byang / /mar dang dur ba tsan dan

bcas/ /sbyin bsreg stong gis tshe 'phel 'gyur/ /ku sha byang chub shing 'bras bu/ /yungs dkar dkar po lan tshwa yi/ /stong bsregs 'go ba'i nad rnam 'chad/ /yungs kar sha chen phye ma dang / /dur khrod thal ba
dug sna tshogs/ /khro chu phye ma'i sbyin sreg stong / /khros pas byas na lha tshog 'jig /ut+pal dmar dang yang na dkar/ /gur kum bzang po'i sbyin sreg ni/ /stong rtsa brgyad tsam bsreg byas pas/ /
rigs ldan bu mo dbang du 'gyur/ /a ru ra dang yungs kar dang / /ba'i 'o ma stong sregs na/ /rnam thos rgyal po'i gter tsam gyis/ /longs spyod chen po 'thob par byed/ /oM rak+Sha rak+ShaM ku ru oM/

bsrung ba'i sngags so/ /oM shAn+tiM ku ru oM/ thams cad du zhi ba'i sngags so/ /hA bA sha~M ku ru hA/ mtha' dag dbang du bya ba'o/ /swA puSh+Ta~M ku ru swA hA/ thams cad du rgyas par byed pa'i sngags so/ /phaT hU~M mA ra ya mA ra ya hU~M

phaT/ gsod pa'i sngags so/ /baM bi de sha ya baM/ dbye bar byed pa'i sngags so/ /u u tsa Ta ya u/ bskrad par byed pa'i sngags so/ /laM sta~M ba ya/ sta~M ba ya laM/ rengs par byed pa'i sngags so/ /raM dz+wa ra dz+wa ra raM/ rims bskyed pa'i

sngags so/ /dza A kaR+Sha ya hri/ dza/ dgug pa'i sngags so/ /oM pa ra sha pa ta ya pa ta ya oM/ char pa 'bab pa'i sngags so/ /laM shaM laM b+hi staM b+ha ya laM/ ser ba bcad pa'i sngags so/ /dzeM dze te ya dze te ya dze/ zhi bar byed pa'i sngags

so/ /hUM yar yany+tsa/ man+t+ra/ tan+t+ra/ ts+tshin+da/ ts+tshin+da/ bin d+ha bin d+ha/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ zhes pa ni thams cad du rig sngags gcod par byed pa'i sngags so/ /rig pa'i rgyal po bla med ni/ /gsang chen 'di las 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gsang chen rgyud

'di ngo mtshar te/ /rmad byung bas ches rmad du byung / /bstan pa'i snying po gsang chen 'di/ /gsung ba de ma thag tu ni/ /phyogs bcu'i rig sngags 'chang ba rnam/ /ngo mtshar bskyed nas thal mo sbyar/ /bde ba'i snying po shin tu legs/ /

legs so legs so rdo rje 'dzin/ /gang la bde bskyed dpal thob byed/ /bdag cag rnams la thugs rje yi/ /rgyud kyi snying po 'di bshad pa/ /rje chen legs so ngo mtshar che/ /'phag pa rdo rje lu gu brgyud gyi rtog pa las sbyin
sreg gis lega'u ste bzhi pa'o/ /'phag ma rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi rtog pa o rgyan nas 'byung ba rdzogs s+ho// //paN+Di ta a tu la d+ha sa badzra la zhus nas/ bod kyi lo tsa ba mar pa chos kyi dbang

phyugs grag pas bsgyur ba'o/ / @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tsun de de bI nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phag pa lha mo skul byed ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan

'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das lha mo skul byed ma mthu stobs dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang pha rol

gnon pa grub pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsngags shing bstod pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du dge bar mdzod cig /na ma sap+tA nAM/ saM myaka sam bud d+hA ko TI nAM/ tad ya thA/

\u0f00 tsa le tsu le/ tsun de swAhA/ brtson 'grus chen po/ thogs pa med pa 'dul ba/ stobs che ba/ pha rol gnon pa che ba/ phyag na ral gri dang / dgra sta dang / lcags kyu dang / zhags pa bsnams pa/ khro mo chen mo/ khro mo chen mo'i dbang
phyug ma/ drag po'i gzugs can ma/ zhal ras mtha' yas ma/ phyag stong mnga' ma/ ma pham ma/ gzhan gyis mi thub ma/ don yod ma/ gdul bar dka' ma/ mig stong ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin

gyis brlabs ma/ lha thams cad gyis phyag byas shing mchod pa rab tu grub ma/ rdo rje sen mo can/ rdo rje rdo rjes 'dren ma/ rdo rje'i mtshon cha can/ rdo rje'i sku can ma/ rdo rje'i khu tshur ma/ rdo rje'i spyan gdangs pa'i stangs stabs

can ma/ drag shul can ma lags kyang drag shul can du gzug can du sgyur bar ston par mdzad ma/ sku rdo rje dang bai du r+ya'i rgyan kyis brgyan pa/ \u0f00 b+ha ga ba ti/ tsun de hU~M hUM/ /krUm krUm/ mrUM mrUM/ srUm srUm/ rUm rUm/ A be sha ya/

gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ gr-ih+NA pa ya/ gr-ih+NA pa ya/ ha ra ha ra/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ sa ra sa ra/ ma ra ma ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ pa tsa pa tsa/ da ha da ha/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ sdang ba'i gdon dang / rims zhag gcig pa dang / zhag gnyis
pa dang / zhag gsum pa dang / zhag bzhi pa dang / zhag bdun pa dang / rtag pa'i rims dang / yud tsam pa dang / 'byung po dang / ro langs dang / yid dgas dang / sha za dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin

po dang / grul bum gyi gdon dang / mngal las skyes pa dang / las las skyes pa dang / 'gro ba dang / gnas pa 'di dag dang / sdang ba gang dag bdag la 'tshe ba dang / gdug pa de dag thams cad/ sa~M d+ha ya sa~M d+ha ya/ ma rda ya ma rda ya/

sho Sha ya sho Sha ya/ tA pa ya tA pa ya/ uta sa d+ha ya uta sa d+ha ya/ ha na ha na badzra na/ sa ra sa ra daN De na/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ khak+ke na/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ tsU~M tsU~M tsU~M/ drU~M drU~M drU~M/ \u0f00 tsa le tsu le tsun de sarba ar+tha sa d+ha ya swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das
'phags pa lha mo skul byed ma'i mthu dang byin gyi brlabs kyis bdag gnod pa thams cad las dge bar gyur cig swA hA/ 'phags pa lha mo skul byed ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// //

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya dza~M gu li nA ma bid+yA/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dug sel ces bya ba'i rig sngags/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig

na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nga sngon byung ba 'das pa'i

tshe/ byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na/ gangs kyi ri yi byang ngos na/ /spos ngad ldan pa'i ri bo la/ /ri'i rgyal po'i sul gnas tshe/ /gzhon nu bsod nams brgya'i mtshan/ /a na ya yi lpags gyon la/ /sbrul gyis brgyan pa'i

ska rags can/ /gdug pa'i sbrul gyis mgo rgyan byas/ /mthong na gdug pa'i rna rgyan can/ /dug gi me tog rnams za zhing / /ma lu ta'i lcug khu mthung / /nga la de 'bod 'bod du 'jug /bu khyod tshur shog nga las nyon/ /nga la

dug sel ces bya ba/ /dug 'jigs rig sngags dam pa yod/ /dug rnams gang yin de kun ni/ /nga yi ming gis 'jigs par 'gyur/ /tad+ya thA/ oM i li mit+te/ ti li mit+te/ i li ti li mit+te/ dum+be/ dum bA lI ye/ dusme/ dusma li

ye/ tar ke/ ta ka ra Ne/ marme/ marma ra Ne/ ka sh+mI ri/ ka sh+mI ra/ mug te/ a g+he/ a g+ha Ne/ ag+ha na g+ha Ne/ i lI a lI e/ a khA/ I e/ a byA/ i e/ shwe te/ sha ta/ duN+De/ a nu rag+te swA hA/ dge slong dag

nga'i dug sel kyi rig sngags 'di ni sbyin pa thams cad dkar po ste/ sus rig sngags 'di lan gcig thos pa de la lo bdun gyi bar du sbrul mi za'o/ /de'i lus la dug gis mi tshugs so/ /sbrul gang zhig de la 'dzin na de'i mgo shing ardza

ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas so/ /gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag sbrul gyi mdun du brjod par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sbrul de 'chi ba'i phyir ro/ /tad+ya thA/ i la lA/ tsi la lA/ tsakra brak+ko/ kau Da/ ko De Di/ ku ru ta/ ku ru Da ti/

po DA ti/ pu ru dA/ pu ru de ti/ mo De ti/ ni ku ru De/ ni ku ru De/ ni ma mu ru ta/ ni ma mu ru De te/ pu ru de/ phut+ta re ha/ phut+ta phuT+TaT+Ta~M Da ra he/ nA ga rA he/ na gat+ta da taN+Da ra he/ sarba ra he/ sarba tat+ta da ra ha/ ats+tshi ats+tshi/ pu ru Ta ta/ tsa la bi She/ shI te/ shI tA/ ban d+ha

le/ mA tA le/ ha le ha le/ ha la ha la/ ha la le/ e la le/ ke pa tsa le/ mi la le/ taN+Di haN+Di/ ta Ta ta Ta/ s+phu Ta s+phu Ta/ phaT Ta phaT Ta/ ha ra bi shwa swA hA/ dge slong dag de ltar na dug sel gyis 'byung po 'dus pa thams cad la rig sngags gang brjod

cing bsnyad pa de dag thams cad ni de bzhin no/ /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin no/ /yang dag pa'o/ /bden pa'o/ /ma nor ba'o/ /phyin ci ma log pa'o/ /dug 'di mi gdug par gyur cig /sbyin par byed pa'i gan du song shig /'dzin pa'i gan du song shig /

me'i nang du song shig /chu'i nang du song shig /thang la song shig /ka ba'i nang du song shig /brtsig pa'i nang du song shig /nam mkha' la song shig /sa'i nang du song shig /zhi bar gyur cig swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'
stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //'phags pa dug sel ces bya ba'i rigs sngags rdzogs s+ho// //

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya hi ra N+ya pa tI nA ma d+ha ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dbyig dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos

pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan na la ba dkar po lta bu'i rdo leb la byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag du ma thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa/ skye ba
gcig gis thogs pa sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po legs par gnas la bka' stsal pa/ legs par gnas byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po gang dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di 'dzin par mi 'dod pa des/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma mthong ngo / /ma thos so/ /ma myong ngo / /gang gis 'di ltar de bzhin

gshegs pa rnams mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / myong ba des gzungs thob bo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar legs par gnas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bdag gis bsod nams byas so zhes mi 'dzin/ bdag gis

bsod nams ma yin pa dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas so zhes mi 'dzin to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar legs par gnas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gzungs 'dzin par mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog go/ byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs thob pa ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la dngos por ram/ mtshan nyid du mi rtog /yongs su mi rtog ste/ rkyen du ma yin/ rkyen med par ma yin/ 'gro bar ma yin/

'gro ba med par ma yin/ 'chi 'pho bar ma yin/ skye bar ma yin/ stong par ma yin/ mi stong bar ma yin/ mtshan mar ma yin/ mtshan ma med par ma yin/ smon par ma yin/ smon pa med par ma yin/ skye bar ma yin/ 'gag

par ma yin no/ /legs par gnas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang mtha' 'dis spyod pa de ni ye shes la gnas pa zhes bya'o/ /gang gi tshe ye shes la gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o/ /

gang gi tshe mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de'i tshe dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs len cing kun chub par byed la 'dzin te/ don nam tshig 'bru yang yongs su zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /yongs su ma brtags pa'i tshul khrims can yang yin te/

bden pa'i tshul khrims dang / rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims can no/ /ma brtags pa'i chos can yin te/ bden pa'i chos can dang / rnam par dag pa'i chos can no/ /gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog cing rang gi chos la zhugs so/ /

sangs rgyas la lhag par bya ba byas pa'o/ /rig pa'i cho ga la zhugs pa'o/ /legs par gnas de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi chags so/ /mi 'chang ngo / /mi 'grol 'o/ /legs par gnas gang gi tshe/

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi chags/ mi 'chang / mi 'grol ba de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi rigs dang / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rig sngags kyi ming gzhan

gyi gsang sngags bzhi rnams kyis dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs thob bo/ /tad+ya thA/ ku Ta ku Ti/ ku tsA la/ e lA i mi ri to/ ko thA lA/ i re ri/ i mi ri Ni/ legs par gnas 'di dag ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

kyi rig sngags kyi ming gzhan no/ /ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi rig sngags kyi ming gzhan no/ /legs par gnas dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas

bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yum mo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'das pa'i don la mi gnas/ ma 'ong pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i don la mi gnas pa'i phyir ro/ /legs par gnas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la dbyig dang

ldan pa'i gzungs 'di 'dzin pa des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byas pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa dag gis bsgrags pa dang / khong du chud par byas

pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa yin no/ /legs par gnas dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa dag 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mnyes par byas/ bsnyen bkur byas/ mchod pa byas so/ /bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed do/ /

snyam du shes par bya'o/ /su zhig bsam pa gang gis dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di 'dzin pa de la de nye bar gnas par 'gyur te/ shes rab 'dod pa la shes rab dang / gzungs 'dod pa la gzungs dang / dbyig 'dod pa la dbyig

dang / thos pa 'dod pa la thos pa nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ /'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ zla ba yar gyi ngo la nyi ma shar kar 'bras sA lu'i chan dang 'o mar spags te bza'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi rig sngags 'di dag dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan

'das rnams kyi rig sngags kyi ming gzhan dag rgyun du yid la bya'o/ /'on kyang gsang sngags bzhi dag gi mthu gang dag gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag na 'khod pa'i lha ma yin nam/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ mi 'am

ci 'am/ lto 'phye chen po 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ yi dgas sam/ grul bum 'am/ sha za 'am/ mi 'am/ mi ma yin pa de dag la sems dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /bar chad byed par mi 'gyur/ rtag tu yongs su bzung bar 'gyur/ byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' bzang dang / yangs pa chen po dang / lag na rdo rje dang / yongs su dga' ldan dang / ri dben pa la gnas pa dang / gangs ri la gnas pas kyang yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /'og min gyi bar gyi

byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis kyang 'di lta ste/ dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs kyi mthus 'jigs pa 'am/ dgon par de la byin gyis rlob par 'gyur/ de la mi 'jigs pa sbyin par 'gyuro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ldan na la ba

dkar po lta bu'i rdo leb la bzhugs shing / de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po legs par gnas dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag du ma de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis

gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa dbyig dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang
bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ya sho ba tI d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa grags ldan ma'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad

la phyag 'tshal lo/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma A r+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ tad+ya thA/ dz+wa re ma hA dz+wa re/ du khe muk+ti su sa~M pan+ne/ ma hA sa~M pan+ne/ sa~M pat+ti/ ma hA sa~M pat+ti/ ka se ma hA ka se/ kats+tsha dz+wa ra mug+te si

swA hA/ skud pa 'am chu la lan gsum sngags na rims las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki ti shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tad+ya thA/ tsi li tsi li/ mi li mi li/ rak+Sha rak+Sha mA~M/ Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra

swA hA/ gdon thams cad la tshon sna lnga'i skud pa 'am skud pa dmar po la lan gsum du sngags te mdud pa gsum bor la bcings na bar du gcod pa zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA

ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ki li ki li/ tsi li tsi li/ ni gi le swA hA/ 'bru mar la lan gsum sngags te bskus na skran 'tsho'o/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/

tad+ya thA/ sa re sa re/ bi sa re/ bi sa re/ sa ra nA sha ni swA hA/ shi ba'i rna bar lan gsum bzlas na sos par 'gyur ro/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ni si re ni si re/ ka la mi mi re/

ka la ri tsi ri/ ba tsi le swA hA/ lba ba dang / lkog ma'i lha gor na ba dang / lce kyi ba na ba dang / gdon nad thams cad la 'ji ba~M la lan gsum du sngags te bskus na phan no/ /na mo rata tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ badzra pA Ni d+h+ya ma/

\u0f00 o krA rA pra b+ha be/ b+ha ga ba ti bud+he/ pra ti bud+he/ shud+he shAn+ti ka ri/ ha na ha na/ ma ma pA pa ma/ da ha da ha/ ma ma pA pa da~M/ pa tsa pa tsa ma ma pA pa kaM/ oM o De/ gra sa gra sa/ ri te De ri te De/ shAn+ta~M ka rI ye swA hA/ shu b+ha ka rI ya swA hA/ k+She ma ka ri

ya swA hA/ rims nad kyis btab pa la byab pa byas na rims nad sos par 'gyur ro/ /sman la sngags kyis btab ste blud na nad pa sos par 'gyur ro/ /zas la sngags kyis btab ste zos na dug mi gnod par 'gyur ro/ /
'byung po'i gdon gyis zin pa rnams la bu mos bkal ba'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags te bcings na thar bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa grags ldan ma'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// //

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA dza ya ba tI nA ma ma hA bid+yA rA dzA/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das lus 'phags ri la bzhugs te/ de'i tshe 'byung po rnams 'khrug par gyur nas/ ma dad pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'

lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srul po dang / lus srul po dang / grul bum rnams 'khrugs shing khros te/ dge slong rnams dang / dge slong ma rnams dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams gang dag sangs rgyas

dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa de dag la gnod par byed de de'i tshe ku cho'i sgra chen po byung bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po'i shugs kyis yang dag par zin nas phyogs bzhir rnam par

gzigs na/ phyogs bzhi nas glog las ser ba dang / char cher 'bab pa dang / skar mda' ltung ba 'ong ba gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang rdo rje 'chang la brda mdzad do/ /de nas rdo rje 'chang gtum po khros te/ stan

las langs nas shar phyogs su rdo rje 'bar ba stong mngon par sprul te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /'byung po'i tshogs nga la nyon cig /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi spyan sngar bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs

'di bya'o/ /da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung po gtum po mi rnams la rnam par 'tshe ba dang / lo tog dag kyang ma rungs par byed pa gang dag 'byung ba de dag gi don gyi phyir ngas rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams

brjod par bya'o/ /tad+ya thA/ gi ri gi ri badzra/ ha la ha la badzra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la badzra/ ha na ha na badzra/ da ha da ha badzra/ pa tsa pa tsa badzra/ sarba b+hU tA nA~M/ b+h+rA ma ya b+h+rA ma ya/ b+ho b+ho badzra d+ha ra badzri Na/ pA ta ya pA ta ya/ shI g+h+ra~M shI g+h+ra~M/

ma tha ma tha/ pra ma tha pra ma tha/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ dz+wa la ya/ nA ga b+ha bA nA~M ban d+ha ban+d+ha/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ shar phyogs bcing bar bya'o/ /rdo rje snying po 'di byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /su zhig gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag las 'gal

bar byed pa'i mgo bo 'gas par 'gyur ro/ /snying 'gas par 'gyur ro/ /snying 'grum par 'gyur ro/ /badzra ya swA hA/ ma hA badzra ya swA hA/ badzra b+hai ra bA ya swA hA/ a pra ti ha ta ba la pA rA gra mo badzra d+ha ra A dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ de nas rdo rje

khro bo stan las langs te lho phyogasu rnam par bltas nas khros te/ gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gsang ba'i bdag po deng nyid lho phyogs kyi klu thams cad thal bar brlag go/ lus srul po

thams cad kyi bar gyi gnas rnams 'bar bar bya'o/ /klu thams cad kyi gnas rnams dkrug par bya'o/ /yang smras pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po bdag gi rdo rje lha ma yin dang / klu thams cad nas lus srul po'i bar thams cad dang /

mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar thams cad rmugs par byed pa'i rdo rje/ rengs par byed pa'i rdo rje/ rmongs par byed pa'i rdo rje/ lce 'bab par byed pa'i rdo rje/ mgo 'gems par byed pa'i rdo rje/ snying 'gas par byed pa'i rdo rje/ 'di lho phyogs su gzhag

par bya ste/ da ltar byung ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na klu gnod par sems pa rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ro/ /tad+ya thA/ sa ra sa ra/ bi sa ra bi sa ra/ A bar+d+d+hA ya/ sa~M go tsa la/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ d+ho na d+ho na d+ho na/ d+hu na d+hu na d+hu na/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ sarba

pA she na mo ha ya/ dzam+b+ha ya/ stam+b+ha ya/ ha sa ha sa ha sa/ san+t+rA sa ya/ sarba duSh+T+ra nA~M/ badzra d+ha ra/ A dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ de nas rdo rje pho nya mos lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus

na gang dag gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag las 'gal bar bgyid na bdag gis kyang nub phyogs kyi klu thams cad nas lus srul po'i bar thams cad kyi gnas rnams rnam par gtor ro/ /snying rnams dgrum mo/ /tad+ya thA/ ki li

ki li/ mi li mi li/ tra Ta tra Ta/ b+ha Ta b+ha Ta/ spo Ta ya spo Ta ya/ dz+wa la ya dz+wa la ya/ dU te da ya~M/ sho ShA ya/ gang zhig gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag las 'gal bar byed na/ kye mdung rtse gsum pa 'bar ba 'dis de'i snying la me lce 'bar

bar byed do/ /hU~M hU~M hU~M/ badzra d+ha re badzre na/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ badzra du ti/ rA dz+nya pa ya ti swA hA/ de nas lha mo chen po rdo rje lu gu rgyud g.yog nyi khri dang bcas pa stan las langs nas byang phyogs su rnam par bltas te/ gsang

ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po g.yog nyi khri dang ldan pa dag gis kyang byang phyogs kyi klu gnod par seMs dpa' nas lus srul po gnod par sems pa'i bar dag la bzlog par bgyid do/ /

da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gang dag sems can rnams la rnam par 'tshe ba dang / lo tog kyang ma rungs par bgyid de dag gi don gyi slad du gsang sngags gzhi mi zad pa dag kyang brjod par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ hi li hi li/ mi li mi li/

tsi li tsi li/ d+ha ga d+ha ga /d+hU ma d+hU ma/ d+hu na d+hu na/ ma tha ma tha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ ha ha ha ha/ badzra du ti mo ha ya/ dzam+b+ha ya/ stam+b+ha ya/ sarba nA gA nA~M/ sarba a hi te Sha No/ badzra Ni bud+d+ha mai trai/ b+harma sat+ye na/

in+d+ra sat+ye na/ in+d+ra ba le na/ lo ka pA la/ pra b+ha be na/ dza~M b+ha yA mi/ sarba nA gA nA~M stam+b+ha yA mi/ sarba i ha te Shi No/ ba ru na pA she na/ ban+d+ha yA mi/ sarba nA gA~M nA in+d+ra tsi le nA~M/ sarba a hi he Shi Na tsha ga li ka ro mi/ ka ra ka ra/

ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ badzra sha~M ka le swA hA/ ba'i lci bas dkyil 'khor bskus te/ me tog bkram la/ a ka ru dang / tsan dan gyi bdug pas bdugs te/ kha shar phyogs su bltas la bzlas brjod brgyad stong bya'o/ /de ltar

'grub par 'gyur te de'i 'og tu las gang 'dod pa de bya'o/ /skud pa nag pos ni rims nad sel to/ /shing+ka ra bi ra'i lcug mas ni sprin bzlog go/ chu'i nang du 'dug na ni dran par bya'o/ /gcan zan khro bo'i nang na 'dug na ni gos

kyi mtha' ma mdud pa bor ro/ /lto sbos na ni tsha chus zhi bar byed do/ /so na ba la skud pas zhi bar byed do/ /sna ma'i me tog brgyad brgya me tog re re nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtor to/ /nyi ma bdun na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong

bar 'gyur ro/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mash+tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ a pra ti ha ta pa la pA rA krA ma ye/ na maHsarba badzra ku la bid+yA/ de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i rigs lnga brgyas yongs su
bskor zhing mdun du bdar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das

sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ sems can thams cad la sman pa'i don dang / mi'i rgyal po rnams la sman pa dang / bde bar bgyi ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can

zhes bgyi ba 'di bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di bka' stsal to/ / lag na rdo rje rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba

can 'di ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas gsungs shing byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ ngas kyang da thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung nas sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar bya ba'i phyir bshad kyis khyod

kyis zung shig /tad+ya thA/ dza ye dza ye dza ye/ ma hA dza ye/ dza ya bA ha ni ye bud+d+ha a d+he Sh+Thi te/ d+harma a ba b+hA sa ni/ bud+ha a d+hi ga me dz+nyA a ba b+ha se swAhA/ lag na rdo rje 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi bo nas dbang bskur

ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams te/ lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas spyi bos nas dbang bskur ba'i gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag gang gi lus la yod pa dang / gleg bam la yod par gyur pa de'i lus la phyir rgol

ba rnams kyi dpag tshad brgya tshun chad gnod par byar mi chud do/ /mtshon dang / dug dang / dbyig dug dang / byad kyis mi tshugaso/ /mi'i bdag po dbang po de'i yul der pha rol gyi dmag tshogs mi 'ong ngo / /yul 'khor der phyir

rgol ba'i dpung gis mi chud par 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje rigs kyi bu gang la la zhig gis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di yi ger bris te 'chang ba de ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du de'i lus la dug dang /

mtshon dang / chu dang / dbyig dug dang / sbyar ba las byung ba'i dug gzhan gyis kyang mi tshugs so/ /dgra'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo / /de la rnam par 'tshe ba dang / mtho 'tsham pa mi 'byung ngo / /rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang / chom rkun

gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo / /g.yul ngor zhugs na yang lus la mtshon gyis mi phog go/ thams cad du rgyal ba smra bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di'i gzi brjid dang / mthu dang / byin gyi brlabs kyis

thogs pa med cing ma smad ma smas par rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /tad+ya thA/ dza ye dza ye dza ye/ ma hA dza ye/ dza yot+ta me/ d+harma a ba b+hA sa ni/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ bo d+ha ni bo d+ha ni/ ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Thi te/ a ba ro ha Ni/ a ba ro ha Ni/ A ba A ba ro pya

ni/ dza ya ku su me/ swA re swA ra ba ti/ driD+d+he driD+d+he driD+d+he/ draD+d+ha pA sha ni dat+ta/ o ha ni/ mo ha ni/ dzam+b+ha ni/ stam+b+hi ni/ dzam+b+hi ni/ stam+b+hi ni/ mo hi ni/ sarba he he+e shi nan/ na mo b+ha ga ba ti/ bud+d+ha s+ya ma hA kA ru Na/ bi hA ri ni/ sid+d+h+yan+tu/ man+t+ra pA da ni swA hA/ de nas

bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs dang / bdag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can

gyi gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ dza ya dza ya dza ya/ pa Ta pa Ta pa Ta/ dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la/ badzri Ni/ pra ha ra pra ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ha ra ha ra ha ra/ b+har/ b+har/ b+har b+har/ ta ra ta ra/ dza ya

ku su me/ ba la ba la/ tsakra tsakra/ pI Da ya pI Da ya/ a kra ma a kra ma/ bi kra mi/ a tsa le/ ma tsa le/ kha ga tsA ri ni/ ni las sa ni/ badzra pra ha ra ni/ badzra sam+b+ha be/ badzra kA li/ bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi ti/ bud+ha rash+mi/ ma hA pra b+ha be uts+tsha skan+d+he/

ma hA ti tsa ba ti/ a le pa tsa le/ d+hu na d+hu na d+hu na/ kang ka kang ka re/ ka si ni sa ma he te d+harma a ba b+hA sa ni/ tsa ra tsa ra tsa ra/ g+hu g+hu de/ badzra mA lA d+ha ri/ sa ra sa ra sa ra/ kA lA tsA ra Ni swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi gsang sngag kyi gzhi 'di

dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus gsungs pa lags te/ gang dag rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di las 'gal bar bgyid pa de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la 'khu ba lagaso/ /
'di lta ste/ lha 'am/ klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po 'am/ yi dgas sam/ sha za 'am/ grul bum 'am/ grib gnon nam/ brjed byed dam/ gshed byed dam/ byad dam/ ro langs sam/ bkra mi shis pa

'am/ ma mo'i gdon nam/ gong du yang gdon gzhan nam/ skem byed kyi gdon nam/ gshin rje'i gdon yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad rmugs pa dang / rengs pa dang / rmongs par gyur cig /tad+ya thA/ badzre badzre badzre/ ha

na badzre/ na hi na badzra/ khA da khA da/ khA da badzre Ni s+phA Ta ya/ s+phA Ta ya/ badzre Na e Ta~M gra ha/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ gra sa gra sa gra sa/ pA ta ya pA ta ya pA ta ya/ d+ha me/ d+ha d+ha me/ d+hu d+hu me/ 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa thams cad dang /

g.yul 'gyed pa dang / khrag khrug dang / 'thab pa dang / thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad las bdag la srungs shig /srungs shig /rgyal bar mdzad ma rgyal bar mdzod cig /ta ra ta ra ta ra/ ma hA ba ta ra Ne/

ku Te ku Te/ mu ku te/ badzra ku te swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ lag na rdo rje legs so legs so/ /sems can thams cad kyi don dang /

phan pa dang / bde bar bya ba dang / snying brtse ba'i phyir zhugs te/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di smras pa ni sems can chen po lag na rdo rje khyod yang legaso/ /lag na rdo rje rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal

ba can 'di su'i lag na yod pa dang / lus la yod pa dang / glegs bam la yod pa dang / grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ gnas khang ngam/ 'chag sa'am/

dgon pa'i gnas na yod pa der rgyal po chen po rnaMs thos kyi bu tshogs kyi g.yog 'khor dang bcas te/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / yul de la srung ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /yul der pha rol gyi dmag tshogs mi 'ong ngo / /mi ngas mi 'ong ngo / /dgra mi 'byung ngo / /sa phyogs

der rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu tshogs kyi g.yog dang bcas te/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / yul de la bsrung ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /yul der pha rol gyi dmag tshogs mi 'ong ngo / /dgra mi 'byung ngo / /sa phyogs der rgyal po chen po rnam

thos kyi bu gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu rgyu zhing der bsrung ba dang / yongs su skyob pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa dang / yongs su skyong ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legasu 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spong ba dang / mtshon cha

dug gzhil ba dang / dug bsad pa dang / dug gzhig pa dang / mi mdza' ba bzlog pa dang / mtshams bcad pa dang / sa bcing ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /tad+ya thA/ ta pa ne/ ta pa ne/ ta pa ne/ pra ta pa ne/ pra ta pa ne/ pra ta pa ne/ d+hu ru me d+hu ru me d+hu ru me/

ma hA d+hu ru me/ bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te/ mu khe mu khe su mu khe/ swa la pra ti sa mA d+hi sa mA d+hi gar+b+he/ mA na si/ phu ru phu ru/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ bud+d+ha mA na si ke swA hA/ lag na rdo rje 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas spyi bos nas dbang bskur ba'o/ /gsang ba'i

gnaso/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang chen no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /lag na rdo rje mi'i rgyal po gang la la zhig gis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can zhes bya ba 'di glegs

bam la legs par bris te 'chang ngam/ lus la yod par byas te 'chang ngam/ spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / me tog sna tshogs kyi rgyan rnams kyis de la bsti stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed cing mchod na/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu

gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang / lhan cig tu mi'i rgyal po de'i phyi bzhin du 'brang zhing / phyir rgol ba thams cad las bsrung ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /mi'i bdag po dbang po de la dgra dag pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis glags mi

rnyed do/ /yul der pha rol gyi dpung mi 'jug go/ 'jug na yang de dag la rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu bgegs byed par 'gyur te/ bgegs sna tshogs stong dag byed par 'gyur ro/ /mi'i rgyal po de dag gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der rig sngags kyi rgyal mo

chen mo rgyal ba can zhes bya ba 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te mdun du gzhag par bya'o/ /gang du g.yul 'gyed dam/ dgra chen po dang 'thab pa der yang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can zhes bya ba 'di mgul du btags te g.yul

ngor zhugs na/ der rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de la gnod pa 'dis gnod par byed de/ de pham par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can zhes bya ba 'di su'i mgul du thogs pa de ni rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje grong

ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/ gtsug lag khang gang du nad 'go ba sna tshogs dang / mi ngas mi bzad pa chen po byung ba der rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di la me tog sna tshogs kyi bla re bres la gtor ma'i

cho ga gzhong khung bzhi ro bro ba sna tshogs kyis bkang ste phyogs bzhir bzhag la/ de rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di bklags na der rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu tshogs kyi g.yog 'khor dang bcas te gnod sbyin bye ba khrag

khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu nad 'go ba dang / mi ngas de rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di'i gong na rig sngag ches stobs dang ldan pa

'am gzi brjid che ba 'aM rdzu 'phrul che ba 'aM mthu che ba ni gang ya~M ma mchis te/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di ni rig sngags thams cad kyi mchog lags so/ /yul gang dag tu spyod par 'gyur ba'i gnas de dag tu sangs rgyas kyi mdzad

pa bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /tad+ya thA/ badzre badzre/ a mi ta badzre/ dz+wa li ta badzra/ hu ta sha ni/ b+hany+dza b+hanadza/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ dzam+b+ha ya/ dzram+b+ha ya/ stam+b+ha ya/ sam+b+ha ya/ sarba duSh+Tha gra hA nA~M/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ gra sa gra sa gra sa/ pa Ta pa Ta pa Ta/

ta Ta ta Ta ta Ta/ mu ru mu ru mu ru/ d+ha ma d+ha ma d+ha ma/ dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la/ khu khu re/ khu khu re/ khu khu re/ khu khu me/ khu khu me/ khu khu me/ g+ho ri/ g+ho ri/ g+ho ri/ badzra mA na si/ badzra hu ti/ phu ru phu ru phu ru/ gra sa gra sa gra sa/ sarba

i ti te shi nA~M/ su ru me/ mu mu le/ badzra pra ti pa ti/ sarba ba le phu swA hA/ a lu pa la ni tsu tsu re swA hA/ dza ye dza ye/ dza ya sam+b+ha be swA hA/ dza yot+ta me swA hA/ dza ya ba re te swA hA/ dza yan+d+ha re swA hA/ dza ya ma ni swA hA/ dza ya bi dzA ya

swA hA/ a dzi ta badzra ya swA hA/ ma hA badzra hu ta sha nA ya swA hA/ a mo g+ha badzra hastA ya swA hA/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/

bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bsrung ba stsal bar bgyi ste/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde

legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / mi mdza' ba bzlog pa dang / dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad dgag pa dang / 'thab pa dang / thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / g.yul

'gyed pa dang / khrag 'khrug thams cad dang / 'jigs pa thams cad dgag par bgyi'o/ /mtshams gcad par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ dza ye dza ye dza ye/ ma hA dza ye/ mi li mi li/ mA na si/ dz+hu dz+hu dz+hu/ dz+hu ru me/ mu ru mu ru/ tu Tu tu Tu tu Tu/

mu lu le swA hA/ mArga ba tI d+hu d+hu me be ge/ be ga d+ha ri Ni/ te dza ba ti/ 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad las bdag la srung shig srung shig swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das

gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus gsungs shing / byin gyis brlabs pa lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ bud+ha bu d+ha/ bud+ha bud+ha/ bud+ha bud+ha/ ba tI/ bud+d+ha a ba b+hA sa ni/ d+harma ba tI/ ma hi te/

sa mA d+hi garbe/ bud+d+ha a ti ga me bud+d+ha bi hA re+e/ rdarma a ba b+hA sa ne swA hA/ gang la la zhig rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di las 'gal bar bgyid na/ de'i mgo sid+d+ha ka bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas par

'gyur ro/ /su zhig rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can zhes bgyi ba 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / mchod pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ rgyal

po'i pho brang ngam/ gtsug lag khang du gleg bam gnas par bgyid na/ der tshogs kyi g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu rig sngag 'chang de'i slad bzhin 'brang zhing dpag tshad brgya stong tshun

chad du slar rgol ba dang / dgra rnams las thams cad du bsrung ba dang / mtshams bcad par bgyi'o/ /g.yul 'gyed pa dang / khrag khrug dang / 'thab pa dang / thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad bsal bar bgyi'o/ /

slar bzlog par bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rgyal po chen po legs so legs so/ /sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / snying rtse ba dang / bstan pa

bsrung ba'i phyir zhugs pa ni sems can chen po sems can thams cad la phan pa byed pa khyod yang legs so/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'dis su la bsrung ba byas pa dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bskyang

ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba byas pa de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs so/ /dug dang / dbyig dug dang / byad dang / gshed byed dang / rims nad nas gdon thams cad kyi bar gyis de la mi tshugs so/ /pha rol gyi gnod

pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa yin no/ /lag na rdo rje khyod kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can zhes bya ba 'di zung shig /

chongs shig /lhogs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /lag na rdo rje phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa'i dus kyi tshe/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po mdangs 'phrog pa drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa/

shin du mi zad pa dag dang / chos ma yin pa spyod pa'i rgyal po tshe thung ba chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de'i tshe rig sngag kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di sems kyi rgyud mi mnyam pa/ mi zad pa'i sems

dang ldan pa de dag dang / sems can sdang ba thams can kyi don dang / tshar gcod par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thaMcad rnaMs par 'jom par byed pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum

phrag du mas gsungs shing byin gyis brlabs te phyag rgyas btab pa yin no/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di ni lha thams cad kyis phyag byas pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba po'i bdag

po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnams grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar bzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di

de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang phyag rgya zhes bya bar zung shig /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thaMcad rnaMs par 'joms par byed pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces

bka' stsal nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/
bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can zhes bya ba/ rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzi na mi tra dang /
dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya dza ya ba tI ni nA ma d+ha ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rgyal ba can zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig

na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong stong du tshang ba'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das ga la ba

der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sems can thams cad la sman pa dang / mi'i rgyal po rnams la sman pa dang bde ba'i slad

du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can zhes bgyi ba 'di bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde

dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje khyod kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du

mas gsungs pa/ byin gyis brlabs pa/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / snying brtse ba'i phyir nga yang da ltar 'chad pa 'di zung shig /tad+ya thA dza ye dza ye/ ma hA dza ya ba tI ye/ bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te ye/ d+harma a ba b+hA

sa ni/ bud+d+ha a d+hi ga me dz+nyA na a ba b+hA se swA hA/ lag na rdo rje 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams te/ lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i tshig

'di dag gang gis lus la btags sam/ glegs bam la bris pa de'i lus dpag tshad stong tshun chad du phyir rgol ba'i gnod pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /mtshon dang / dug dang / dbyig dug gis mi tshugs so/ /rgyal

po de'i yul der pha rol gyi gnod pa mi 'byung ngo / /phyir rgol ba dag yul 'khor der mthus gnod par mi 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di

yi ger bris te 'chang ba de ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du de'i lus la mtshon dang / dug dang / chu dang / rims dang / dug sbyar ma gzhan gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /de la dgra'i 'jigs pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / mtho 'tsham

pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung / chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung / thab mo'i nang du song yang de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi phog /thams cad du yang nga rgyal ba smra bar 'gyur/ gnod pa

med cing ma snad la ma rmas par rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di'i mthu dang / gzi brjid dang / stobs dang / byin gyi brlabs kyis rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /tad+ya thA/ dza ye dza ye/ dza yod me/ d+harma a ba b+hA sa ni/

bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ bo d+ha ni/ bo d+ha ni/ bo d+ha ni/ ta thA ga ta/ a d+hi Sh+Thi ti/ a b+ha ro ha Ni/ a ro bya ni/ dza ya ku su me/ swa re/ sa ra ba tI/ dr-iD+he dr-iD+he/ da da dr-iD+he pA sha ri bad+d+he/ o ha ni/ mo ha ni/ dzam+b+ha ni/ stam+b+ha ni/ stam+b+hi ta/

sarba a hi ti ShI NA~M/ na mo b+ha ga ba ti/ bud+d+ha s+ya/ ma hA ka ru NA~M/ bi ha ri ni/ sid+d+h+yan man+t+ra pa dA swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das sang+yas kyi mthu dang /

sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis bdag gis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ dza ya dza ya dza ya/ pa Ta pa Ta pa Ta/ dz+wa la

dz+wa la dz+wa la/ badzra pra ha ra pra ha ra/ pra ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ha ra ha ra ha ra/ b+ha ra b+ha ra b+ha ra/ dza ya ku su me/ ba la ba la/ tsakra tsakra/ pI Da ya pI Da ya/ a kra ma a kra ma/ bi kra me bi kra me/ a tsa le/ ma tsa le/ kha ga tsA ri Ni/ nI la ba tI/ badzra pra

ha ra ni/ badzra sam+b+ha be/ badzra kA ye bud+d+ha a d+hi Sh+Thi te/ bud+d+ha da raSh+mi raSh+mi ma hA pra b+he/ uts+tsha skan+d+he/ ma hA te dza ba tI/ ma tsa le/ ma tsa le/ d+hu na d+hu na d+hu na/ ka kang re/ kA si ni/ sa mA hi te/ d+harma a ba b+hA sa ni/ tsa ra tsa ra/ g+hu g+hu De/ badzra

mA lA d+ha ni/ sa ra sa ra/ kA la ba ri NI swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus gsungs pa ste/ su zhig rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di las 'da'

bar bgyid pa de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la 'khus par 'gyur ro/ /'di lta ste/ lha 'am/ klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po 'am/ yi dgas sam/ sha za 'am/ brjed byed dam/ gsod byed dam/ byad dam/

ro langs sam/ bkra mi shis pa 'am/ ma mo'i gdon nam/ gong ma'i gdon nam/ skem byed dam/ skem byed kyi gdon nam/ dri za'i gdon de dag thams cad rmugs par bgyis so/ /rengs par bgyis so/ /tad+ya thA/ badzre badzre

badzre/ ha na badzre/ ni ha na badzre/ khA da khA da badzre Ni/ s+phA Ta ya/ s+phA Ta ya/ badzre Ne/ i da~M gri ha na/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ gra sa gra sa gra sa/ pA ta ya/ pA ta ya/ pA ta ya/ d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha ra/ bdag dang sems can thams cad 'jigs

pa dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / thab mo dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig /dza ya ka ri/ dza ya ku ru/ ta ra ta ra ta ra/ ma hA ta ra ni/ ku Te ku Te ku Te/ badzra ku Ti swA hA/ de nas bcoM

ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ lag na rdo rje legs so legaso/ /lag na rdo rje sems can chen po khyod seMs can rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / snying brtse ba'i phyir zhugs pa yang

legs so/ /lag na rdo rje rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di su'i lag tu song ste/ lus la btags sam/ gleg bam la bris sam/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ gnas khang ngam/

'chag sa na spyod par 'gyur ba der rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i tshogs kyi g.yog dang bcas par grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ yul de bsrung bar 'gyuro/ /yul der pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis gnod par

mi 'gyur ro/ /sa phyogs der mi ngas mi 'byung ngo / /dgra mi 'byung ngo / /rgyal po chen po rnaM thos kyi bu gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag phyi bzhin 'brang ba dang / lhan cig der bsrung ngo / /yongs su bskyab bo/ /yongs su 'dzin to/ /zhi ba dang bde leg

su 'gyur bar byed do/ /chad pa spongs ngo / /mtshon cha spong ngo / /dug gsod do/ /mi mdza' ba 'gog go/ mtshams gcod do/ /sa gcod do/ /tad+ya thA/ ta pa ni ta pa ni/ pra ta pa na/ d+hu ru me/ d+hu ru me/ bud+d+ha a d+hi Sh+Thi te/ mu khe/ mu khe/ su

mu khe/ su mu khe/ spa la pra te/ sa mA d+hi te/ sa mA d+hi gar+b+he/ gar+b+he/ mA na si/ phu ru phu ru phu ru d+hu ru/ bud+d+ha mA na si ke swA hA/ lag na rdo rje 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'o/ /gsang ba'i gnas so/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung ba'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /lag na rdo rje mi'i rgyal po gang la la zhig gis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di glegs bam la legs par

bris te 'chang ngam/ lus la btags te 'chang zhing de la spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / me tog sna tshogs kyi lhab lhub kyis bsti stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed na/ mi'i rgyal po de la rgyal po chen po rnam

thos kyi bu gnod sbyin phyi bzhin 'brang ba/ bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu bsrung bar 'gyuro/ /mi'i rgyal po de la phyir rgol ba dang / dgra dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad kyis glags mi rnyed do/ /mthus yul der

'jug pa dang / bgegs 'jug na yang rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu bgegs sna tshogs brgya dang / bgegs sna tshogs stong byed par 'gyur ro/ /mi'i rgyal po gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di

rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te mdun du bkur bar bya'o/ /gang du g.yul ngor 'jug gam/ dgra chen po dang 'thab pa der rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di mgul du btags te/ g.yul ngor zhugs na der rgyal po chen

po rnam thos kyi bus pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de pham par byed par 'gyuro/ /de ni rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di su'i mgul du btags pa de rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje grong ngam/ grong

khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gang du gal te nad 'go ba sna tshogs dang / mi ngas mi zad pa chen po byung na der rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di dang me tog sna tshogs dang / cho ga dang / gtor

ma dang / bum pa btung ba sna tshogs kyis bkang ba bzhi phyogs bzhir bzhag ste/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can bklags na de'i tshe rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu tshogs kyi g.yog dang bcas shing / gnod sbyin

bye ba khrag khrig 'buM phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu nad 'go ba dang / mi ngas de rab tu zhi bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan la gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di las

lhag pa'i rig sngags ches stobs dang ldan pa 'am/ gzi brjid che ba'am/ rdzu 'phrul che ba 'am/ mthu che ba gang yang ma mchis so/ /rig sngags thams cad kyi mchog rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di yul

gang dang gang du spyod par 'gyur ba'i gnas de dang de dag tu sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad par 'gyur ro/ /tad+ya thA/ badzre badzre badzre/ a mr-i ta badzre/ dz+wa la ta badzre/ hU tA sha ni/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ dzam+b+ha/ stam+b+ha ya/ sarba

gra hA NA~M/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ gra sa gra sa gra sa/ pa Ta pa Ta pa Ta/ ta Ta ta Ta ta Ta/ mu ru mu ru mu ru/ d+ha ma d+ha ma d+ha ma/ dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la/ khu khu me/ khu khu me/ g+ho ri g+ho ri g+ho ri/ badzra mA na si/ badzra hu ti/ hu ti ru/ phu ru phu ru/ gra sa gra sa/

sarba a hi ti Shi NA~M/ nA bu ru Ni/ mu mu le/ badzra pra dI pa ni/ tsa ma le phu swA hA/ A yuHpA la ni tsu tsu re swA hA/ dza ye dza ye/ dza ya sam+b+ha be swA hA/ dza yot+ta me swA hA/ dza ya ba re de swA hA/ dza yan+d+ha re swA hA/ dza ya mA na si swA hA/

dza ya badzra swA hA/ a dzi ta badzrA ya swA hA/ ma hA badzra hu ta sha na ya swA hA/ a mo g+ha badzra hasta swA hA/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la

mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bsrung ba stsal bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / chad

pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug dgum pa dang / mi mdza' ba dgag pa dang / dus ma lags par 'gum pa dgag pa dang / 'thab pa dang / thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa dang / khrag

khrug dang / 'jigs pa thams cad dgag par bgyi'o/ /mtshams dgum par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ dza ye dza ye dza ye/ ma hA dza ye/ mi li ma na si/ dz+he dz+he dz+he/ mu ru mu ru/ tu Tu tu Tu/ mu mu le/ mArga ba ti/ d+hu d+hu me/

be ge be ga d+hA ri NI/ te dza ba tI/ bdag dang sems can thams cad 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi

gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus gsungs pa/ byin gyis brlabs pa lagaso/ /tad+ya thA/ bud+d+he bud+d+he/ bud+d+he bud+d+he/ bud+d+ha ba tI/ bud+d+ha a ba b+ha sa ni/ rdarma ba tI/ sa ma hi te/ sa mA d+hi gar+b+he bud+d+ha

a ba b+hA sa ni/ bud+d+ha pa ri ha ri/ rdarma a ba b+hA sa ni swA hA/ su la la zhig rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di las 'da' bar bgyid pa de ni mgo si ta ka'i 'bras bu bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gaso/ /su zhig rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen po

rgyal ba can 'di 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ mchod par bgyid dam/ yi ger 'dri 'am/ glegs bam la bris te/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ram/ gtsug lag khang du 'jog na/ der

bdag tshogs kyi g.yog dang bcas shing / gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu rig sngags 'dzin pa de'i slad bzhin du 'brang ste bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /dpag tshad brgya stong tshun chad du mtshams dgum par bgyi'o/ /

slar rgol ba dang / dgra dang / g.yul 'gyed pa dang / 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa thams cad ma mchis par bgyi'o/ /slar bzlog par bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po rnam thos

kyi bu la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rgyal po chen po legs so legs so/ /sems can chen po khyod 'jig rten thams cad la phan pa dang / sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba dang / bde ba dang / bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir

zhugs pa yang legs so/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'dis gang yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba byas pa de'i lus la mtshon dang / dug dang / byad dang / gsod byed dang /

rims dang / gnod pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa'o/ /lag na rdo rje khyod kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen

mo rgyal ba can 'di zung shig /chongs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /lag na rdo rje phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos rab tu rnam par 'jig pa'i dus na/ sems can drag shul dang ldan pa/ shin

tu mi bzad pa/ mdangs 'phrog pa'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po rnams dang / chos ma yin pa spyod pa'i rgyal po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe thung ba chos ma yin pas yul 'khor skyong ba 'byung ba de'i tshe rig sngags kyi rgyal mo

chen mo rgyal ba can 'di sems mi mnyam pa/ sems mi bzad pa de dag dang / sdang ba dang / rab tu sdang ba'i sems can thams cad kyi don du 'gyur/ tshar gcod par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can bdud kyi dkyil 'khor

thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas gsungs pa/ byin gyis brlabs pa/ phyag rgyas btab pa'o/ /rig sngag gyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di ni lha thams cad kyis phyag

byas pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje de'i phyir khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang / phyag rgya zhes bya bar zung shig /bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa rgyal ba can zhes bya bar yang zung shig /bcom ldan 'das

kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon
par bstod do/ /'phags pa rgyal ba can zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// // @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma yu ra bi d+yA gar b+he nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags

pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya'i yang snying zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das rma bya chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dgra yis 'jigs pa 'am/
'thab rtsod kyis 'jigs pa 'am/ bgegs kyis 'jigs pa 'am/ dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'jigs pa 'am/ sbrul gyis 'jigs pa 'am/ gcan zan gyis 'jigs pa 'am/ dug gis 'jigs pa 'am/ mes 'jigs pa 'am/

chus 'jigs pa 'am/ rlung gis 'jigs pa 'am/ 'jigs pa thams cad kyi nang na 'dug na 'di yid la bya'o/ /rlung las gyur pa 'am/ mkhris pa las gyur pa 'am/ bad kan las gyur pa 'am/ 'dus pa las gyur pa 'am/

gdon gyis zin tam/ rims kyis btab pa 'am/ dug 'thungs sam/ nad thams cad kyi nang na 'dug na 'di yid la bya'o/ /na mo b+ha ga ba te/ iT+Ti T+TA ya/ in+d+ra go mi si kA ya/ A sha ne/ pA sha ne/ pA pa ni kU le/ ka pi la mit+te/

i le mit+te swA hA/ gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams grub par gyur cig /nA rA ya ni/ pA rA ya ni/ ha ri tA li/ kun tA li/ i li mi sti/ ki li ti li mi sti swA hA/ rig sngags kyi gzhi rnams grub par gyur cig /ha ha/ hi hi/ hU hU/ kha rA/

ma rA/ kha hi/ kha hi/ hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT swA hA/ bdag la srungs shig /srungs shig /lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig /ston brgya mthong bar shog shig /lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod de gtor ma ri mthon po la btang bar bya'o/ /des thams cad zhi zhing
bzlog par 'gyur ro/ /rma bya'i snying po rig pa dang bcas pa/ rdzogs s+ho// //

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a gra pra dI pa d+hA ra NI bid+yA rA dzA/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo sgron ma mchog gi gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad

bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyis kun dga' ra ba na dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / lha dang mi 'bum phrag du

ma dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag du ma dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya phrag stong 'das pa na 'jig rten

gyi khams me tog mtha' yas shes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgron ma mchog ces bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa des byang chub

sems dpa' 'od chen po dang / 'od dpag med ces bya ba byang chub sems dpa' gnyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi 'jed 'dir btang ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin

gyi kun dga' ra ba ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan
'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba
phrag 'bum 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog mtha' yas zhes bgyi ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgron ma mchog ces bgyi ba da ltar bzhugs
te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgron ma'i mchog des bdag cag gnyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir

btang ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgron ma'i mchog de bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa 'chang ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho 'am/ stobs

dang / bde ba dang / kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa la reg par gnas sa~M zhes bsnyun gsol lo/ /'di skad ces kyang gsung ngo / /'di na mi 'am/ mi ma lags pa 'am/ 'byung po 'am/ sha za 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po 'am/ grul buM 'am/ grul bum

gyi sde dpon nam/ rgyal po 'am/ blon po chen po 'am/ chom rkun nam/ sbrul lam/ srin bu 'am/ srin bu lu ta 'am/ sdad pa lcags phye 'am/ nyi ba'i nyon mongs pa gang yang rung ba dag la 'tshe bar bgyid pa 'ga' yang ma mchis

sam zhes gsung ngo / /sems can rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba dang / mdangs dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / grags pa dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / gzi brjid dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / yon tan dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / stobs dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / mdog dang

ldan par bgyi ba dang / bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / bskyab pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgron ma'i mchog des gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag kyang

bskur te/ 'di lta ste/ dz+wa le dz+wa le/ dz+wa le ga te/ hug+gu/ mug+gu/ sa ma te/ ma hA sa ma te/ ma hA dz+wa le/ dz+wa ba la me/ sa he sa he/ me hA dz+wa le/ ug+ge/ mug+ge/ sha ma/ sa~M ma he/ ma hA sa~M ma he/ ma hA sha me swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das

kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag zung shig /long shig /chong shig /lhogs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu

ston cig /kun dga' bo sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o/ /gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag rnyed par dka'o/ /kun dga'o gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi dag 'dzin pa yang shin du rnyed par dka'o/ /kun dga'

bo rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la ni gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa dang / len pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa de ni

tshe rabs bdun du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /tshe 'di nyid la yang sngon gyi las ma gtogs par gzhan gyi gnod pa thaMs cad las yang dag par 'da' ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad dang rjesu 'thun par 'gyuro/ /kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags

kyi gzhi 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun bcu rtsa bdun gyis gsungs te/ gang gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag las 'da' bar byed pa de ni de dag thaMs cad la 'khus pa yin no/ /de nas byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa'

chen po ma pham pa stan las langs te/ gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /

bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang sems can rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba dang / mdangs dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / gzi brjid dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / grags pa dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / yon tan dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / stobs

dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / mdog dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / bskyab pa'i slad du gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ /'di lta ste/ at+te/ bat+te/ nat+te/ ku nad t+te/ puk+ka se/ ku puk+ka se/ ka se/

a na ka se/ nA ma ka se/ a nu ta/ pra nu ta/ kha dze/ ma hA kha dze/ sad pa phe/ taDa phe/ tu Da phe/ hi li mi li ti le swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis gzungs kyi

gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag zung shig /long shig /chong shig /lhogs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig /kun dga' bo sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o/ /gzung

kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag rnyed par dka'o/ /kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa yang shin du rnyed par dka'o/ /kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs kyi gsang

sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa dang / len pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa de ni tshe rabs bcu gnyis su tshe rab dran par 'gyur ro/ /tshe 'di nyid la yang sngon gyi las ma gtogs

par gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad dang rjesu 'thun par 'gyuro/ /kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad bcu rtsa

gnyis kyis gsungs te/ gang gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag las 'da' bar byed pa ni de dag thams cad la 'khus pa yin no/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ gos phrag pa cig tu

gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logasu thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bac+doMs la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang sems can rnaMs kyi don dang / sman

pa dang / bde ba dang / mdangs dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / gzi brjid dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / grags pa dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / yon tan dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / stobs dang ldan par bgyi ba dang / mdog dang ldan par bgyi ba dang /

bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / bskyab pa'i slad du gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnaMs brjod par bgyi'o/ /de 'di lta ste/ ak+khe/ bak+khe/ na dzi te/ nA gA sa re/ na he le/ dza hi le/ dza ha la ba te/ tsaN+DI la ba te swA hA/ de nas bac+doMs kyis tshe dang

ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di zung shig /long shig /chongs shig /lhogs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cig /

kun dga' bo sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o/ /gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag rnyed par dka'o/ /kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa yang shin tu rnyed par dka'o/ /kun dga' bo

rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa dang / len pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la ya~M rgya cher rab tu ston pa de ni tshe rabs bcu gsuM du tshe rabs dran

par 'gyur ro/ /tshe 'di nyid la yang sngon gyi las ma gtogs pa gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba dang / 'gro ba thaMd dang rjesu 'thun par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni sa~Ms

rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad bcu rtsa gnyis kyi gsu~Ms te/ gang gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag las 'da' bar byed pa de ni de dag thaMd la 'khus pa yino/ /de nas bac+doMs kyis dge slong rnaMs la bka' stsal pa/

dge slong dag ngas kyang sems can rnaMs kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / mdangs dang ldan par bya ba dang / gzi brjid dang ldan par bya ba dang / grags pa dang ldan par bya ba dang / yon tan dang ldan par bya ba dang / stobs dang ldan

par bya ba dang / mdog dang ldan par bya ba dang / bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / bskyab pa'i phyir gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnaMs bshad do/ /'di lta ste/ aT+Te/ baT+Te/ naT+Te/ ku naT+Te/ Ta ke/ e Da ke/ ta ta be/ tu Da be/ ra Ta ke/ lo le/ hu le/ he li/ mi le/

ti le/ shI le/ shI la/ a D+he/ ba D+he/ na D+he/ ku na D+he/ a Da ba tI/ ba na ba tI/ ka se ka se ka se/ pha se pha se pha se/ ma hA pha se pha se swA hA/ de nas bac+doMs kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis gzungs kyi gsa~M

sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag zung shig /long shig /chongs shig /lhogs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cig /kun dga' bo sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o/ /gzungs kyi gsang

sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag rnyed par dka'o/ /kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags 'di dag ston pa yang shin tu rnyed par dka'o/ /kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'aM/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi

gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa dang / len pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa de ni tshe rabs bcu bzhir tshe rab dran par 'gyuro/ /tshe 'di nyid la yang sngon kyi las ma togs

par gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad las 'da' ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad dang rjesu 'thun par 'gyuro/ /kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhis gsu~M

te/ gang gzu~Ms kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag las 'da' bar byed pa de ni de dag thaMd la 'khus pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la dag gis gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag shing skaM po gsher

bag med pa la bsrung ba byas te/ yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / bcing ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legasu 'gyur ba byas na shing de la lcu gu dang / lo ma dag kyang skye bar 'gyur te/ me tog dang / 'bras bu rnaMs kyang mngon par 'grub

par 'gyur na/ mir gyur pa lta ci smos/ na maHsarba bud+d+ha b+h+yaH/ sid d+h+yan+tu d+hA ra NI/ maN+t+ra pA da ni swA hA/ de nas bac+doMs kyis yang dge slong rnaMs la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag sems can rnaMs kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / mdangs dang ldan par bya

ba dang / gzi brjid dang ldan par bya ba dang / grags pa dang ldan par bya ba dang / yon tan dang ldan par bya ba dang / stobs dang ldan par bya ba dang / mdog dang ldan par bya ba dang / bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / bskyab pa'i pa'i phyir gzungs kyi gsang

bsngags kyi gzhi gzhan dag kyang bshad par bya'o/ /de 'di lta ste/ at+te/ mat+te/ pa ke pA ra ke/ pe ke DA/ dra ma ti/ ta ra ma ti/ Tu Da ma Ti/ Tu Da ma Te/ Tu Da Tu re/ su re/ hi le/ mu le/ ti le/ swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa

kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag zung shig /long shig /chongs shig /klogs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /gzhan dag la ya~M rgya cher rab tu ston cig /

kun dga' bo sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o/ /gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag rnyed par dka'o/ /kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag rnyed par dka'o/ /kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsa~M sngags kyi

gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa yang shin tu rnyed par dka'o/ /kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa dang / len pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par

byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa de ni tshe rabs nyi shu rtsa gcig tu tshe rab dran par 'gyuro/ /tshe 'di nyid la yang sngon gyi las ma gtog par gzhan gyi gnod pa thaMd las 'da' ba dang / 'gro ba thaMd dang rjesu 'thun

par 'gyuro/ /gang la la zhig la bsrung ba byas na de la ya~M 'byung po thaMd kyis mi tshugaso/ /lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / naMkha' ldeng dang / mi 'aM ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa thaMd

kyis mi tshugaso/ /sbrul dang / srin bu dang / srin bu lu ta dang / sbrang bu lcags phye thaMd kyis mi tshugaso/ /rims rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / 'dus pa dang / dus tshigs 'gyur ba las byung ba thaMd kyis mi tshugaso/ /zhag cig

pa 'aM/ zhaganyis pa 'am/ zhag gsum pa 'aM/ zhag bzhi pa 'aM/ zhag bdun pa 'aM/ zla ba phyed pa 'aM/ zla ba gcig pa 'aM/ lo gcig pa 'aM/ nad rgyun rings saM/ skad cig pa rnams kyis mi tshugaso/ /'bras sam/

phol mig gam/ rkang shu 'am/ lhog pa 'am/ me dbal laM/ shu ba 'am/ khyi rngo 'am/ g.yan pa 'am/ mdze thaMd dam/ glog pa thams cad dam/ gshed byed thaMs cad dam/ sgyur ba'i las thams cad dam/ byad thaMd dang /

ro langs thaMd kyis kyang mi tshugaso/ /kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus gsungs te/ gang gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag las 'da' bar byed pa de ni de

dag thams cad la 'khus pa yin no/ /kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni rgyal po'i pho brang na 'dug na yang yid la bya'o/ /chom rkun gyi nang na 'dug na yang yid la bya'o/ /srin po'i na~M na 'dug na ya~M yid la bya'o/ /

gcan zan khro bo'i nang na 'dug na yang yid la bya'o/ /'brog dgon pa'i nang na 'dug na yang yid la bya'o/ /klung dang / bgrod dka' ba nang 'dug na yang yid la bya'o/ /me'i nang na 'dug na yang yid la bya'o/ /chu'i nang na 'dug

na yang yid la bya'o/ /de yid la byas pa de rnaMs las 'jigs pa de dag thams cad mi 'byung ngo / /des dug zos pa thaMd kyang kha zas nyid du 'gyuro/ /kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa ni 'byung po

thams cad kyis mi tshugaso/ /yi dgas thaMd dang / srul po thams cad dang / gshed byed thams cad dang / sgyur ba'i las thaMd dang / byad thams cad dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa thaMd kyis mi tshugs te/ kun dga' bo mdor

na de la gzhan gyi gnod pa thaMd kyis mi tshugaso/ /kun dga' bo bsad pa'i rigs pa ni chad pas bral bar 'gyuro/ /chad pas cad pa'i rigs pa ni brdegs pas/ brdegs pa'i rigs pa ni brgyad pas/ brgyad pa'i rigs

pa ni bsdigs pas/ bsdigs pa'i rigs pa ni mig tshugasu bltas pas thar par 'gyuro/ /kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gis gang la bsrung ba byas pa 'am/ yongasu bskyab pa 'am/ yongasu

bzungs bas bcings pa 'aM/ zhi ba dang / bde legasu 'gyur ba byas pa gzhan du 'gyur ba de ni gnas med do/ /lha dang bcas/ bdud dang bcas/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig brten dang / dge sbyong dang / bram zer bcas pa'i skye

dgu dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi nang na yang ma mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa thaMd las nges par 'byung bar byin gyis brlabs pa'i

phyiro/ /de nas chos kyi rnams grangs 'di rdzogs pa'i rjes la rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang chos kyi rnams grangs 'di rgya cher rgyas par bgyi ba dang /

chos smra ba de dag rjesu yongasu gzung ba dang / dam pa'i chos ci nas kyang yun ring du gnas pa dang / bdud thams cad tshar bcad pa'i slad du gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams rjesu stsal bar 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi

de la legaso zhes bgyi ba gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la thugs brtse ba'i phyir cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang ste/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gis kyang bac+doMs kyis cang

mi gsung bar gyur par gnang bar rig nas ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/ /de ni 'di lta ste/ da naD+De/ de naD+De/ ma hA naD+De/ dzam+b+ha ni/ stam+b+ha ni/ Ta Te/ Ta Ta ne/ ma hA Ta Ta ne/ kuT+Te/ kuT+Ta ne/ ma hA kuT+Ta ne/ d+harma le/ tsa ma le swAhA/ bcom ldan

'das 'di dag ni gzungs 'di'i 'khor gyi tshig lta bur gda' ba lags te/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa dang / bzlas te bton nas 'chang ba 'di ni sngon gyi las ma togs par

gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad las 'da' ba dang / 'gro ba thaMd dang rjesu 'thun par 'gyuro/ /de la ni dam pa'i chos thaMd yongasu gzung ba la yang bar chad 'byung bar mi 'gyur lagaso/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po

bzhi po dag la grogs po dag khyod bstan pa yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa legaso legaso zhes bya ba byin no/ /de nas bac+doMs kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis de dag rdzu

'phrul che bar 'gyur ba dang / phan yon che ba dang / byin che bar 'gyur ba'i phyir gzungs kyi chos kyi rnams grangs 'di zung shig /long shig /chongs shig /lhogs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /gzhan dag la yang rgya cher

rab tu ston cig gsol pa/ bac+doMs rgyas par bgyi ba'i slad du bdag gis gzung lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /
gzungs sngags kyi ni mdo sde 'di/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa te/ /sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /de ni ngas kyang bshad pa yin/ /gang zhig gzungs sngags mdo sde 'di/ /'dzin tam yang na klog

byed pa/ /tshe rabs nyi shu rtsa gcig tu/ /de ni tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ /gzungs sngags 'di brjod byed de la/ /mi min gang yang rung ba dang / /gnod sbyin grul bum srin po dag /nams kyang bar chad mi byed do/ /gzungs sngags

'di brjod byed de la/ /'dod khams dbang phyug gang yin pa/ /sdig can bdud de nam du yang / /bar chad byed par mi 'gyuro/ /gzungs sngags 'di 'dzin byed de yi/ /pha ma dang ni phu nu dang / /sring mo mdza' bshes gnyen dag kyang / /

log par ltung bar mi 'gyuro/ /de phyir gzungs sngags mdo sde 'di/ /'jigs med gang gis thos gyur nas/ /gzungs sngags 'di brjod byed pa des/ /nams kyang 'jigs par mi bya'o/ /gzungs sngags 'di 'dzin byed

de yi/ /bskal pa bye ba stong rnamasu/ /sgrib pa'i las ni gang byas pa/ /zhag bdun gyis ni byung bar 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams gang / /bskal pa bye bar bsgrubs pa kun/ /gzungs sngags 'di 'dzin

byed pa des/ /zhag bdun gyis ni zil gyis non/ /phyogs bzhi'i 'jig rten skyong ba po/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag /lus ngan dang ni yul 'khor srung / /mig mi bzang dang 'phags skyes po/ /kha dog ldan zhing

grags dang ldan/ /'khor bcas blon bcas de dag kyang / /gzungs sngags 'di ni brjod byed pa/ /de la rtag tu bsrung bar byed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / nyan

thos chen po de dag dang / 'phags pa byams pa dang / 'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnaMs dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi
rungs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa rig sngags kyi rgyal po sgron ma mchog gis gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// // @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya ASh+Ta de bi d+hA rA NI/

bod skad du/ 'phags pa lha mo brgyad kyi gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo/ /de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa'i yum sdig pa thams cad byang bar mdzad ma/ nad thaMd

rab tu zhi bar mdzad ma/ bgegs thams cad rab tu 'jig par mdzad ma/ phun sum tshogs pa thaMd mdzad ma/ gzungs sngags chen mo'i rgyal mo'i mchog 'di gsungaso/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga ta/ b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA

he bud+d+ha mA ta ri/ sarba pA pa na sha ni/ gardza gardza/ b+hany+dza/ b+hany+dza/ marda marda/ ga ma ri/ ga ma b+ha ri/ ha sa ha sa/ da ma da ma/ ma tha ma tha/ bi d+ha na sa ya/ bi d+ha na sa ya/ sarba sha tru na ta ra ma ti/ bi ma le/ pU ra ya pU ra ya/ pra ti dz+nyA na/ sarba bud+d+ha paR+yu

pa si ti/ b+ha ga ba ti/ ga na ga na/ dza hi dza hi/ bi ma sa ni/ kra ma Ni/ d+ha ba ni/ ra ma Ni/ mA taM gi swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes chen por dbang bskur ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs so/ /namaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaH

sarba thA/ a ma ri/ a ma ri/ ta Ta/ b+hany+dza/ b+hany+dza/ dz+ha dz+ha/ mi tsi mi tsi/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ ma tha ma tha/ dur dA na ta da ma ka swA hA/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA/ he he/ ka ni de/ sarba ta thA ga ta b+ha

ne ke/ b+ho d+hi na dad/ trA Ta trA Ta/ hU~M phaT hU~M phaT/ gardza gardza/ pa ra ma ti/ bi hU ri ke swA hA/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA/ b+ha ga ba ti pra dz+nyA pA ra mi te a/ sarba pA pa ya~M ka ri dz+nyA na artsi s+pha ra Ni/

b+hany+dza/ b+hany+dza/ ma tha ma tha/ da ma da ma/ A na ya A na ya/ sa ra sa ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ sarba bud+d+he dza ne tre ye swA hA/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA/ gardza gardza/ ma tha ma tha/ da ma da ma/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/

dun tu b+hi/ sarba nir g+ho She/ ha na ha na/ bid+h+wan sa ya/ bi d+h+wan sa ya/ bi d+h+wan sa ya/ mo Ta ya mo Ta ya/ da ha da ha/ bi phu la nirma la nir dzA te/ A ha ra A ha ra/ gats+tsha gats+tsha/ sarba bud+d+ha par+yu pas ti ma/

mA bi lam+ba swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje'i dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thAH oM b+ha ga ba ti/ sarba ta thA ga ta dza ni ke/ pU ra ya pra ti

dz+nyA na/ ta Ta ta Ta/ marda marda/ A ha ra A ha ra/ hU~M hU~M/ dza ti swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das ma so sor 'brang ba chen mo zhes bya ba'i gzungaso/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA/ hU~M hri/ sarba

bud+d+ha mA ti ri b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ ma thA ma thA/ da ma ni da ma ni/ garga ri garga ri hri swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje mi pham ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA/ trA Ta trA Ta/

mu hu mu hu/ sarba pA pa bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das ma sdig pa thaMd spong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungaso/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA/ d+ha ka d+ha ka /mo Ta mo Ta/ da ha da ha/ sarba

ta thA ga tA dz+nyA na nir dzA te swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das ma gdul dka' ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA/ ha ha mi hu mi hu/ da ma da ma/ khA hi khA hi/ d+hu na d+hu na/ mi tsi

mi tsi/ dur tA na ta da ma ni swA hA/ bac+doMs ma bdud thaMd rnaMs par 'jom ma zhes bya ba'i gzungaso/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA/ mi tsi mi tsi/ ga rga gardza gardza/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ ma tha ma tha/

da ma da ma swA hA/ bac+doMs ma sgo mtha' yas sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungaso/ /'jam dpal ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gang gi lag na gnas pa de nyon mongs pa dang bral bar 'gyur/ 'jigs pa dang
bral bar 'gyur/ de gal te chom rkun gyi nang na 'dug gam/ srin po'i nang na 'dugam/ dgra'i nang na 'dug gam/ 'thab pa'i nang na 'dug kyang rung te/ de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur/ chom

rkun gyis bcom par mi 'gyur/ srin po la sogs pas gtse bar mi 'gyur/ de la dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung bar 'gyur/ rtags tu dpal dang ldan par 'gyur/ de'i sdig pa thams cad yongasu byang bar

'gyur/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'buM gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa yang de la nyin gcig bzhin mngon du 'gyur/ 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe yang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnaMs kyis yongasu zin par

'gyur/ shi nas kyang bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur na/ gang 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / yid la byed pa dang / mi gtong bar 'dzin pa lta ci smos te/ de'i sgrib pa thaMd byang bar 'gyur/ des ngan song gi sgo rnaMs bcad par

'gyuro/ /de ngan song dang / ngan 'gro rnams rgyang bsrings bar 'gyuro/ /gang zhig nang par lang nasu/ /lan cig klog par byed pa'i mi/ /srid pa nyam ngar gang byas pa/ /sdig pa kun las grol bar 'gyur/ /srin po la sogs
chom rkun dang / /mtshon dang dgra yis mi tshugs shing / /dus min 'chi las rab tu thar/ /rtag tu dpal dang ldan par 'gyur/ /'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe na yang / /ngan 'gro rnams las bsrings 'gyur te/ /
sangs rgyas rnams kyis yongs bzung nas/ /bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur/ /de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang te mngon par bstod do/ /
'phags pa lha mo brgyad kyi gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha bi dza ya nA ma d+hA ra NI kal p+saM hi ta/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rtog pa dang bcas pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems

dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gi thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag tu med pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde ba can gyi chos yang dag par sdud pa'i phug
