cha'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa rgya mtsho 'jom
pa la phyags 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bai dUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don yod grub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas sa la'i dbang po'i rgyal po me tog shin du rgyas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma mchog gi rgyal
po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
thams cad skyob la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas log par dad sel la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan
'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser thub la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas rin po che tog gis rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun du bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad

ma rgyas pa dang ud+pa la'i dri'i togi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub ma

phyir zlog pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di rab tu brjod par bya'o/ /'thab pa dang 'thab mo dang rtsod pa dang 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ 'byung po dang gdon thams cad zlog par byed pa/ pha rol gyi rig sngags

thams cad gcod par byed pa/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba las yongs su skyob pa/ sems can bcings pa thams cad thar bar byed pa/ sdang ba dang rmi lam ngan pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa/ gnod sbyin dang srin po'i

gdon thams cad rnam par rlag par byed pa/ gdon stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi po rnams rnam par 'joms par byed pa/ rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad rab tu sgrub par byed pa/ dgra thams cad zlog par byed pa/ gza'

chen po brgyad rnam par rlag par byed pa/ drag shul dang / sdang ba dang rmi lam ngan pa rnams rnam par 'joms par byed pa/ dug dang mtshon dang med dang chu las skyob par byed pa/ ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa thams cad

las sgrol ba/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba brgyad kyi bar du yongs su skyob par byed pa ste/ gzhan gyi mi thub drag shul che/ /stobs chen gzi brjid chen mo ste/ /gtum pa chen mo dkar mo che/ /gsal ba chen mo

stobs chen mo/ /'bar ba chen mo phreng ba che/ /gos dkar mo ni chen mo ste/ /'phags ma sgrol ma khro gnyer can/ /rgyal ba'i rdo rje phreng zhes grags/ /pad ma'i snang ba rdo rje'i mtshan/ /gzhan gyis mi thub phreng
ba can/ /rdo rje mchu can rnams sgeg ma/ /zhi ba lha rnams kyis mchod pa/ /zhi gzugs dkar mo chen mo ste/ /'bar ba dang ni gos dkar mo/ /'phags ma sgrol ma stobs chen mo/ /'chi med rdo rje lu gu

rgyud/ /rdo rje gzhon nu rig 'dzin ma/ /lag na rdo rje'i rdo rje dang / /de bzhin rig sngags gser phreng can/ /le brgan rtsi dang rin chen ma/ /rnams par snang mdzad rigs kyi 'od/ /de bzhin gshegs rigs gtsug

tor ma/ /rnam par bsgying ma'i phreng ba dang / /rdo rje gser 'od lta bu'i spyan/ /rdo rje sgros dang dkar mo dang / /pad ma'i spyan dpal sangs rgyas spyan/ /de bzhin rdo rje zla ba'i 'od/ /de bzhin rdo rje 'dzin ma dang / /

rdo rje phreng ba sgyu 'phrul che'i/ /lha mo dang ni gser 'od can/ /spyan mdzes ma dang dkar mo dang / /pad yi ni spyan can dang / /rnam dul zhi ba'i sems dang ni/ /zla 'od bdag gi yon tan shes/ /phyag rgya'i tshog

de dag dang / ma mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa thams cad kyis bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang sems can thams cad la bsrung ba mdzad du gsol/ oM rI Shi ga Na pra shaste sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tre hUM d+r+'uM hrIHSh+ToM/ dzam+b+ha ni

hUM d+r+'u hrIHSh+ToM/ stam+b+ha ni hUM d+r+'uM hrIHSh+ToM/ mo ha na ka rI hUM d+r+'uM hrIHSh+ToM/ pa ri bi d+yA sa ma b+hak+Sha Na ka rI hUM d+r+'uM hrIHSh+ToM/ sarba bid+yA ts+tshe da na ka rI hUM d+r+'uM hrIHSh+ToM/ sarba duSh+Ta TAM stam+b+ha na ka rI hUM d+r+'uM hrIHSh+ToM/ sarba yak+Sha rAk+Sha sa gra hA NAM bi d+h+waM sa na ka ri hUM d+r+'u+uM hrIHSh+ToM/

tsa tu ra shI tI nAM gra ha sa ha srA NAM bi d+h+wan+sa na ka rI hUM d+r+'uM hrIHSh+ToM/ aSh+Ta bi shaM tI nAM na k+Sha trA NA m+p+ra sA d+ha na ka rI hUM d+r+'uM hrIHSh+ToM/ aSh+TA nAM ma hA gra hA NA m+bi d+h+waM sa na ka rI hUM drUM hrIHSh+ToM/ rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM sarba sa twAMsh+tsa/ bcom ldan 'das

ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar mo can rdo rje gtsug tor phyir zlog pa chen mo phyag stong mnga' ba chen mo/ dbu stong mnga' ba chen mo/ spyan bye ba brgya phrag stong mnga' ba chen mo/
mi phyed 'bar ba'i mtshan rtags can/ rdo rje yangs pa chen pos/ sa gsum gyi dkyil 'khor du mnga' mdzad ma/ \u0f00 bdag dang sems can thams cad bde legs su mdzad du gsol/ rgyal po'i 'jigs
pa dang / chom kun kyi 'jigs pa dang / me yi 'jigs pa dang / chu yi 'jigs pa dang / dug gi 'jigs pa dang / mtshon gyis 'jigs pa dang / dgra yi 'jigs pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshog gyi 'jig
pa dang / mu ges yi 'jig pa dang / dgra yi 'jigs pa dang / thog gi 'jigs pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jig pa dang / sa g.yo ba'i 'jigs pa dang / skar mda' lhung ba'i 'jigs pa dang /
rgyal po'i chad pa'i 'jigs pa dang / gcan zan gtum po'i 'jigs pa dang / klu yi 'jigs pa dang / glog gi 'jigs pa dang / bye ma tsha mo'i 'jigs pa dang / nam mkha' lding gis 'jigs pa dang /
yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'go ba'i nad dang / 'khrug pa thams cad kyis 'jig pa dang / gdon gyis 'jig pa dang / lha'i gdon dang / klu'i gdon dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang / srin po'i
gdon dang / dri za'i gdon dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon dang / nam mkha' lding gi gdon dang / rlung lha'i gdon dang / mi 'am ci 'i gdon dang / lto 'phye che chen po'i gdon dang / mi'i gdon dang / mi ma
yin pa'i gdon dang / 'byung po'i gdon dang / yi dgas gyi gdon dang / sha za'i gdon dang / grul bum gyi gdon dang / srul po'i gdon dang / lus srul po'i gdon dang / skem byed kyi gdon dang /
smyo byed kyi gdon dang / grib gdon gyi gdon dang / rjed byed gyi gdon dang / gnon po'i gdon dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon dang / lus chags ma'i gdon dang / nam gru'i gdon dang / tsher ma 'don pa'i
gdon dang / re lde 'don pa'i gdon dang / bya'i gdon dang / ma mo dga' bar byed pa'i gdon dang / kun du 'phreng bar byed pa'i gdon dang / 'phyang ba'i gdon dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon dang / lus
mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon dang / ka Tang ka Ta'i tshog can gyi gdon dang / gdon thams cad dang / mdangs 'phrog pa dang / mngal za ba dang / khrag 'thung ba dang / zhag za ba dang / sha za ba dang / tshil
za ba dang / rkang za ba dang / btsas pa za ba dang / srog 'phrog pa dang / gtor ma za ba dang / phreng ba za ba dang / dri za ba dang / me tog za ba dang / bdug pa za ba dang / 'bras bu za ba dang /
lo tog za ba dang / bsreg bya za ba dang / rnag 'thung ba dang / bshang ba za ba dang / gcin 'thung ba dang / mchil ma za ba dang / snabs za ba dang / ngar snabs za ba dang / skyugs pa za ba dang /

nom bu za ba dang / mi gtsang ba za ba dang / stor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba dang / nor 'phrog pa dang / sems 'phrog pa rnams dang / de dag thams cad dang gdon thams cad kyi byas pa'i rig sngags tham

cad ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /kun du rgyus byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /mkha' 'gro dang mkha' 'gro mas byas pa'i rig sngags cad ral gris gcad do/ /

rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /tshangs pas byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /brgya byin gyis byes pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /srid med kyi

bus byas pa'i rig sngags ril gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /phyugs bdag chen po dang drag pos byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /nag po chen pos byas pa'i rig sngags

ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /ma mo'i tshogs kyis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /mi'i thod pa can gyis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bu

gdab bo/ /ri khrod pas byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /g.yung pos byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /skar mda' gdong gis byas pa'i rig sngags

ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bu gdab bo/ /rdo rje gzhon nu mas byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /gshin rje gshed kyis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab

bo/ /gshin rje'i pho nyas byas pas rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /klu ma rungs pas byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bu gdab bo/ /me'i las kyis byas pa'i rig sngags ral

gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /log 'dren gyis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bu gdab bo/ /gzhon nus byas pa'i rigs sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /rgyal po

chen po bzhis byas pas rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /sring mo bzhis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /nam mkha' lding yang dag pas byas pas rig

sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /rgyal bar byed pa dang sbrang rtsir byed pa dang grub par byed pa dang don kun sgrub pas byas pas rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /b+h+ring gi ri Ti dang / dga'

byed dbang phyug dang smin drug gi bu dang zla ba dang nyi ma dang tshogs kyi bdag po dang lhan cig pas byas pa'i rig sngag ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /dge sbyong gcer bus byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /

rdo rje phur bu gdab bo/ /dgra bcom pas byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /'dod

chags dang bral bas byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /gang dang gang du byas pa'i

rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /gang gis byed du bcug pa des byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /dge sbyong mgo reg gis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris

gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /pho nya dang pho nya mo dang bran pho dang bran mos byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /drang srong gis mchog thams cad kyis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /

rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/ /mi phan par 'dod pa thams cad kyis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/ /rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/

oM bcom ldan 'das ma bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad dang / sdang ba dang rab tu sdang ba thams cad dang / phyir rgol ba 'am/ mi
mdza' ba 'am/ mi phan par 'dod pa thams cad las bsrung du gsol bsrung du gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams

cad kyis phyag byas pa me dang nyi ma ltar 'od gsal zhing dkar ba rgyas pa mnga' ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM dz+wa la dz+wa la d+ha ka d+ha ka khA da khA da/ da ra da ra/ bi da ra bi da ra/ tsh+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ sarba duSh+TA na hU~M drU~M/ sarba durlaM g+hi

te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba dur+ts+tshA ye b+h+yaHphaT sarba durlaM khi te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba dig b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba dur+b+hu k+te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba du te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba a ba d+hA te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba du prek+Sha te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba dz+wa re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba a pa sma re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba o stA ra ke b+h+yaH

phaT/ sarba DA/ ki nI b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba re ba tA+e b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ka Ta bA si nI b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba dzA ma kai b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba sa ku nI b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba mA tri nan+di ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ga re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba b-iShe b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba yo ge b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba a lam+ba ke b+h+yaH

phaT/ sarba b+ha ye b+h+yaHphaT/ sarbo pa dra be b+h+yaHphaT/ sarbo pa sargo pA ya se b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba u tra se b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba byA d+hi b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba shra ma Ne b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba gra he b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba tIr+thi ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pra t+yar+thi ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pA ta ke

b+h+yaHphaT/ sarbo n+mA de b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ts+tsha ye b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba byi d+yA d+ha re b+h+yaHphaT/ dza ya ka ra ma d+hu ka ra sid d+hi ka ra sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba bid+yA tsAR+Ya b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba bid+yA rA dze b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba sad+ha ke b+h+yo bid+yA tsAR+Ye b+h+yaHphaT/ tsa tu r+b+h+yo b+ha

gi nI b+h+yaHphaT/ badzra kau mA rI ye bid+yA rA dz+nyi yi phaT/ sarba bi g+h+na bi nA ya kA nAM phaT/ ba da dA ya phaT/ pa ra bi drA pa Na ka rA ya phaT/ sarba a su re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ga ru De b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ma ho ra ge b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ma nuSh+yA ma nu Sh+yA b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ma ru

te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pi sA tse b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kum+b+hA N+De b+h+yaHphaT/ badzri sing kha lA ya mAt+ta pra t+yang+gi rA b+h+yaHphaT/ sarbo pa sar+g+ge b+h+yaHphaT/ ma hA pra t+yang+gi re b+h+yaHphaT/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da phaT/ b+hin+da b+hin+da phaT/ hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ he he phaT/ ho ho phaT/ a mo g+hA ya phaT/

a pra te ha tA ya phaT/ ba ra pra dA ya phaT/ a su ra bi drA pa Na ka rA phaT/ sarba de be b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba nA ge b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ya k+She b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba rAk+Sha se b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba gan+d+ha rbe b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kin+na re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pre te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba b+hu te

b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kum+b+hAN+De b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba dU ta ne b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ka Ta pU ta ne b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba skan+de b+h+yaHphaT/ sarbo n+mA de b+h+yaHphaT/ badzra sha~M ka lA ya ma hA pra t+yang gi ra ra dzA ya phaT/ kA lA ya phaT/ ma hA kA lA ya phaT/ mA tri ga NA ya phaT/ ma hA

mA tr-i ga Na nA maskr-i tA ya phaT/ baiSh+Na bI ye phaT/ tI ye ma he shwa rI ye phaT/ brah+ma NI ye phaT/ ag+ne ye phaT/ ma hA kA lI ye phaT/ kA la daN Da ye phaT/ in dri ye phaT/ rau drI ye phaT/ tsA muN DI ye phaT/ bA rA hI ye phaT/ ma hA bA rA hI ye

phaT/ rA trA ye phaT/ kA la rA trI ye phaT/ ya ma daN DI ye phaT/ kA pA lI ye phaT/ ma hA kA pA lI ye phaT/ kau mA rI ye phaT/ yA m-I ye phaT/ bA ya bye phaT/ kau be rI ye phaT/ nai ri tI ye phaT/ dA ru N-I ye phaT/ mA ru tI ye phaT/ ma hA mA ru tI ye phaT/

sau mye phaT/ ai sA nI ye phaT/ pauk+ka sI ye phaT a tharba NI ye phaT/ sha ba rI ye phaT/ kriSh+Na sha ba rI ye phaT/ ya ma dU tI ye phaT/ ni si di bA tsa re b+h+ya phaT/ tra san k+Taub+h+yaHphaT/ da ra NI ye phaT/ a d+hi muk+ti ka ka smi ra ma ha sma sha na nI bA si nI ye

phaT/ e b+h+ya/ sarba b+ha ye b+h+yaHsarba do She b+h+yaHphaT/ oM hU~M Sh+To~M b+han+d+ha ban+da sarba duSh+TAn rak+Sha rak+Sha mA~M sarba satwAM sh+tsa swA hA/ gang su dag bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang / sems can thams cad la sdang ba sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnaMs

dang / drag shul drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / sdig pa sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / 'khrug pa 'khrug pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / mi mdza' ba mi mdza' ba'i sems dang ldan pa de rnaMs

las bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang / sems can thams cad bsrung ba mdzad du gsol/ lo brgya mtsho bar gyur cig /ston brgya mthong bar gyur cig /gyur cig /bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang / sems can thams cad la gdon dang gnod

sbyin gang su dag gnod sbyin gyi gdon rnams dang / mdangs 'phrog pa rnams dang / mngal za ba rnams dang / khrag 'thung ba rnams dang / zhag za ba rnams dang / sha za ba rnams dang / tshil za ba rnams dang / rkang za

ba rnams dang / btsas pa za ba rnams dang / srog 'phrog pa rnams dang / gtor ma za ba rnams dang / phreng ba za ba rnams dang / dri za ba rnams dang / me tog za ba rnams dang / bdug pa za ba rnams dang / 'bras bu za ba rnams dang / lo tog

za ba rnams dang / bsreg bya za ba rnams dang / nor 'phrog pa rnams dang / sems 'phrog pa rnams dang / rnag za ba rnams dang / bshang ba za ba rnams dang / gcing 'thung ba rnams dang / mchil ma 'thung ba rnams dang / snabs za ba

rnams dang / ngar snabs za ba rnams dang / skyugs pa za ba rnams dang / nor bu za ba rnams dang / mi gtsang ba za ba rnams dang / stor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba rnams dang / sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / sdang ba'i

sems dang ldan pa rnas dang / drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / lha'i gdon rnams dang / klu'i gdon rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon rnams dang / srin po'i gdon rnams dang / dri za'i gdon rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi

gdon rnams dang / nam mkha' lding gi gdon rnams dang / mi 'am ci'i gdon rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gdon rnams dang / mi 'i gdon rnams dang / mi ma yin pa'i gdon rnams dang / rlung lha'i gdon rnams dang / yi dgas kyi

gdon rnams dang / sha za'i gdon rnams dang / 'byung po'i gdon rnams dang / grul bum gyi gdon rnams dang / srul po'i gdon rnams dang / lus srul po'i gdon rnams dang / skem byed kyi gdon rnams dang / smyo byed kyi gdon rnaMs dang /

grib gnon gyi gdon rnams dang / rjed byed kyi gdon rnams dang / gnon po'i gdon rnams dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon rnams dang / nam gru'i gdon rnams dang / kun du 'breng ba'i gdon rnams dang / tsher ma 'don pa'i gdon

rnams dang / bya'i gdon rnams dang / ma mo dga' bar byed pa'i gdon rnams dang / bum pa lta bu'i gdon rnams dang / 'phyang ba'i gdon rnams dang / lus mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon rnams dang / ka Tad ka Ta'i tshogs can gyi gdon rnams

dang / gdon thams cad bsal du gsol/ bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang / sems can thams cad la rims nyin gcig pa rnams dang / nyin gnyis pa rnams dang / nyin gsum pa rnams dang / nyin bzhi pa rnams dang / nyin bdun pa

rnams dang / zla ba phyed pa rnams dang / zla ba gcig pa rnams dang / nyin mo pa rnams dang / nyi ma phyed pa rnams dang / yid tsam pa rnams dang / rtag pa'i rims rnams dang / rims mi bzad pa rnams dang / 'byung po'i rims rnaMs

dang / yi dgas kyi rims rnams dang / sha za'i rims rnams dang / mi'i rims rnams dang / mi ma yin pa'i rims rnams dang / rgyun mi chad pa'i rims rnams dang / rlung las gyur pa rnams dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa rnaMs

dang / bad kan las gyur pa rnams dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa rnams dang / rims thams cad dang / klad pa na ba bsal du gsol/ bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang sems can thams cad kyi gzhogs phyed na ba dang / yi ga 'chus

pa dang mig nad dang sna nad dang kha nad dang / mgul nad dang / snying nad dang / lkog ma'i lha gor na ba dang / rna ba na ba dang / so na ba dang / brang na ba dang / snying na ba dang / gnad na ba dang / rtsib logs na ba dang / rgyab na ba dang / lto na ba dang / rked pa na ba dang /

mdoms na ba dang / gzhang na ba dang / skye gnas na ba dang / rab tu skye gnas na ba dang / brla na ba dang / byin pa na ba dang / lag pa na ba dang / rkang pa na ba dang / yan lag na ba dang / nying lag na ba bsal du gsol/ bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang /

sems can thams cad la 'byung po dang / yi dgas dang / ro langs dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / rims dang / shu ba dang / mig ser dang / g.ya' ba dang / 'brum bu phra mo dang / mdze dang / phol mig dang / bas bldags dang / mchin nad dang / mtshan

bar rdol ba dang / g.yan pa dang / gzhang 'brum dang / me dbal dang / lhog pa dang / skrem pa dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / skrag pa dang / lud pa dang / brgyal ba dang / dbyig dug dang / dug sbyar ma dang / dug dang / byad dang /

me dang / chu dang / mi ngas dang / bdud dang / 'thab mo dang / mkhon dang / gnod pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / sbrang bu tre~M ma bu ka dang / tre lA Ta ka dang / sdig pa dang / sbrul dang / sre mo dang / seng ge dang / stag dang /

dom dang / dred dang / g.yag rgod dang / chu srin dang / spyang ki dang / chom po dang / de dag la sogs pa srog 'phrog par byed pa gzhan thams cad kyang bsal du gsol/ gdugs dkar po can rdo rje gtsug tor
phyir zlog pa chen mo'i rig sngags kyi mthus dpag tshad bcu gnyis kyi nang tshun chad dam/ dpag tshad lnga brgya 'i nang tshun chad du rig sngags bcing bar bgyi'o/ /gzi brjid bcing bar bgyi'o/ /rig
sngags thams cad bcing bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan gyi rigs sngags bcing bar bgyi'o/ /mtshams gcad par bgyi'o/ /sa bcing bar bgyi'o/ /phyogs bcu bcing bar bgyi'o/ /namakha'
bcing bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan gyi sde rab tu rengs par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ oM a na le a na le/ a tsa le a tsa le/ kha kha me kha kha me/ bi sha de bi sha de/ bI re bI re/ bai ra bai ra/ sau

mye sau mye/ shAn+te shAn+te/ dAn+te dAn+te/ badzra d+ha ra ban d+ha ban d+ha ni badzra pA Ni phaT/ oM hU~M drU~M hri Sh+ToM phaT phaT swA hA/ oM badzra pA Ni ban d+ha ban d+ha badzra pA se na sarba duSh+Ta big+h+na bi nA ya kA na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/

hU~M drU~M bad d+ha phaT/ rak+Sha rak+Sha mA~M sarba satwA~M sh+tsa swAhA/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir zlog pa'i rig
sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo 'di gro ga'am/ ras sam/ shing shun la bris te/ lus sam/ mgul du thogs pa byas nas bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya ste/ de dag la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dug gis
mi tshugs/ mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ rims kyi mi tshugs/ nad kyi mi tshugs/ tshad pas mi tshugs/ mes mi tshugs/ chus mi tshugs/ bsgyur ba'i las thams cad kyis mi tshugs/
dbyig dug gis mi tshugs/ dug sbyar mas mi tshugs/ byad kyis mi tshugs/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /gdon thams cad dang / bgegs dang log 'dren thaMd

kyi yid du 'ong zhing dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa bye ba stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhir skye ba dang / skye bar tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje'i rigs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad bcu

rtsa bzhi'i rig sngags kyi lhas kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mnyam par bzhag nas de la rtag par bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang / sbed par byed do/ /rdo rje pho nya mo mngag gzhug brgyad bcu rtsa bzhis kyang rtag par

yongs su skyong bar byed de de rnams kyi yid du 'ong ba dang dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /nam du yang gnod sbyin nyid dang / srin po nyid dang / 'byung po nyid dang / yi dgas nyid dang / sha za nyid dang / srul po nyid dang /

lus srul po nyid dang / mi dbul nyid du mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin bsheg

pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba gdug dkar po can zhes bya ba gzhan gyi mi thub ma phyir zlog pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo 'di 'chang na/ tshangs par mi spyod pa yang tshangs par spyod par
spyod par 'gyur ro/ /thub par ma byas pa yang thub par byas par 'gyur ro/ /mi gtsang ba yang gtsang bar byas par 'gyur ro/ /bsnyen gnas ma byas pa yang bsnyen gnas byas par
'gyur ro/ /gang dag mtshams med pa lnga byas pa de yang sdig pa ma lus pa 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa yang ma lus par zad par 'gyur ro/ /bud med gang la la
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tog nas byung ba'i gdug dkar po zhes bya ba gzhan gyi mi thub ma phyir zlog pa chen mo'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo 'di 'chang na bu 'dod
pa des kyang bu rnyed de/ tshe dang bsod nams dang stobs kyang rab tu ldan no/ /'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye ste/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang /
gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /gang la la zhig gis mi nad dang / ba lang gi nad dang / nag nad dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa
dang / 'go ba'i nad dang / 'khrug pa thams cad dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'ong ba la bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi pham pa/ de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba gdug dkar po can zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir zlog pa'i rigs sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la
btags te rim 'gro cher mchod pa chen po byas nas/ grong khyer thams cad kyi sgo 'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ ljongs sam/ grong rdal lam/
dur khrod dam/ ri'am/ dgon pa'i gnas su gzugs so/ /gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir zlog ma chen mo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo 'di rim gro cher byas te/ gtsugs pa tsam gyis
g.yul zhi bar byas par 'gyuro/ /yam gyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'go ba'i nad dang / 'khrug pa thams cad dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /
klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas dang / klu'i rgyal po dung skyong dang / klu'i rgyal po nag po chen po dang / klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dang / gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po thams cad
kyis kyang dus dus su char 'bebs so/ /dus dus su glog 'byin to/ /dus dus su 'brug sgrogs so/ /nad dang gnod pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /

oM hU~M Sh+ToM ban d+ha ban d+ha sarba duSh+TAn rak+Sha ma ma sa pa ri bA ra s+ya sarba satwA~M sh+tsa swAhA/ oM hU~M Sh+ToM ban d+ha ban d+ha sarba duSh+TAn rak+Sha rak+Sha ma ma sa pa ri bA ra s+ya sarba satwA~Msh+tsa badzra pA Ni hU~M phaT
swA hA/ oM sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha a na pa lo ke te mUr+d+ha ni te dzo rA shi/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa la/ khA da khA da/ d+ha ka d+ha ka /da ra da ra/ bi da ra bi da ra/ ts+tshin da ts+tshin da/

b+hin d+ha b+hin d+ha/ hU~M hU~M phaT phaT rak+Sha rak+Sha ma ma sa pa ri bA ra s+ya sarba satwA~Msh+tsa swA hA/ oM sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tre hU~M phaT swA hA/ hU~M rak+Sha rak+Sha ma ma sa pa ri
bA ra s+ya sarba sa satwA~M sh+tsa hU~M phaT swA hA/ tad+ya thA oM a na le a na le/ a tsa le a tsa le/ kha sa me kha sa me/ bI re bI re/ bai ra bai ra/ sau mye sau mye/

sarba bud d+ha a d+hiSh+ThI na a d+hiSh+Thi te sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA pa tre sarba duSh+na tsita tA na hU~M phaT swA hA/ sangs rgyas kyi rnal 'byor gyis shig pa thams cad la lan gsum bzlas par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems

dpa' thams cad dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir zlog pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo/ rdzogs s+ho// //

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tre a pa rA dzi ta ma hA pra t+ya~M gi ra pa ra ma sid+d+ha nA ma d+ha ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis

mi thub ma phyir zlog pa chen mo mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das
gzhan gyis mi thub pa gtsug tor rgyal mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i gnas chos bzangs lha'i mdun sa na/ dge slong

gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs nas gtsug tor rnam

par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor gyi dbus nas gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag byung ngo / /sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byams pa la sogs

pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten na dgra bcom pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

phyir mi 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten na yang dag par song ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha'i drang srong dmod pa 'dor ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rig sngags

'chang grub pa'i drang srong phan 'dogs nus pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rig sngags 'chang grub pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /legs ldan drag po dka' thub zlog

pa'i bdag po dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /legs ldan sred med kyi bu phyag rgya chen po lngas phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /legs ldan nag po chen po grong khyer sum brtseg 'jig par byed pa dur khrod na gnas
pa mos pa ma mo'i tshogs kyis phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das pad mo'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das

rdo rje'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das nor bu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das glang po'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das gzhon nu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan

'das klu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' brtan pa'i sde mtshon cha'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa la phyag

'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bai du r+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag

par sa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sa lA'i dbang po'i rgyal po me tog kun du rgyas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshalo/ /

bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs

rgyas kun du bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa

dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan rgyas pa ut+pa la'i dri'i tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung

ba gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir zlog pa chen mo 'di 'byung po'i gdon thams cad tshar gcod par byed pa/ gzhan gyi rig sngags thams cad gcod par byed pa/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad

zlog pa/ sems can gsod pa dang / bcings pa thams cad las grol bar byed pa/ sdang ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa ltas ngan pa thams cad zlog pa/ gnod sbyin dang srin po'i gdon thams cad 'jig par byed pa/ gdon stong phrag

brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi 'jig par byed pa/ rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad dga' bar byed pa/ gza' chen po brgyad 'jig par byed par dgra thams cad zlog par byed pa/ ma rungs pa dang / sdang ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa thams cad 'jig par byed

pa/ dug dang / mtshon thams cad dang / me dang chu las zlog par byed pa/ ngan 'gro'i 'jig pa thams cad las sgrol ba ste/ gzhan gyis mi thub drag shul che/ /gtum pa chen mo stobs chen mo/ /'bar ba chen mo gzi brjid che/ /

dkar chen 'bar phreng gos dkar mo/ /'phags ma sgrol ma khro gnyer can/ /rgyal ba'i rdo rje phreng zhes grags/ /pad ma'i mngon mtshan rdo rjes mtshan/ /gzhan gyis mi thub phreng ba can/ /rdo rje'i mchu can rnam sgeg mo/ /zhi ba'i lha rnams

kyis mchod ma/ /zhi ba gser gyi phreng ba can/ /dkar chen 'bar ba gos dkar mo/ /'phags ma sgrol ma stobs chen mo/ /rdo rje lu gu rgyud gzhan dang / /rdo rje gzhon nu rigs 'dzin ma/ /lag na rdo rje'i rigs gser phreng / /le brgan rtsi dang

rin chen ma/ /snang mdzad rdo rje gtsug tor grags/ /phyag rgya dang sngags kyi tshogs de dag thams cad kyis bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang / sems can thams cad bsrung du gsol/ oM sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tre hUM drUM hrIHSh+ToM/ dzam+b+ha

n+ka rI hUM drUM hrIHSh+ToM/ stam+b+ha na ka rI hU~M drU~M hrIHSh+ToM/ lam+b+ha na ka rI hU~M drU~M hrIHSh+ToM/ sam b+ha k+Sha na ka rI hU~M drU~M hrIHSh+ToM/ ba ha na ka rI hU~M drU~M hrIHSh+ToM/ pa ra bi Sha b+hak+Sha Na ka rI hU~M drU~M hrIHSh+ToM/ sarba duSh+Ta pra duSh+Ta NA~M stam b+ha na ka rI hU~M drU~M hrIHSh+ToM/ sarba yak+Sha rAk+Sha sa gra hA NA~M bi

d+h+wa~M sa na ka rI hU~M drU~M hrIHSh+ToM/ sarba pa ra bid+yA ts+tshe da na ka rI hUM drUM hrIHSh+ToM/ tsa tu ra shI tI nA~M gra ha sa ha srA nA~M bid+h+wa sa na ka rI hUM drU hrIHSh+ToM/ aSh+Ta baM shi tI nA~M nak+Sha trA NA~M pra sa d+ha na ka rI hUM drUM hrIHSh+ToM/ aSh+Ta Na~M nA~M ma hA gra hA NA~M bi d+h+wa~M sa na ka rI hU~M drU~M hrIHSh+ToM/ rak+Sha rak+Sha

mA~M sarba satwa~M sh+tsa/ bcom ldan 'das ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can rdo rje gtsug tor phyir zlog pa chen mo/ phyag stong mnga' ba chen mo/ dbu stong mnga' ba chen mo/ spyan bye ba brgya stong mnga' ba/

mi phyed 'bar ba'i mtshan rtags can/ rdo rje yangs pa chen mos sa gsum gyi dkyil 'khor du bdag dang sems can thams cad bde legs su gyur cig /rnam par bsgyings ma'i rdo rje dang / /gser 'od lta bu'i spyan mnga'

ma/ /rdo rje 'gros dang dkar mo dang / /pad ma'i spyan dang zla 'od dang / /sangs rgyas dpal dang de bzhin spyan/ /rdo rje nyi ma'i 'od dang ni/ /de bzhin zla ba rdo rje 'dzin/ /rig pa dang phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyi tshogs de dag thams cad kyis

bdag dang sems can thams cad kun nas bsrung bar mdzad du gsol/ /oM r-i Shi ga NaM pra shas+t+ya sarba ta thA ga toSh+Ni Sha si tA ta pa tre hU~M drA~M/ dzam b+ha na ka rI hU~M drA~M/ stam b+ha ni ka rI hU~M dru~M/ pa ra bid+yA sam b+ha k+Sha na ka rI hU~M drU~M/ pa ra bid+ya sam sa

b+ha k+Sha na ra ka rI hU~M drU~M/ sarba duSh+Ta NA~M stam b+ha na ka rI hU~M drU~M/ sarba yak+Sha rak+Sha sa gra hA NA~M bi d+h+wa~M sa na ka rI hU~M drU~M/ tsa tu rA shi tI nA~M gra ha sa ha srA tA~M bi d+h+wa~M sa na ka rI hU~M drU~M/ aSh+TA bi sha tI nA~M nak+Sha tra NA~M pra sa d+ha na ka rI hU~M drU~M/ aSh+TA NA~M ma hA gra ha NA~M ba d+h+wa~M

sa na ka rI hU~M drU~M/ hU~M hU~M phaT phaT rak+Sha rak+Sha mA~M swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can rdo rje gtsug tor phyir zlog pa chen mo/ phyag stong mnga' ba chen mo/ dbu stong mnga'

ba chen mo/ spyan bye ba brgya stong mnga' ba chen mo/ mi phyed 'bar ba'i mtshan rtags can/ rdo rje yangs pa chen mos sa gsum gyi dkyil 'khor la mnga' mdzad ma kun bdag la bsrung du gsol/ bdag dang sems can thams cad

rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang / rkun po'i 'jigs pa dang / me'i 'jigs pa dang / chu'i 'jigs pa dang / dug gi 'jigs pa dang / mtshon gyi 'jigs pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pa dang / mu ge'i 'jigs pa dang / dgra yi

'jigs pa dang / lce 'bab pa'i 'jigs pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa dang / sa g.yo ba'i 'jigs pa dang / skar mda' ltung ba'i 'jigs pa dang / rgyal po'i chad pa'i 'jigs pa dang / las kyi 'jigs pa dang / klu'i 'jigs

pa dang / glog gi 'jigs pa dang / nam mkha' lding gi 'jigs pa dang / gcan zan khro bo'i 'jigs pa dang / lha'i gdon dang / klu'i gdon dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon dang / rlung lha'i gdon dang / nam mkha' lding gi gdon dang / dri za'i gdon dang /

mi 'am ci'i gdon dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gdon dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang / srin po'i gdon dang / yi dgas kyi gdon dang / sha za'i gdon dang / 'byung po'i gdon dang / grul bum gyi gdon dang / srul po'i gdon dang / lus srul po'i gdon dang /

skem byed kyi gdon dang / rjed byed kyi gdon dang / smyo byed kyi gdon dang / grib gnon gyi gdon dang / gnon po'i gdon dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon dang / nam gru'i gdon dang / gshin rje'i gdon dang / bya'i gdon dang / ma mo dga' bar byed

pa'i gdon dang / kun du 'breng ba'i gdon dang / tsher ma 'don pa'i gdon las bdag bde legs su gyur cig /zas su mdangs za ba dang / zas su mngal za ba dang / zas su khrag thung ba dang / zas su zhag za ba dang / zas su sha za ba

dang / zas su tshil za ba dang / zas su rkang za ba dang / zas su btsas pa za ba dang / srog 'phrog pa dang / zas su skyugs pa za ba dang / zas su phyi sa za ba dang / zas su gcin 'thung ba dang / zas su gtor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba dang /

zas su lhag ma za ba dang / zas su 'chil ma 'thung ba dang / zas su snabs za ba dang / zas su ngar snabs za ba dang / zas su mi gtsang ba za ba dang / zas su gtor ma za ba dang / zas su phreng ba za ba dang / zas su dri za ba dang / zas

su bdug pa za ba dang / sems 'phrog pa dang / zas su me tog za ba dang / zas su 'bras bu za ba dang / zas su lo tog za ba dang / zas su sbyin sreg za ba'i gdon las bdag la bsrung ba gyis shig /gdon de dag thams cad kyi rig

sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /kun du rgyus byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /mkha' 'gro dang mkha' 'gro mas byas pa'i rig sngags bcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /tshangs pas byas pa'i rig sngags

gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /dbang phyug chen pos byas pa'i rig sngags gcod do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /sred med kyi bus byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /nam mkha' lding yang dag pa dang lhan cig

pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /nag po chen pos byas pa'i rig sngag gcad do/ /phur bu gdab bo/ /ma mo'i tshogs rnams kyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /mi'i thod pa

can gyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bu gdab bo/ /rgyal bar byed pa'i dang / sbrang rtsir byed pa dang / don kun sgrubs pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /sring mo bzhis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad

do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /b+h+ri gi ri ti dang / dga' byed dbang phyug dang / tshogs kyi bdag po dang lhan cig pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bu gdab bo/ /dge sbyong gcer bus byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab

bo/ /dge sbyong mgo reg gis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /dgra bcom pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /'dod chags dang bral bas byas pa'i sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /

'jig rten dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /lag na rdo rje 'khor dang bcas pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /pho nya dang / pho nya mo dang / bran pho dang /

bran mos byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /drang srong gi tshogs thams cad kyis byas pa'i rig sngags bcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus

gdab bo/ /mi 'phrod pa za ba'i tshogs kyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'

thams cad kyis phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag la bsrung du gsol/ bsrung du gsol/ oM a si tA na lArka pra b+hA s+phu Ta bi ka si tA ta pa tre/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa la/ khA da khA da/ ha na ha na/ da ra da ra/ bi da ra bi da ra/

ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ snying po'o/ /he he phaT/ ho ho phaT/ a mo g+ha ya phaT/ a pra te ha tA ya phaT/ ba ra dA ya phaT/ ba ra pra dA ya phaT/ pra t+ya~M gi ri tA ya phaT/ a su ra bi drA pa Na ka rA

ya phaT/ ba ra bi drA pa Na ka rA ya phaT/ sarba de be b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba nA ge b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba yak+She b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba rAk+Sha se b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba b+hU te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pre te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pi shA tse b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kuSh+man Te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pU ta

ne b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ka Ta pUn ta ne b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba skan+d+he b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba bon+ma de b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ts+tsha ye b+h+ya phaT/ sarba a pa smA re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba sta ra ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba DA ki nI b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba re ba tI b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba yA ma ye

b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba sha ku ni b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba mA tr-i ga ne b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kam+bu kA mi nA b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba a lam ba ke b+h+ya phaT/ sarba ka Ta Ta ne b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kan+De b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba gan d+ha rbe b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba a su re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba

kan+na re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ga ru De b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ma ho ra ge b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba dur la~M g+hi te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba duHpre k+Shi te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba dz+wa re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba b+ha ye b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pa dra be b+h+yaHphaT/ sarbo pa sarge b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kr-i t+ya karma Ne kA

khor de b+h+yaHphaT/ ki ra Ne bai da Ta b+h+yaHphaT/ tsats+tsha pra sha ka sarba duSh+tsa ra di te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba dur+b+hu k+he b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba tIr+thi ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba shra ma Ne b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba tIr+thi ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sa pA ta ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba bid+yA d+ha re b+h+yaHphaT/ dza ya ka ra/ ma d+hu ka ra/

sid d+he ka ra sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ke b+h+yo bid+yA tsar+ye b+h+yaHphaT/ tsa tur b+h+yo ba gi nI b+h+yaHphaT/ badzra kau mA rI ye badzra ku la~M d+ha ri bid+yA tsar+ye b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ma hA pra t+ya~M gi re b+h+yaHphaT/ badzra sha~M ka lA ya pra t+ya~M gi ra rA dzA ya phaT/ ma hA kA lA ya mA tr-i ga Na na maskr-i tI

ye phaT/ brah+mA NI ye phaT/ bi Sh+Nu bI ye phaT/ ma he shwa rI ye phaT/ rau drI ye phaT/ ma hA kA lI ye phaT/ tsA muN+DI ye phaT/ kau mA rI ye phaT/ ba rA hI ye phaT/ in drA ye phaT/ a g+ni ye phaT/ ya ma ye phaT/ nI ri te ye phaT/ ba ru NA

ye phaT/ mA ru tI ye phaT/ so mA ye phaT/ I shA nI ye phaT/ kA lA daN DI ye phaT/ kA lA rA trI ye phaT/ ya ma daN+DI ye phaT/ rA trI ye phaT/ kA pA lI ye phaT/ a d+hi muk+ta sh+ma sha na bA si nI ye swa phaT/ oM Sh+Ta~M ban d+ha ban+d+ha rak+Sha rak+Sha mA~M swA hA/

sems can gang su dag bdag la gdug pa dang gdug pa'i seMs dang ldan pa rnams dang / drag shul dang drag shul gyi seM dang ldan pa rnaMs dang sdig pa dang sdig pa'i seM dang ldan pa rnaMs dang 'khrug pa dang 'khrug pa'i seM dang ldan pa rnaMs dang / sdang ba dang sdang ba'i seMs dang ldan pa rnaMs byams

pa'i seMs dang ldan par gyur nas bdag dang seMs can thams cad bsrung du gsol/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig ston brgya mthong bar gyur cig /gnod sbyin dang gdon gang su dag zas su mdangs za ba rnaMs dang / gzi byin 'phrog pa rnams dang /

zas su mngal za ba rnaMs dang / zasu khrag 'thung ba rna~Ms dang / zas su zhag za ba rna~Ms dang / zas su sha za ba rna~Ms dang / zas su tshil za ba rna~Ms dang / zas su rkang za ba rna~Ms dang / zasu btsas pa za ba rna~Ms dang / srog 'phrog pa rna~Ms dang / zasu

lhag ma za ba rna~Ms dang / zasu gtor ma za ba rna~Ms dang / zas su phreng ba za ba rna~Ms dang / zasu dri za ba rna~Ms dang / zasu bdug pa za ba rna~Ms dang / zasu me tog za ba rna~Ms dang zasu 'bras bu za ba rna~Ms dang / zasu lo tog za ba rnaMs dang / zasu sbyin sreg

za ba rna~Ms dang / zasu rnag za ba rna~Ms dang / zasu phyi sa za ba rna~Ms dang / zasu gcin 'thung ba rnaMs dang / zasu 'chil ma 'thung ba rna~Ms dang / zasu skyugs pa za ba rnaMs dang / zasu snabs za ba rna~Ms dang / zasu ngar snabs za ba rna~Ms dang / zasu mi gtsang ba za ba

rnaMs dang / zasu gtor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba rnaMs dang / sdig pa'i seMs dang ldan pa rna~Ms dang / gdug pa'i seMs dang ldan pa rna~Ms dang / drag shul gyi seMs dang ldan pa rnaMs dang / 'khrug pa'i seMs dang ldan pa rnaMs dang sdang ba'i sems dang ldan

pa rna~Ms dang / lha'i gdon rnaMs dang / klu'i gdon rnaMs dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon rnams dang / srin po'i gdon rna~Ms dang / 'byung po'i gdon rnams dang / yi dgas kyi gdon rnams dang / sha za'i gdon rnams dang / kum

b+haN Da'i gdon rnams dang / srul po'i gdon rnams dang / lus srul po'i gdon rnams dang / skem byed kyi gdon rnams dang / smyo byed kyi gdon rnams dang / grib gnod gyi gdon rnams dang / rjed byed kyi gdon rnams dang / gnon po'i gdon rnaMs

dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon rnams dang / nam gru'i gdon rnams dang / gshin rje'i gdon rnams dang / bya'i gdon rnams dang / ma mo dga' bar byed pa'i gdon rnams dang / kun du 'breng ba'i gdon rnaMs dang / re lde 'don rnaMs dang / tsher ma 'don

pa'i gdon rnams las bdag bsrung bar mdzad du gsol/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig /ston brgya mthong bar gyur cig /rims nyin gcig pa rnams dang nyin gnyis pa rnams dang / nyin gsum pa rnams dang / nyin bzhi pa rnams dang / nyin bdun

pa rna~Ms dang / rtag pa'i rims rnams dang / rims mi zad pa rnams dang / 'byung po'i rims rnams dang / rlung las gyur pa rnams dang / khris pa las gyur pa rnams dang / bad kan las gyur pa rnams dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa rnaMs dang / ri~Ms

nad thams cad dang / klad pa na ba bsal du gsol/ gzhogs phyed na ba dang / yi ga 'chus pa dang / mig nad dang / sna nad dang / kha nad dang / mgul nad dang / snying nad dang / lkog ma'i lha gor na ba dang / rna ba na ba dang / so na ba dang /

snying na ba dang / gnad na ba dang / rtsib logs na ba dang / rgyab na ba dang / lto ba na ba dang / rked pa na ba dang / chu so na ba dang / brla na ba dang / rje ngar na ba dang / lag pa na ba dang / rkang pa na ba dang / yan lag na ba dang / nying lag na ba bsal
du gsol/ gdugs dkar po can rdo rje gtsug tor phyir zlog pa chen mo 'dis dpag tshad bcu gnyis

kyi nang tshun chad du 'byung po dang / ro langs dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / rims nad dang / shu ba dang / g.yan pa dang / 'brum bu phra mo dang / mtshan bar rdol ba dang / mdze dang / phol mig dang / bas bldags dang / me dbal dang /

g.yan pa dang / lhog pa dang / skeMs pa dang / skrag pa dang / lud pa lu ba dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / mi dran pa dang / dbyig dug dang / dug sbyar ma dang / byad dang / me dang chu dang / mi ngas dang / bdud dang / 'ching ba dang / dgra dang / dgon pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / sbrang

bu t+r+ya~M bu ka dang / trai la tA ka dang / sdig pa dang / sbrul dang / sre mo dang / seng ge dang / stag dang / dom dang / dred dang / g.yag rgod dang / chu srin la sogs pa'i srog chags rnaMs bsal du gsol/ de dag thaMd kyi rigs sngags bcing bar bya'o/ /gzi brjid bcing bar bya'o/ /

gzhan thaMd kyi rig sngags bcing bar bya'o/ /'tshaMs bcing bar bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ oM a na le a na le/ kha sa me kha sa me/ bI ra bI ra/ sau mye sau mye/ shAn+te shAn+te/ dAn+te dAn+te/ bi Sha de bi Sha de/ bai re bai re/ de bi badzra d+hA ri ban+d+ha ban+d+ha ni badzra pA Ni phaT/ oM hU~M drU~M hrIHSh+To~M phaT swA hA/

oM badzra pA Ni ban+d+ha ban+d+ha badzra pA she na ma ma sarba duSh+Ta bi nA ya kA~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ /sus de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyi mi thub pa phyir bzlog pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal

mo 'di gro ga 'am/ ras sam shing shu nA las bris te/ lus sam mgul du thogs saM klog par byed na de la ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du dug gi mi tshugs/ mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ me'i mi tshugs/ chus mi tshugs/ dbyig dug gis mi tshugs/

dug sbyar mas mi tshugs/ byad kyis mi tshugs/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyuro/ /gdon thaMd dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren thaMd kyang dga' bar 'gyuro/ /rdo rje'i rigs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong

phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi rnaMs dang grub pa'i lha mo rnaMs kyis kyang de la rtag tu 'thun par bsrung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed par byed do/ /de rnaMs kyi yid du 'ong ba dang dga' bar yang 'gyuro/ /bskal pa chen po stong phrag brgyad

bcu rtsa bzhir skye ba dran par 'gyuro/ /rdo rje'i pho nya mo drug bcu rtsa bzhi yang rtag par yongasu skyong bar 'gyuro/ /nam du yang gnod sbyin dang srin po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / srul po dang / lus srul po nyid du mi 'gyuro/ /mi dbul por mi

'gyuro/ /sangs rgyas bac+doMs grangs med dpag tu med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bsod naMs kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyuro/ /sangs rgyas bac+doMs dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bsrung ba dang /

bskyab pa dang / sbed par mdzad cing / de dag gi thugasu byon pa dang dgyes par yang 'gyuro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i phyir bzlogs pa'i rig

sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di 'chang na tshangs par mi spyod pa yang tshangs par spyod par 'gyuro/ /thub par ma byas pa yang thub par 'gyuro/ /mi gtsang ba yang gtsang bar 'gyuro/ /bsrung ba ma byas pa yang bsrung ba byas par 'gyuro/ /

mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yang 'byang bar 'gyuro/ /sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa yang ma lus zad par 'gyuro/ /rigs kyis bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo bu 'dod pa gang la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar

mo can phyir bzlog ma chen mo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di 'chang ngam klog na bu 'dod pa des bu rnyed de/ tshe dang / bsod naMs dang / stobs kyang rab tu rnyed do/ /'di nas shi phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khaMs bde ba can du skye bar 'gyuro/ /

mi nad dang / phyug nad dang / yaMs kyi nad dang / 'tshe ba dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa thaMd dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'ong ba thaMd la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar mo can zhes bya ba

gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir bzlog pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te rim 'gro cher byas te mchod pa chen po byas la grong khyer thaMd kyi sgo 'aM/ grong ngaM / grong khyer raM/ grong rdal laM/ ljongs saM/ dgon

pa'i gnasu gzugs so/ /'phags pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir bzlog ma chen mo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di rim gro cher byas te btsugs ma thag tu g.yul zhi bar byas par 'gyuro/ /yaMs kyi nad dang / 'tshe

ba dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thaMd rab tu zhi bar 'gyuro/ /tad+ya thA/ oM Sh+To~M ban+d+ha ban+d+ha ma ma rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/ oM Sh+To~M ban+d+ha ban+d+ha badzra ma ma rak+Sha rak+Sha badzra pa Ni hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha a na le a ba lo ki

te tsur+Na te dz+wa rA shi/ /oM dz+wa la dz+wa la/ d+ha ka d+ha ka d+ha ra d+ha ra/ bi da ra bi da ra/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ oM sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha hU~M phaT swA hA/ tad+ya thA/ a na le a na le/ kha sa me kha sa me/ bai re bai re/ sau me sau/ sarba bud+d+ha a d+heSh+ThA

na a d+heSh+Tha te/ sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tre hU~M phaT/ hU~M ma ma hU~M ni hU~M swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas dang / klu'i rgyal po dung skyong dang / klu'i rgyal po nag po chen po rnams kyis dus dus su char 'bebs so/ /dus dus su sprin bsdudo/ /dus dusu 'brug

gi sgra sgrogs par 'gyuro/ /nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad la sangs rgyas rnal 'byor du byas la lan gsum bzlas par bya'o/ /sang+yas dang / byang chub seMs dpa' rnaMs dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rang

te/ bcom ldan kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub pa chen mo phyir mi bzlogs pa mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba'i

gzungs rdzogs s+ho// //paN+Di ta pa ra hi ta b+ha dra dang / lo ts+tsha ba zu dga' rdor gyis kha che'i bdud rtsi 'byung gnas kyi gtsug lag kha~M dpe rnying la gtugs nas gtan la phab pa'o/ / @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ta thA ga to

Sh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tre a pa rA dzI ta nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo/ /

sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshalo/ /chos la phyag 'tshalo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshalo/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun nyan thos kyi

dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnaMs la phyag 'tshalo/ /'jig rten na dgra bcom pa rnaMs la phyag 'tshalo/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa rnaMs la phyag 'tshalo/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnaMs la phyag 'tshalo/ /phyir mi 'ong ba rnaMs la phyag 'tshalo/ /'jig

rten na yang dag par song ba rnaMs la phyag 'tshalo/ /yang dag par zhugs pa rnaMs la phyag 'tshalo/ /lha'i drang srong dmod pa 'dor ba dang phan 'dogs pa nus pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rig sngags 'chang grub pa rnaMs la

phyag 'tshalo/ /tshang pa la phyag 'tshalo/ /dbang po la phyag 'tshal/ /legs ldan drag po dka' thub bzlog pa'i bdag po dang lhan cig pa la phyag 'tshalo/ /legs ldan srid med kyi bu phyag rgya chen po lngas phyag byas pa la

phyag 'tshalo/ /legs ldan nag po chen po grong khyer su brtseg 'jig par byed pa dur khrod na gnas par mos pa ma mo'i tshogs kyis phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshalo/ /bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung la phyag 'tshalo/ /

pad mo'i gdung la phyag 'tshalo/ /rdo rje'i gdung la phyag 'tshalo/ /nor bu'i gdung la phyag 'tshalo/ /glang po'i gdung la phyag 'tshalo/ /gzhon nu'i gdung la phyag 'tshalo/ /klu'i gdung la phyag 'tshalo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' brtan pa'i sde mtshon cha'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo/ /bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od

dpag med la phyag 'tshalo/ /bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi khrug pa la phyag 'tshalo/ /bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa ya~M dag par rdzogs pa'i sang+yas

sman gyi bla bai d+'u r+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sa la'i dbang po'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa la phyag

'tshalo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshalo/ /bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sang+yas

rin po che tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo/ /bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzung po la phyag 'tshalo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom

pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnaM par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan rgyas pa ut+pa la gsung gi tog gi rgyal po
la phyag 'tshalo/ /de rnaMs la phyag 'tshal nas/ bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdug dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i phyir bzlog pa chen po 'dis 'byung po'i

gdon thaMd tshad gcod pa/ gzhan gyi rig sngags thaMd gcod pa/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba las zlog pa/ sems can bcings pa thaMd 'grol ba/ sdang ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa thaMd zlog pa/ gdon brgyad

khri bzhi stong 'jig par byed pa/ rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad dga' bar byed pa/ gza' chen po brgyad 'jig par byed pa/ dgra thams cad bzlog pa/ ma rungs pa dang / sdang ba dang / rmi laM ngan pa thaMd 'jig par byed pa/ dug

dang mtshon dang me dang chu la sgrol ba ste/ gzhan gyis mi thub drag shul che/ /gtuM po chen mo stobs chen mo/ /'bar ba chen mo gzi brjid che/ /dkar mo chen mo stobs chen mo/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba gos dkar mo/ /

'phags ma sgrol ma khro gnyer can/ /rgyal ba'i rdo rje phreng zhes grags/ /pad ma'i mngon mtshan rdo rjes mtshan/ /gzhan gyis mi thub phreng ba can/ /rdo rje mkhar bsnaMs 'joms pa mo/ /zhi ba'i lha rnaMs kyis mchod pa/ /gzugs

zhi gzi brjid chen mo can/ /'phags ma sgrol ma stobs chen mo/ /rdo rje lu gu rgyud gzhan dang / /rdo rje gzhon nu rigs 'dzin ma/ /lag na rdo rje rigs gser phreng / /leb rgan rtsi dang rin chen ma/ /snang mdzad rdo rje gtsug tor

grags/ /rnaMs par bsgyings ma'i rdo rje dang / /gser 'od lta bu'i spyan mnga' ba/ /rdo rje sgros dang dkar mo dang / /pad ma'i spyan dang zla 'od dang / /phyag brgya'i tshogs de dag thams cad kyis bdag la bsrung du gsol/ bsrung

ba mdzad du gsol/ oM rI Shi ga Na pra sha sta ya sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tre hU~M drU~M/ dzam b+ha na ka rI hU~M drU~M/ stam b+ha na ka rI hU~M drU~M/ ma hA bid+yA sam b+ha k+Sha Na ka rI hU~M drU~M/ pa ra bid+yA s+ham+b+ha k+Sha Na ka rI hU~M drU~M/ sarba duSh+TA nA~M stam+b+ha na ka rI hU~M

drU~M/ sarba yak+Sha rAk+Sha sa gra hA nA~M bi trU~M sa na ka rI hU~M drU~M/ tsa tu ra shI tI nA~M gra ha sa ha srA NA~M bi d+h+wA~M sa na ka rI hU~M drU~M/ aSh+Ta bi sha tI nA~M nak+Sha trA nA~M pra sA da nA~M ka rI hU~M drU~M/ aSh+Ta nA~M ma hA gra hA NA~M bi d+h+wA~M sa na ka rI hU~M drU~M/ rak+Sha rak+Sha mA~M/ bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs

pa'i gtsugs tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can rdo rje gtsug tor phyir zlog pa chen mo/ phyag stong mnga' ba chen mo/ dbu stong mnga' ba chen mo/ spyan bye ba brgya phrag stong mnga' ba chen mo/ mi phyed 'bar ba'i

mtshan rtags can/ rdo rje yangs pa chen mos sa gsuM gyi dkyil 'khor la mnga' mdzad pas kunas bdag la bsrung du gsol/ bsrung du gsol/ oM rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang / chom rkun gyis 'jigs pa dang / me'i 'jigs

pa dang / chu yis 'jigs pa dang / dug gis 'jigs pa dang / mtshon gyis 'jigs pa dang / pha rol gyis dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pa dang / mu ge'i 'jigs pa dang / dgra'i 'jigs pa dang / lce 'bab pa'i 'jigs pa dang /
dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa dang / sa g.yo ba'i 'jigs pa dang / skar mda' ltung ba'i 'jigs pa dang / rgyal po'i chad pa'i 'jigs pa dang / lha yi 'jigs pa dang / klu yi 'jigs pa dang / glog gi

'jigs pa dang / naMmakha' lding gi 'jigs pa dang / gcan zan khrau'i 'jigs pa dang / lha'i gdon dang / klu'i gdon dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon dang / rlung lha'i gdon dang / naMkha' lding gi gdon dang / dri za'i gdon dang / mi 'am

ci'i gdon dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gdon dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang / srin po'i gdon dang / yi dgas kyi gdon dang / sha za'i gdon dang / 'byung po'i gdon dang / grul buM gyi gdon dang / srul po'i gdon dang / skeMs

byed kyi gdon dang / rjed byed kyi gdon dang / smyo byed kyi gdon dang / grib gnon gyi gdon dang / gnon po'i gdon dang / mkha'agro ma'i gdon dang / naM gru'i gdon dang / gdon de dag thaMd las bdag bde legasu gyur cig /

mdangs 'phrog pa dang / zasu mngal za ba dang / zasu khrag 'thung ba dang / zasu zhag za ba dang / zasu sha za ba dang / zasu tshil za ba dang / zasu rkang za ba dang / zasu btsas pa za ba dang / srog phrog pa dang / zasu skyug pa

za ba dang / zasu mi gtsang ba za ba dang / zasu gcin 'thung ba dang / zasu gtor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba dang / zasu su lhag ma za ba dang / zasu mchil ma 'thung ba dang / zasu snabs za ba dang / zasu ngar snabs za ba dang /

zasu rnag za ba dang / zasu gtor ma za ba dang / zasu phreng ba za ba dang / zasu dri za ba dang / zasu bdug pa za ba dang / seMs 'phrog pa dang / zasu me tog za ba dang / zasu 'bras bu za ba dang / zasu lo tog za ba dang / zasu sbyin sregs

za ba de dag thaMd las bdag bde legasu gyur cig /de dag thaMd dang gdon thaMd kyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /kun du rgyus byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /mkha'agro dang

mkha'agro mas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /phyug bdag chen pos byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /sred med kyi bus byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /naMkha' kha' lding yang

dag pa dang lhan cig pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /nag po chen po dang ma mo'i tshogs kyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /mi'i thod pa can gyis byas pa'i rig sngags

gcad do/ /phur bu gdab bo/ /rgyal bar byed pa dang / sbrang rtsir byed pa dang / don kun sgrub pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /sring mo bzhis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab

bo/ /b+h+ri~M gi ri ti dang / dga' byed dbang phyug dang / tshogs kyi bdag po dang lhan cig pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /dge sbyong gcer bus byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /

dgra bcom pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /'dod chags dang bral bas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab po/ /gsa~M ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur

bus gdab bo/ /bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdug dkar po can khyod la phyag 'tshalo/ /bdag la bsrung du gsol/ bsrung du gsol/ oM a si tA na lA rka pra b+hA s+phu Ta bi ka si tA ta pa tre/ dz+wa la dz+wa

la/ khA da khA da/ da ra da ra/ bi da ra bi da ra/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ b+hin d+ha b+hin d+ha/ hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ he he phaT/ ho ho phaT/ a mo g+he phaT/ a pra ti hA tA phaT/ pa ra pra da phaT/ a su ra bi drA pa ka phaT/ sarba de be b+h+yaHphaT/

sarba nA ge b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba a su re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ma ri te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ga ru Di b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba gan+d+ha rbe b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kin+na re/ b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ma ho ra ge b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba yak+She b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba rAk+She se b+h+yaHphaT/

sarba pre te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pi shA tse b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba b+hu te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ku~M b+hAN+De b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pU ta ni b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ka Ta pU ta ni b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba skan+d+ha d+he b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba un mA de b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ts+tsha ye b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba a pa smA

re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba o sta ra ge b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba durling+ga te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba duSh+The k+Shi te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba dz+wa re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kr-i t+ya karma NA ka khordo b+h+yaHphaT/ ki ra Na bi tA Di b+h+yaHphaT/ tsits+tsha pra She ka dush+ts+tsha rdi te b+h+yaHphaT/ dur+b+gu k+te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba r+thi

tI r+thi ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba shra ma Ni b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba bid+yA d+ha re b+h+yaHphaT/ dza ya ka ra/ ma d+hu ka ra/ sarba ar+tha sAng+ga ko b+h+yo bid+yA tsA re b+h+yaHphaT/ tsa tu b+h+yo b+ha gi nI b+h+yaHphaT/ badzra kau mA rI ye b+h+yaHphaT/ bI ng+gA bI d+hA bid+yA rA dz+nyi ye b+h+yaHphaT/ ma hA pra t+ya~M gi re b+h+yaHphaT/

badzra sh-i Sha lA ya pra t+ya~M gi ra rA dzA ya phaT/ ma hA kA lA ya ma tr-i ga Na na ma skr-i tA ye b+h+yaHphaT/ baiSh+Na bI ye phaT/ brAm+ha Ni ye phaT/ ag+ni ye phaT/ ma hA kA lI ye phaT/ kA lA da~M DI ye phaT/ in+d+ra ye phaT/ rau drI ye phaT/ kau ma rI ye phaT/ bA rA hI

ye phaT/ tsa muN+DA ye phaT/ rA trI ye phaT/ kA lA rA trI ye phaT/ ya ma daN+DI ye phaT/ ka pA lI yi phaT/ a d+hi muk+ti sma sA na bA si nI ye phaT/ sems can gang su dag bdag la sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnaMs dang / drag shul gyi seMs

dang ldan pa rnaMs dang / mdangs 'phrog pa rnaMs dang / zasu mngal za ba rnams dang / zasu khrag 'thung ba rnams dang / zasu zhag za ba rnaMs dang / zasu sha za ba rnams dang / zasu tshil za ba rnaMs dang / zasu rkang za ba rnaMs

dang / zasu btsas pa za ba rnaMs dang / srog phrog pa rnaMs dang / zasu skyugs pa za ba rnaMs dang / zasu mi gtsang ba za ba rnaMs dang / zasu gcin 'thung ba rnaMs dang / zasu gtor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba rnaMs dang / zasu

lhag ma za ba rnaMs dang / zasu mchil ma 'thung ba rnaMs dang / zasu snabs za ba rnaMs dang / zasu ngar snabs za ba rnaMs dang / zasu rnag za ba rnaMs dang / zasu gtor ma za ba rnaMs dang / zasu phreng ba za ba rnaMs dang / zasu dri za ba rnaMs dang /
zasu bdug pa za ba rnams dang / sems 'phrog pa rnams dang / zasu me tog za ba rnams dang / zasu 'bras bu za ba rnams dang / zasu lo tog za ba rnams dang / zasu sbyin sreg za ba rnams dang / sdig
pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon rnaMs dang / srin po'i gdon rnaMs dang / yi dgas kyi
gdon rnams dang / sha za'i gdon rnams dang / 'byung po'i gdon rnams dang / grul bum gyi gdon rnams dang / srul po'i gdon rnams dang / lus srul po'i gdon rnams dang / skem byed kyi gdon rnaMs

dang / smyo byed kyi gdon rnams dang / grib gnon gyi gdon rnams dang / rjed byed kyi gdon rnams dang / gnon po'i gdon rnams dang / mkha'agro ma'i gdon rnams dang / nam gru'i gdon rnams dang / gshin rje'i
gdon rnams dang / bya'i gdon rnams dang / ma mo dga' bar byed pa'i gdon rnams dang / kun du 'phreng ba'i gdon rnams dang / tsher ma 'don pa'i gdon rnams dang / rims nyin gcig pa rnams dang /
nyin gnyis pa rnams dang / nyin gsum pa rnams dang / nyin bzhi pa rnams dang / nyin bdun pa rnams dang / rtag pa'i rims rnams dang / rims mi bzad pa rnams dang / rims ldang
dub pa rnams dang / 'byung po'i rims rnams dang / rlung las gyur pa rnams dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa rnams dang / bad kan las gyur pa rnams dang /
'dus pa las gyur pa rnams dang / rims nad thams cad dang klad pa na ba bsal du gsol/ gzhog phyed na ba dang / yi ga 'chus pa dang / mig nad dang / sna nad dang / kha nad dang / mgul

nad dang / snying nad dang / lkog ma'i lha gor na ba dang / rna ba na ba dang / so na ba dang / snying na ba dang / klad pa na ba dang / ske na ba dang / rtsib logs na ba dang / rgyab na ba dang / lto na ba dang / rked pa na ba

dang / chu so na ba dang / brla na ba dang / rje ngar na ba dang / lag pa na ba dang / rkang pa na ba dang / yan lag na ba dang / nying lag na ba bsal du gsol/ gdugs dkar po can rdo rje gtsug tor phyir zlog pa chen mo 'dis

dpag tshad bcu gnyis kyi nang chad du 'byung po dang / ro langs dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / rims dang / shu ba dang / g.yan pa dang / 'brum bu phra mo dang / mdze dang / phol mig dang / bas bldags dang / me dbal dang /

g.ya' ba dang / lhog pa dang / skem pa dang / skrag pa dang / dbyig dug dang / dug sbyar ma dang / byad stems dang / me dang / chu dang / mi ngas dang / dgra dang / gnod pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / sbrang bu t+r+yaM bu ka dang /

trai lA tA dang / sdig pa dang / sbrul dang / sre mo dang / sing ge dang / stag dang / dom dang / dred dang / chu srin dang / bung ba lta bus gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa de dag thams cad kyi rig sngags bcing bar bgyi'o/ /gzi brjid

bcing bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan gyi rig sngags bcing bar bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ oM a na le a na le/ be Sha de bi Sha de/ bai ra bai ra/ badzra d+ha ri baM d+ha baM d+ha ni/ badzra pA Ni phaT hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ hU~M drUM ban d+ha phaT ma ma rak+Sha
rak+Sha swA hA/ sus de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdug dkar po can bzhan gyi mi thub pa phyir zlog pa chen po 'di gro ga 'am/ ras sam/ shing shun la bris te/ lus sam mgul du thogs na/
de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dug gis mi tshugs/ mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ me yis mi tshugs/ chus mi tshugs/ dbyig dug gis mi tshugs/ dug sbyar mas mi tshug / byad kyi mi tshugs/ dus ma yin par 'chi

ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /gdon thams cad dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad kyi yid du 'ong ba dang dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje'i rigs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhis kyang de la

bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sbed par byed de/ de rnams kyi yid du 'ong ba dang dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong du tshe rab dran par 'gyur ro/ /nam du yang gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi

dag dang / srul po dang / lus srul po nyid du mi 'gyur ro/ /mi dbul por mi 'gyuro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grang med dpag tu med pa gang gA klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bsod nam kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs

pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyi mi thub pa phyir zlog pa chen po 'di 'chang na tshangs par mi spyod pa yang tshang par spyod par 'gyur ro/ /thub par ma byas pa yang thub par byas par 'gyur

ro/ /mi gtsang ba yang gtsang bar 'gyur ro/ /bsnyen gnas ma byas pa yang bsnyen gnas byas par 'gyur ro/ /basmyung ba ma byas pa yang basmyung ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yang sdig

pa byang bar 'gyur ro/ /sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa yang ma lus par byang bar 'gyur ro/ /bud med bu 'dod pa gang la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdug dkar po can gzhan gyi mi thub pa chen

po 'di 'chang na bu 'dod pa des de rnyed de/ tshe dang bsod nams dang stobs rnams kyang rab tu rnyed par 'gyuro/ /'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyuro/ /mi nad dang / phyug nad dang / gnag nad dang /

yams kyi nad dang / 'tshe ba dang / nad 'go ba dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / pha rol kyi dmag tshog 'ong ba thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdug dkar po can gzhan gyi mi thub pa phyir

zlog pa chen po 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te/ rim gro cher byas te/ mchod pa chen po byas la/ grong khyer thams cad kyi sgo 'am/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ dgon pa'i gnas

su gzugs so/ /gzhan kyis mi thub pa phyir zlog pa chen po 'di rim gro cher byas te/ btsugs ma thag tu g.yul zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /yams kyi nad dang / 'tshe ba dang / nad 'go ba dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag

tshogs 'ong ba rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /tad+ya thA/ oM Sh+TA+o~M ban d+ha ban d+ha ma ma rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/ A+oM hU~M sh+DA+oM ban+ha ban+ha badzra ma ma rak+Sha rak+Sha badzra pA ni hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha a na ba lo ki ti mur d+ha ni te dzo rA shi/ oM hU~M

dza la dza la/ d+ha ka d+ha ka /da ra da ra/ bi da ra bi da ra/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ b+hin d+ha b+hin d+ha/ hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ oM sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha hU~M phaT swA hA/ tad+ya thA/ oM a na le a na le/ kha sa me kha sa me/ bai re bai re/ sau me sau me/ sarba b+hud

d+hA a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+The te sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha sa ta ta pa tre hU~M phaT/ hU~M ma ma hU~M ni swA hA/ sangs rgyas rnal 'byor du bya'o/ /klu'i rgyal po rnams kyis kyang dus dus su char 'bebs so/ /'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug
tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyi mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// // @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ta thA ga to uSh+NI Sha si ta ta pa tre na ma a pa rA dzi ta d+hA ra ni/
bod skad du/ 'phag pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdug dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo/ /'di skad bdag gi thos pa dus cig

na/ bcom ldan 'das sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i gnas na/ chos bzang lha'i mdun sa na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / thabs gcig tu

bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das gdan bsham pa'i nyid la bzhugs te/ gtsug tor rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyom par zhugaso/ /snyom par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor gyi dbu nas

gsang sngags kyi cho ga 'di dag byung ngo / /sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par rdzog

pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams la phyag 'tshalo/ /'jig rten na dgra bcom pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshalo/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams

la phyag 'tshalo/ /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshalo/ /'jig rten na yang dag par song ba rnams la phyag 'tshalo/ /yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshalo/ /lha'i drang srong dmod pa 'dor ba dang / phan 'dog

nus pa rnams la phyag 'tshalo/ /rig sngags 'chang grub pa rnams la phyag 'tshalo/ /tshangs pa la phyag 'tshalo/ /dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /legs ldan drag po dka' thub bzlog pa'i bdag po dang lhan cig

pa la phyag 'tshalo/ /legs ldan sred med kyi bu phyag rgya chen po lngas phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshalo/ /legs ldan nag po chen po grong khyer sum rtseg 'jigs par byed pa/ dur khrod na gnas par mos pa ma mo'i

tshogs kyis phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshalo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /pad ma'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje'i gdung la phyag 'tshalo/ /nor bu'i gdung la phyag
'tshal lo/ /glang po'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzhon nu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /klu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' brtan pa'i sde mtshon cha'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag
'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrug pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sa la'i dbang po'i
rgyal po me tog kun du rgyas pa la phyag 'tshal bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshalo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas kun du bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom

ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan rgyas pa ut+pa la'i bsung gi tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das ma de bzhin
gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba gdug dkar po can gzhan gyi mi thub pa zhes bya ba phyir bzlog pa chen mo 'di 'byung po'i gdon thams cad tshar gcod pa/ gzhan gyi rig sngag gcod pa/ dus ma yin

par 'chi ba las zlog pa/ sems can bcing pa thams cad 'grol ba/ sdang ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa thams cad bzlog pa/ gdon brgyad khri bzhi stong 'jig par byed pa/ rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad dga' bar byed

pa/ gza' chen po brgyad 'jig par byed pa/ dgra thams cad bzlog pa/ ma rungs pa dang / sdang ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa thams cad 'jig par byed pa/ dug dang mtshon dang me dang chu las sgrol ba ste/ gzhan gyi mi thub dra shul che/ /

gtum pa chen mo stob chen mo/ /'bar ba chen mo gzi brjid che/ /dkar mo chen mo stobs chen mo/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba gos dkar mo/ /'phag ma sgrol ma khro gnyer can/ /rgyal ba'i rdo rje phreng zhes grags/ /pad ma'i

mngon mtshan rdo rje mtshan/ /gzhan gyi mi thub phreng ba can/ /rdo rje mkhar bsnams 'joms pa mo/ /zhi ba'i lha rnams kyis mchod ma/ /gzugs zhi gzi brjid chen mo can/ /'phags ma sgrol ma stobs chen mo/ /

rdo rje lu gu rgyud gzhan dang / /rdo rje gzhon nu rig 'dzin ma/ /lag na rdo rje rigs gser phreng / /leb rgan rtsi dang rin chen ma/ /snang mdzad rdo rje'i gtsug tor grags/ /rnam par bsgyings ma'i rdo rje dang / /gser 'od lta

bu'i spyan mnga' ba/ /rdo rje sgros dang dkar mo dang / /pad ma'i spyan dang zla 'od dang / /phyag rgya'i tshog de dag thams cad kyi bdag la bsrung du gsol/ bsrung du gsol/ oM r-i shi ga Na pra shasta ya/ sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tre

hU~M dru~M/ dzam+b+ha na ka rI hU~M druM/ stam b+ha na ka rI hU~M druM/ ma hA bid+ya sam b+ha k+Sha Na ka rI hU~M druM/ pa ra bid+ya sam b+ha k+Sha Na ka rI hU~M druM/ sarba duSh+TA nA~M staM b+ha na ka rI hU~M druM/ sarba yak+Sha rAk+Sha sa gra hA tAM bid+h+wa n+sa na ka rI hU~M druM/ tsa tur ra shI tI nA~M/ gra ha sa ha srA NA~M/ bi d+h+wan

sa na ka rI hU~M druM/ aSh+Ta bi sha tI nA~M/ nak+Sha trA nA~M pra sA da na ka rI hU~M druM/ aSh+Ta nA ma ma hA gra hA NA ma bid d+h+wan sa na ka rI hU~M druM/ rak+Sha mam/ bsrung du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i

gdug dkar po can rdo rje'i gtsug tor phyir zlog pa chen mo/ phyag stong mnga' ba chen mo/ dbu stong mnga' ba chen mo/ spyan bye ba brgya phrag stong mnga' ba chen mo/ mi phyed 'bar ba'i mtshan rtags can rdo rje yangs pa chen mo/ sa

gsum gyi dkyil 'khor la mnga' mdzad pa chen mo/ kun nas bdag la bsrung du gsol/ bsrung du gsol/ oM rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang / chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa dang / me yi 'jigs pa dang / chu yi 'jigs pa dang / dug gi 'jigs pa dang / mtshon gyi

'jigs pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshog kyis 'jigs pa dang / mu ge yi 'jigs pa dang / dgra yi 'jigs pa dang / nad gyi 'jigs pa dang / lce 'bab pa'i 'jigs pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa dang / sa g.yo ba'i 'jigs pa dang / skar mda'

ltung ba'i 'jigs pa dang / rgyal po'i chad pa'i 'jigs pa dang / lha yi 'jigs pa dang / klu yi 'jigs pa dang / glog gi 'jigs pa dang / nam mkha' lding gi 'jigs pa dang / gcan zan khro bo'i 'jigs pa dang / lha'i gdon dang / klu'i gdon dang /

lha ma yin gyi gdon dang / rlang lha'i gdon dang / nam mkha' lding gi gdon dang / dri za'i gdon dang / mi 'am ci'i gdon dang / lto phye chen po'i gdon dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang / srin po'i gdon dang / yi dag kyi

gdon dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon dang / sha za'i gdon dang / 'byung po'i gdon dang / grul bum gyi gdon dang / srul po'i gdon dang / lus srul po'i gdon dang / skem byed kyi gdon dang / rjed byed kyi gdon

dang / smyo byed kyi gdon dang / grib gnon gyi gdon dang / gnon po'i gdon dang / de dag las kyang bdag bde leg su gyur cig /gzi brjid 'phrog pa dang / mdangs 'phrog pa dang / zas su khrag 'thung ba dang /

zas su zhag za ba dang / zas su sha za ba dang / zas su tshil za ba dang / zas su rkang za ba dang / zas su btsas pa za ba dang / srog 'phrog pa dang / zas su skyugs pa za ba dang / zas su mi gtsang ba za ba dang / zas su gcin 'thung ba dang /

zas su gtor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba dang / zas su lhag ma za ba dang / zas su mchil ma za ba dang / zas su snabs za ba dang / zas su ngar snams za ba dang / zas su snabs za ba dang / zas su gtor ma za ba dang /

zas su phreng ba za ba dang / zas su dri za ba dang / zas su gdug pa za ba dang / sems 'phrog pa dang / zas su me tog za ba dang / zas su 'bras bu za ba dang / zas su lo tog za ba dang / zas su sbyin sreg za ba las bdag bde

legs su gyur cig /de dag tham cad dang / gdon thams cad kyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /kun du rgyus byas pa'i rig sag gcad do/ /phur bu gdab bo/ /mkha' 'gro dang / mkha' 'gro mas
byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /phyugs bdag chen pos byas pa'i rigs sngags bcad gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /sred med kyi bus byas pa'i rig sngag gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /

nam mkha' lding yang yang dag pa dang / lhan cig pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /nag po chen po dang / ma mo'i tshogs kyi byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /mi'i thod

pa can gyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ rgyal bar byed pa dang / sbrang rtsir byed pa dang / don kun grub pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /sring mo bzhi byas pa'i

rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /b+h+ring gi ri Ti dang / dga' byed dbang phyug dang / tshogs kyi bdag po dang lhan cig pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /dge sbyong gcer bus
byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /dgra bcom pas byas pa'i rig sngags bcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /'dod chags dang bral bas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /
phur bus gdab bo/ /gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba gdug dkar po can khyod la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag la bsrung du gsol/ bsrung du gsol/ oM a si tA na lA rkA pra b+hA s+phu Ta/ bi ka si tA ta pa tre/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ khA da khA da/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ bi d+ha ra bi d+ha ra/ ts+tshin da ts+tshin da/ bin da bin da/ hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ he he

phaT ho ho phaT/ a mo g+he phaT/ a pra ti ha ta phaT/ ba ra pra dA phaT/ a su ri ba drA ba ka phaT/ sarba de be b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba nA ge b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba a su re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ma ru ta b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ga~M d+ha rbe b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kin na re b+h+yaHsarba

ma ho ra ge b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba yak+She b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba rAk+She se b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pre te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pi shA tsi b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba b+hu te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kum b+hA N+De b+h+ya phaT/ sarba pU ta ni b+h+ya phaT/ sarba ka Ta pU ta ne b+h+ya phaT/ sarba skaM d+he b+h+ya phaT/ sarbon+mA n+de b+h+yaH

b+ha phaT/ sarba ts+tshA ye b+h+ya phaT/ sarba a pa smA re b+h+ya phaT/ sarba o sta ra ke b+h+ya phaT/ sarba dur laM gi te b+h+ya phaT/ sarba duSh+p+re k+Shi te b+h+ya phaT/ sarba dz+wa re b+h+ya phaT/ sarba kr-i t+ya kar ma kA khorda b+h+ya phaT/ ki ra Na be tA Da b+h+ya phaT/ tsits+tsha pre sha ka du sh+ts+tsha ra di

te b+h+ya phaT/ dur b+huka te b+h+ya phaT/ sarba tir thi ke b+h+ya phaT/ sarba shra ma Ne b+h+ya phaT/ sarba bid+yA d+ha re b+h+ya phaT/ dza ya ka ra/ ma d+hu ka re b+h+ya phaT/ sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ke b+h+yo bid+ya tsa re b+h+ya phaT/ tsa tu b+h+yo b+ha ga nI b+h+ya phaT/ sarba kau mA rI ye b+h+ya phaT/
