dpag tshad gcig tsam gyi tshad du byas na yang rung ste/ gsang sngags kyi mthu dang / sems rtse gcig du byas pa'i stobs kyis mchod rten de la yang spos kyi ngad ldang ste/ tsan dan dang / ga pur dang / gla rtsi dang / gur gum la sogs pa'i

dri bro 'am/ lha'i spos dri zhim po'i ngad ldang bar 'gyur ro/ /bdag dang gzhan mchod rten gyi las byed pa dang / bzlas brjod byed pa de bsam pa thams cad kyang yid bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po bsag par

'gyur te/ yon tan dang / legs pa phun sum tshogs pa yang 'thob par 'gyur tshe thung ba'i las shig yod na yang tshe nur zhing ring bar 'gyur/ nam 'chi ba'i dus byed pa na yang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu

bcu rtsa dgu'i zhal mthong zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rjes su dgong te/ skye gnas phyi mar sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar 'gyur zhing mngon sum du lung ston par 'gyur/ der yang tshe lo bye ba khrag

khrig brgya stong thus par 'gyur te/ sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang / lha'i mig dang / lha'i rna ba rnam par dag pa 'thob cing / pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang / 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba shes pa 'thob bo/ /lus las tsan dan gyi dri'i ngad 'byung

zhing kha nas ud pa la'i gsung ldang bar 'gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gyi lam thob nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa yang thob par 'gyur ro/ /yang dri'i byug pa yungs 'bru tsam yang rung ste/ gsang sngags bzlas

nas mchod rten la bskus na yang de dag gi yon tan dang / legs pa sngar bshad pa bzhin du thob par 'gyur ro/ /yang dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig gis bdag nyid gtsang bar

byas te/ gsang sngags gyi tshig 'di dag dkon pa dang / rin po cher 'du shes pas bzung na de de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra bar dad par bya ste/ gsang sngags rnams la gus pa bskyed nas yi ger bri bar bya ste/ gong du bshad

pa bzhin du gsang sngags dang phyag rgya cho ga bzhin du bris nas mchod rten gyi srog shing gi rtsa bar snying po bcug ste/ mchod rte byas na de dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po bsag par 'gyur to/ /yon tan dang legs pa thams cad

thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gsang sngags kyi phyag rgya'i cho ga 'di dag bshad pa'i tshe phyog bcu'i 'jig rten gyi kham na bzhug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su thugs rang par mdzad nas gsungs

pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas sems can mnyam par dgongs shing / thams cad chos kyi dbyings la bkod nas gsang sngags chen po'i phyag rgya'i cho ga'i byin gyi brlabs 'thob par bstan pa ni legs

so legs so/ /shin tu yang legs te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob cing phyir mi ldog par yang 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nyid na/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin

dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po 'dus pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang 'jig rten skyong ba'i mes po tshangs pa dang / khyab

'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / brgya byin dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / ku be ra dang / de dag la sogs pa rdzu 'phrul che ba'i lha de dag gi bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs pa de thos nas bdag cag rang rang gi spyod

yul la skyong shing yid byung bar gyur te/ mthar gyis yon tan chen po thob par 'dod pa'i phyir gcig la gcig bos te smras pa/ kye ma yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni shin tu yang rnyed par dka'o/ /de'i

bstan pa dam pa'i chos thos pa yang shin tu rnyed par dka'/ gsang sngags dang phyag rgya'i tshogs yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa thos pa yang shin du rnyed par dka' ste/ 'di ni shin du ngo mtshar to

zhes smras so/ /de nas de'i tshe bram ze ser skya'i zla ba zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das las de lta bu'i gsang sngags dang cho ga'i yon tan chen po de dag thos shing thob nas sems kyi sgrib pa'i rdul dang rnyog pa rnams dang bar gyur/ 'chi ba'i

'jigs pa dang / sdig pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang dag par gyur/ tshe yang phyir nur te ring bar gyur nas dga' mgu yid rangs te yid bde ba chen po thos par gyur to/ /de nas 'byung po'i tshogs thams cad kyang sems

dang zhing rjesu yi rang bar 'gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnams par sel bas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir 'khor der rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs

pa nor bu sna tshogs kyi spras pa zhig mngon par sprul nas/ chos la dga' ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la phul te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das

la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga shin du rnyed par dka' ba sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba rnams kyi mchog 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can sgrib

pa che ba rnams kyi don du bshad de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing tshe ring ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad las thar bar mdzad pa lags na/ de 'dir bdag cag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la gsol te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar yang dag pa'i ye shes chub par bgyid pa'i phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags gyi tshig bshad par 'tshal lo/ /na mo

b+ha ga ba te/ na ba na ba Ti nA~M/ sa~M myag sa~M bud+d+hA ko tan pu ta sha ta sa ha srA nAM/ na maHsarba Ni ba ra Na bi ska m+bi Ni bo d+ti sa twA ya/ oM tu ru tu ru ma ma sarba A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha Ni/ sarba ta thA ga ta A yur ba lA ni/

bi pu la ni ra mA le/ sarba sid+d+hi na ma skri twA/ ba ra ba ra/ sarba satwA a ba lo ki Ni/ oM sarba Ni bA ra Ni/ bi skam bi Ni/ ma ma sarba pA pa bi sho d+ha ni ku ru swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sangs sngags

'di ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus bshad pa lags te/ gang la la zhig gi ma yengs pa'i sems kyis rtse bcig tu byas te/ skad cig gcig bton na yang sdig pa tham cad byang bar 'gyur ro/ /yang gang la

la zhig gis gsang sngags 'di cho ga bzhin du dgu bcu rtsa dgu yi ger 'bris te mchod rten gyi nang du bcug na mchod rten de la/ la la zhig gis phyag byas sam/ tshig snyan pas bstod dam/ spos dang / me tog

dang / byug pa dang / mar me 'bul na rig kyi bu de de'i tshe 'di nyid la sdigs pa thams cad byang zhing las kyi sgrib pa thams cad bsal te/ bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du grub par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan

'das brgya stong grangs med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la mchod cing bsnyen bkur byas pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du mchod rten ring bsrel gyi snying po can brgya stong bye ba khrag khrig gang gA'i klung gi bye ma

snyed la mchod pa byas par 'gyuro/ /de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po sog par 'gyur ro/ /yang dge sbyong gang zhig gi tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang bcwa lnga gang yang rung ba la khrus dang gtsang sbra byas te/ gos gtsang ma

gyon la zhag gcig smyung ba 'am/ yang na zas dkar gsum zos te/ mchod rten la bskor zhing gsang sngags 'di lan brgya tsa rgyad bzlas brjod byas na bskal pa brgya stong du bsag pa'i las kyi sgrib pa thams

cad dang / mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yang yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur gzhan yang las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa tham cad rnam par sel ba bdag

nyid kyi lus mngon par bstan te/ bsam pa thams cad dngos grub tu sbyin par mdzad cing / yang dag par rdzog pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis zhal yang mthong bar 'gyuro/ /de bzhin du gang la la zhigis nyis brgya rtsa

brgyad bton na ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/ /gang gis sum brgya rtsa brgyad bton na sgrib pa thams cad byang te/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /yang gang gis bzhi brgya rtsa brgyad ston na rgyal chen

ris bzhi'i rgyal po chen po dag kyang nye bar 'ongs nas lus mngon par bstan te/ bsrung ba dang / skyabs par byed cing shes rab kyi stobs kyang bskyed nas bsod nam thams cad nye bar bsgrub bo/ /gang gis lnga brgya rtsa brgyad

bton na dge ba de nyid gyi 'dus ma byas kyi lam la gnas pa thob bo/ /yang gang gi drug brgya' rtsa brgyad bton na rig sngags 'chang du 'gyur te/ nam mkha' la rig 'dzin kyi gnasu 'gro bar 'gyuro/ /yang gang gis

bdun brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar bton na legs pa'i yon tan thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /yang gang gis brgyad brgya rtsa brgyad bton na gzhan gyis bsgo ba med pa'i rang dbang 'thob ste/ sems rnam par dag par

'gyur ro/ /yang gang gis dgu brgya rtsa brgyad du bton na phung po lnga rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /yang gang gis stong rtsa brgyad du bton na rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob bo/ /gang gi nyis stong tshang bar bton

na lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob bo/ /gang gis sum stong tshang bar bton na phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob bo/ /gang gi bzhi stong tshang bar ton na dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyuro/ /gang gis lnga stong tshang bar ton na rang sang+yas kyi sa 'thob par 'gyuro/ /gang gis

drug stong tshang bar bton na byang chub sems dpa'a'i rdzu 'phrul gyis gnas 'thob par 'gyuro/ /yang gang gis bdun stong tshang bar bton na byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po 'thob par 'gyuro/ /yang gang gis brgyad

stong tshang bar bton na byang chub sems dpa'i sa lnga pa gnon par 'gyuro/ /yang gang gis dgu stong tshang bar bston na rig sngags dang / gsang sngag rnams gyi bdag po gsang ba'i lus thob par 'gyuro/ /yang

gang gis khri tshang bar bton na byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa mi g.yo ba gnon par 'gyuro/ /yang gang gis nyi khri tshang bar bton na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku thob par 'gyur te/ se ge'i sgra

chen po sgrog par 'gyuro/ /yang gang la la zhig gis pha ma'i don gyi phyir bsod nams gyi las byang bar 'dod na/ mchod rten rnying pa ring bsrel can zhig ral du gyur pa gsol la bcos legs byas te/ g.yas phyogasu bskor ba

byas cing sngag lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang gis bar du bskor ba byas na bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa tham cad rnam par sel ba la

legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ legaso legs so/ /rigs kyis bu khyod gyi nga'i grog byas te/ de bzhin bshegs pa'i gsang sngags kyi cho ga tshul bzhin du bshad pa de kho na bzhin no/ /de nas gnod sbyin thams cad

kyi rgyal po gsang ba pa'i bdag pos bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags kyi rgyal po gsang sngags kyi cho ga 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang 'dra ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi

sku las byung ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das snying po dam pa 'di dag 'dzam bu gling na gnas pa'i sems can rnam kyi las kyi sgrib pa dang / sdig pa thams cad bsal nas de phyin chad bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan
pa la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi gsang ba'i bdag po la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po gsang sngags kyi cho ga 'di dag ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang

de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten na bzhugs pa dang 'dra ba yin no/ /ngas cho ga ji skad bstan pa bzhin du byas na las kyi sbyor ba chung ngus kyang 'bras bu chen po 'grub cing phan yon che bar gnas par 'gyur na/

las kyi sbyor ba cher byas pa lta ci smos te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bsags par 'gyur ro/ /de lta bas na de dag gi yon tan ni de bzhin gshegs pa brgya stong bye ba khrag khrig gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bshad kyang

mi rdzogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mkhyen cing gzig par zad do/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das las tshegs chung ngu ji lta bu zhig bgyi na bsod nams kyi 'bras bu chen po 'grub cing

bsod nams chen po thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir legs pa nyon cig dang bshad par bya'o/ /dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig gi

bsod nams gyi 'bras bu chen po thob cing yon tan thob par 'dod pa gsang sngag kyi rgyal po'i cho ga sngar bstan pa bzhin du byed te/ dgu bcu rtsa dgu yi ger bris la sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten gyi mdun du

dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas la ba'i lci bas byugs te/ grwa bzhir dri'i chu phor bu bkang ba re re gzhag /bdug spos kyi snod du ba 'thul ba yang bzhag nas snod chen po'i nang du me tog dang / dri'i chu dang /

'bras skam po rnams blugs te/ dkyil 'khor kyi steng du gzhag pa dang / yang til nag po dang / sran ma ma sha dang / 'bras rnams bsres te btsos pa'i 'bras thug kri sar zhes bya ba dang / zas dkar gsum dang /

'di rnams bum pa'i nang du blugs pa dang / yang shing tog sna tshog 'bras bu dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang / kha zas ming gis smos pa 'di rnams dang / spos dang / me tog la sogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bkram la/ gsang

sngags kyi yi ge mchod rten gyi srog shing gi nang du bcug nas mchod rten gyi phyogs bzhir phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd mngon du dmigs te phyag byas la sems rtse gcig pas gsang sngags 'di dag

gdon par bya'o/ /'di lta ste/ oM bi pu la bi ma le/ pra ba re dzi na ba re/ sa ra sa ra/ sarba ta thA ga ta d+hA tu gar b+he/ a d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA/ a ya ta to ba Ni swA hA/ sarba de ba Ni ba ha ya bi bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Tha Na sa ma ye swA hA/ bdug spos 'thul ba rgyun mi

'chad par bya zhing / gsang sngags lan nyi shu rtsa brgyad bton na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgyad dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po brgyad dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang tshangs pa

dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / sred med kyi bu rnams de'i mod la mchod rten de la mchod pa dang / rim gro byed de srog shing brtan par byed do/ /de bas gong du yang sangs rgyas bye ba 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang / gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang

gnas der gshegs te/ mchod rten de la mchod pa dang / chos kyi skur byin gyis rlob cing ring bsrel dang ldan par mdzad do/ /de ltar sems thag pa nas cho ga tshul bzhin du byas na yon tan de dag dang / gzhan yang mchod rten de yid

bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che las byas pa'i bsod naMs thob par 'gyur te/ rin po che'i rnaM pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma las mchod rten byas pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po dang ldan zhing lus rnam par dag la tshe ring

zhing nad med pa dang / bgegs thaMd kyis mi tshugs par 'gyuro/ /gang gzhan la la zhig mchod rten 'di mthong ngam/ mchod rten de'i dril bu'i sgra thos na yang las kyi sgrib pa dang / sdig pa thaMd byang bar 'gyur te/ mtshams med pa

lnga byas pa yang yongasu byang nas 'chi ba'i dus byas pa'i 'og tu bde ba can gyi 'jig rten du skye'o/ /gang la la zhig gi mchod rten de'i ming tsam thos pa yang 'chi ba'i dus byas nas bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam 'thob par 'gyur/

tha na bya dang / ri dgas la sogs pa sems can gang gis mthong ba de yang tshe 'phos nas dud 'gro'i skye gnas spangs te/ bsod nams dang ldan pa'i lus thob par 'gyuro/ /gang la la zhig gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu

rdzogs par spyod par 'dod pa des snga ma bzhin du dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas te/ sa dang lci bas byugs la de'i steng du spos kyi brkyang nul gyis byugs te/ dkyil 'khor gyi grwa bzhir dri'i chus bkang ba'i snod re re gzhag la/

sngar bstan pa'i gsang sngags bzhi po dag las rnam pa gcig kyang dgu bcu rtsa dgu bris te/ rang gi lag gis mchod rten chung ngu dgu bcu rtsa dgu gdab cing gsang sngags rnams cig kyang re re de'i nang du gzhug go/ de nas yang

gsang sngags 'di dgu bcu rtsa dgu yi ger bris te/ mchod rten gyi 'phang lo rnams kyi nang du bcug la/ mchod rten rnams dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag ste/ me tog dang / byugs pas mchod la/ lan bdun bdun du bskor

zhing gsang sngags 'di yang gdon par bya'o/ /na maHna ba na bA Ti nA~M/ ta thA ga ta ga~M gA NA na~M/ Di bA lu kA~M/ ko Ti Na yu ta sha ta sa hA srA NA~M/ oM bo bo ri/ tsa ri Ni tsa ri/ mo ri go ri tsa la bA ri swA hA/ cho ga 'di ltar byas na pha rol tu phyin

pa drug yongasu rdzogs par spyad par yang ma zad de/ des ni rin po che'i mchod rten bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed byas par 'gyuro/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu

rtsa dgu snyed la mchod cing bsnyen bkur byas par 'gyuro/ /de'i gong du yang lha thams cad kyis mchod pa'i sprin sna tshogs bsdus te/ mchod rten de la yo byad sna tshogs sbyar nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang dang /

yo byad sna tshogs sbyar nas mchod par 'gyur te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag snyed kyis mkhyen cing gzigs te byin gyis rlob par mdzad do/ /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po'i
bsod nams dang / yon tan thams cad thob par mdzad do/ /yang gang la la zhig gis gsang bsngags kyi rgyal po 'di snying po ma nor bar yi ger bris la rtag tu bton te/ mchod pa'i las byas la lus

la thogs na rigs pa de nyid kyis bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa mdzad de/ phas kyi rgol ba'i dgra thaMd dang / shar gnyer ba rnams dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dgas la sogs pa thaMd kyang gnod pa byed par

mi 'gyur te/ 'jigs shing skrag nas so sor 'byer bar 'gyuro/ /gang la la zhig gis rigs pa 'don pa de dang gtam byas pa yang mtshams med pa lnga'i las kyi sgrib pa yang yongasu 'byang bar 'gyuro/ /gang la la

zhig gis sngags pa de'i sgra thos sam/ grib mas phog gam/ lus la reg kyang rung ste/ de'i tshe rabs gzhan gyi las kyi sgrib pa dang / sdig pa thaMd yongasu byang bar 'gyuro/ /gang rig pa 'don pa de'i lus
la dug gis mi tshugs/ mes mi tshugs/ chus khyer bar mi 'gyur/ gdon thaMd kyis kyang glags mi rnyed/ thog 'bab par mi 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas thaMd kyis bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa mdzad cing spyan ras

kyis 'tsho bar mdzad do/ /lha thaMd dang / dam tshig can thaMd kyis kyang de la stong grogs byed par 'gyur te/ gzhan gyi rig sngags dang / byad dang / sbyor ba thaMd kyis mi tshugs par 'gyuro/ /de lta bas na

rig pa 'don pa gnas gang na 'dug kyang gsang sngags 'di'i cho ga don du gnyer bar bya ste/ gsang sngags yi ger bris la lam gyi bzhi mdo 'am/ sum mdo skye bo mang po phan tshun 'gro ba'i gnasu mchod rten

byas la/ de'i nang du bcug na 'gro ba thaMd dang / bya dang / sbrang ma dang / tha na grog sbur yan chad kyis mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / reg pa dang / de la phog pa'i sa dang / rdul dang / rlung dang / grib mas phog na ya~M byol

song dang / yi dgas dang / ngan sems log par ltung ba sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ba'i sdig pa thams cad dang bral zhing / 'chi ba'i dus byas nas bde 'gro mtho ris lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/

sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa yongasu byang bas tshe rabs rjesu dran pa thob par 'gyur zhing phyir mi ltung ba'i chos can du 'gyuro/ /de nas bac+doMs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par

sel ba dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha rnams la bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu

dam pa dag ngas gsang sngags kyi rgyal po'i snying po'i 'di dag khyed rnams la yongasu gtad kyis rtag tu rim gror bya zhing yongasu bzung bar bya ste/ rin po che'i za ma tog gi nang du chug la gnas thaMd du bsgrags te/ nam du

yang rgyun ma bcad par sems can la ston cig /mthong zhing thos par byas na mtshams med pa lnga'i sdig pa yang 'byang bar 'gyuro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thaMd rnam par sel ba

dang / gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dag dang / tshangs pa dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / sred med kyi bu dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha ma yin dang / lto
'phye chen po la sogs pa thaMd kyis bac+doMs kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas tshig 'thun par smras te/ gsol pa bac+doMs bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te gsang sngags 'di'i cho

ga dang / mchod rten bgyi ba'i cho ga ji skad gsungs pa rnams sems can thaMd la sman pa'i slad du bdag cag kun gyis bsrung zhing rim gror bgyi/ rtag par gzungs su gzungs zhing mi bskyud par bgyi/ yi ger bri ba dang /

bklag pa dang / mchod pa'i las rnams kyang bgyi ste/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems can gang la las chos kyi rnams grangs 'di thos shing khong du chud nas ngan song ngan 'gro sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa dang /

sdig pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur bar bac+doMs kyis gsungs pas na/ bdag cag rnaMs kyis bac+doMs kyi bka' drin spyi bos blangs pa'i slad du gsang sngags kyi cho ga 'di dag rim gror bgyi/ btsun par bgyi gus par

bgyi/ rin po che'i 'du shes bzhag par bgyi/ rgya cher 'phel bar bgyi/ bac+doMs kyi zhal dang 'dra bar lta bar bgyi/ nam du yang nub par mi 'gyur zhing ci nas kyang rgyas par bgyi ba'i slad du nan tan bgyi bar 'tshalo/ /

de skad ces gsol pa dang / bac+doMs kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu dam pa rnams dam tshig la gnas pas gsang sngags kyi cho ga 'di dag bsrung ba dang / rim gror bya ba dang / yongasu gzungs bar khas blangs pa ni
legaso legs so/ /shin du yang legaso/ /bac+doMs kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag yi rangs te/ bac+doMs kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags

pa 'od zer dri ma med pa rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+ya ka ra si~M ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de dpal gyi lhun po'i sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan

la phab pa'o/ /jo bo a ti sha dang dge bshes 'brom ston pas sngags rnams dag par bsgyur ro/ / @#/ / rgya gar skad du/ sarba pradz+nyAn+ta pA ra mi ta sid+d+h+ya tsai t+ya nA ma d+d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ shes pas thams cad mthar phyin par

grub pa'i mchod rten zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bac+doMs rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sang+yas chos rgyas
thams cad kyi tshul dang / 'dul ba dang / rnam par 'phrul ba'i gzi brjid kyis rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag 'tshal dus gsum sangs rgyas la/ /phyag 'tshal dkon mchog gsum dge la/ /mi 'khrugs pa

dang 'od dpag med/ /spyan ras gzigs la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /rigs gsum la yang phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bac+doMs rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po ri rab chen po sna lnga las grub

pa/ gzhi nyid mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du gnas pa'i steng na/ rin po che sna tshogs pa'i khang pa dang / tshad med pa'i mchod rten bzhi dang / rang bzhin gyi mchod rten chen po'i gnas yin pa'i phyir rtse mo'i dbyings kyang

mchod rten du gyur pa'i gnas na lag na rdo rje dang / 'jam dpal dang / spyan ras gzigs dang / byams pa la sogs pa sa bcu'i byang chub seMs dpa' rnams dang / tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi

la sogs pa ca gtsang ris kyi mgon po rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugaso/ /de nas bac+doMs kyis dbu'i gtsug tor dang / thugs ka'i dpal gyi bi'u la sogs pa rnams nas 'od zer kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs pa bye

ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug bcu snyed cig bkye ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa bsam gyis mi khyab cing mi lang ba thams cad 'od zer gyi snang ba chen pos til gyi gang bu bzhin du

gang zhing khyab par mdzad pas mtha' yas pa'i sems can thaMd long ba rnams kyis gzugs mthong ba dang / 'on pa rnams kyis sgra thos pa dang / dig pa rnams kyis smra shes pa dang / theng po rnams dang / zha bo rnams

'gro zhing yan lag rangs pa dang / nad pa rnams nad dang bral ba dang / dmyal ba rnams tshe phri nas rims kyis sdug bsngal las thar ba dang / gzhan yang 'gro ba sems can rnams rim gyis dran pa rnyed par byas nas/
namakha'i khams thams cad yid kyi mchod rten chos kyi skus gang zhing rgyas par byas te/ 'od zer de dag slar bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu 'dus pa las chos kyi sku'i gzugs

brnyan du gyur to/ /de nas lag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams ngo mtshar du gyur nas bac+doMs la bla bre dang / rgyal mtshan dang / 'phan dang / gdugs dang / rnga yab dang / dril bu dang / dar dpyangs dang / spos

dang / me tog dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / mar me dang / bshos dang / rol mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis mchod nas bac+doMs la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bac+doMs 'gro ba'i mgon po thugs rje chen

po dang ldan pas mchod rten byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga rigs pa chen mo bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs bshad du gsol/ /bac+doMs kyis bka' stsal pa/ mchod rten byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga rig pa chen mo bi ma la
uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs 'di ni rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ bris sam/ klog gam/ ming nyan par byed na/ de mtshams med pa lnga dang / mi dge ba bcu dang /

sdig pa'i las ci byas pa thaMd ma lus par byang bar 'gyuro/ /bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i rig pa chen mo mchod rten byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga 'di'o/ /oM s+t+rai yad+d+h+wa sarba ta thA ga tA hr-i da ya gar+b+he/ dz+wa la d+harma d+hA tu gar+b+he/ sa~M ha ra Na

A yu s+sa~M sho d+ha ya/ pA pa~M sarba ta thA ga tA sa man+ta uSh+NI Sha bi ma le bi shud+he swA hA/ rig pa chen mo 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mchod rten gyi rang bzhin tu 'gyuro/ /rig pa chen mo 'di gro ga 'am/ ras saM

shing shun la bris te rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags na/ lha dang mi la sogs pa thams cad kyis mchod cing phyag bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba'i 'osu 'gyur ba dang / rig pa chen mo 'di lus sam mgul du thogs na/ de lha dang / mi dang /

mi ma yin pa la sogs pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas nyid du blta bar 'gyur ro/ /bdag nyid ri brag gam/ tshal lam/ dgon pa 'am/ sa phyogs gang du 'gro ba'i tshe rig pa chen mo 'di brjod na ri dang sa phyogs thams cad mchod

rten dang 'bra bar 'gyuro/ /\u0f00 s+t+rai yad+d+h+we sarba ta thA ga tA hr-i da ya gar+b+he/ dz+wa la d+harma d+hArna tu gar+b+he/ sa~M ha ra Na A yu sa~M sho d+ha ya/ pA pa~M sarba ta thA ga tA sa man+ta ta uSh+NI Sha bi ma la bi shud+he ma hA bi ra dze ra gam+b+ha ra si/ d+harma d+hA tu gar+b+he/ bi bi sa ra

a a la~M swA hA zhes brjod na/ sa gzhi thams cad kyang mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du 'gyuro/ /bdag nyid chu 'am/ chu bo 'am/ mtsho 'am/ rgya mtsho la sogs pa gang la rgal ba na yang rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'dis

btab na chu de thams cad kyang mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du 'gyuro/ /\u0f00 s+t+rai yad+d+h+we sarba ta thA ga tA hr-i da ya gar+b+he/ dz+wa la d+harma d+hA du gar+b+he/ sa~M ha ra na A yu sa~M sho d+ha ya/ pA pa~M sarba ta thA ga tA sa man+ta/ bi ma la uSh+NI Sha bi shud+he/ ma hA bi ra

dze ra gam+b+hi ra si d+harma d+hA tu bi bi sa ra a ma ma ki swA hA/ zhes brjod na/ chu thams cad kyang mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du 'gyuro/ /gzhan yang bdag nyid kyis namakha' gang nas gang khyab par rig pa chen mo'i sngags

'di btab na/ namakha' thams cad kyang mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du 'gyuro/ /\u0f00 s+t+rai yad+d+h+we sarba ta thA ga tA hr-i da ya gar+b+he/ dz+wa la d+harma d+hA du gar+b+he/ sa~M ha ra Na A yu sa~M sho d+ha ya/ pA pa~M sarba ta thA ga tA sa man+ta/ bi ma la u

Sh+NI Sha bi shu d+hai/ ma hA bi ra dze ra gam+b+hi ra si d+harma d+hA du bi bi sa ra a a e kha~M ya swA hA zhes brjod na/ namakha'i khams thams cad mchod rten gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur te/ phyag bya ba dang / bskor ba bya ba dang / mchod pa

bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro/ /bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs 'di bzlas te/ 'byung ba chen po lnga po gang la yang mchod rten btab na nyon mongs pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad dag par 'gyuro/ /gzhan yang sa dang / shing dang / rdo dang /

'jim pa dang / 'bi 'bi gang yang rung ba'i sngags 'dis btab ste/ mchod rten btab na rin po che sna tshogs kyis mchod rten gyi rgyur 'gyur te/ oM rat+na tse t+ye pany+tsa ye bi bi sa ra swA hA/ zhes brjod nas ba'i lci

ba la sogs pas byugs na thaMd rin po che'i mchod rten gyi rgyur 'gyuro/ /rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di ma btab na/ gang zhig gser dang / dngul dang / bai dU r+ya la sogs pa rin po che sna bdun las mchod rten bzhengasu

gsol yang rdo dang / shing dang / kham pa dang 'dra bar 'gyuro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di nyid rdzas kyi rang bzhin las snying po dang gsang sngags byin gyis rlab pa ma bzhugs pa'i phyir ro/ /rig pa chen mo 'dis

byin gyis brlabs te btab na/ 'byung ba chen po gang la mchod rten btab kyang bskal pa dpag tu med pa thaMd kyi sgrib pa'i dri ma dag nas/ khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bur skyes nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob

par 'gyuro/ /rig pa chen po 'dis byin gyis brlabs te/ rdo dang / shing leb la sogs pa la mchod rten btab na/ de gdon mi za bar bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bur skyes nas sa bcu rim gyis bgrod
de/ bcu gcig kun tu 'od kyi sa thob par 'gyuro/ /rig pa chen mo 'dis byin gyis brlabs te/ gser dang / dngul dang / bai dU r+ya la sogs pa la mchod rten btab na/ de gdon mi za bar rgyal rigs shing sa
la chen po lta bur skyes nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa thob par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'dis btab na mchod rten gcig btab na yang bye ba btab par 'gyuro/ /rig pa chen mo 'dis ma

btab na bye ba btab kyang gcig dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gong ma bzhin no/ /rig pa chen mo de'i sngags ni 'di yin te/ tad+ya thA/ sUk+Sh+me/ sUk+Sh+me/ shAn+te shAn+te/ nair ku le/ ya sho te dzo/

sarba bud+ha/ a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Thi te/ a nu mi de swA hA/ 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ 'jim pa'i gong bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te/ mchod rten gcig btab na bye ba btab par 'gyur ro/ /

brgya btab pa'i grangs dang phan yon ni 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dgra bcom pa rnams kyis kyang brjod par mi nus so/ /stong btab pa'i grangs dang phan yon ni byang chub seMs dpa' rnams kyis kyang brjod par mi nus so/ /
khri btab pa'i grangs dang phan yon ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang brjod par mi nus so/ /'bum btab pa'i grangs dang phan yon ni phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang
brjod par mi nus so/ /de bas na mchod pa'i rten lnga man chad gdab pa'i mchod pa'i cho gar bya ba ni thog mar mchod rten brtsig pa'i gnas sam/ mchod rten gyi 'jim pa'i gnas sam/ mchod rten
gyi 'jim pa'i gnas gang nas blangs pa'i gnas der sa bdag byin gyis brlab cing sa la gnas pa'i gdon bgegs bsam sbyor ngan pa mchod rten dang / dge ba la bar chad byed pa rnams mtshams
bcad par bya ste/ thig skud la rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'dis gdab ste/ \u0f00 badzra su tra hU~M phaT/ ces brjod nas thig skud de nyid rdo rje'i skud par dmigs nas mchod rten gyi sa khyon ji tsam

ran pa dang 'jim pa'i sa khyon ji tsam ran pa thig gis sa bcad/ de bzhin du sa bcad na sa gzhi de nyid mchod rten gyi rgyu rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang 'dra bar 'gyuro/ /de nas sa de nyid la seng ldeng gi phur pa sor brgyad pa la rig

pa chen mo'i sngags 'di gdab par bya ste/ \u0f00 badzra kI li kI li kI la ya sarba duSh+Tan hU~M phaT/ ces bya ba 'di lan bdun bzlas te/ rdo rje phur bur dmigs te dbus dang grwa bzhir gdab bo/ /de bzhin du btab na mi dang mi ma yin pa las bsrung

bar 'gyur ro/ /sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogs so/ /seng ldeng gi phur bu ni mchod rten gyi 'jim pa'i sa ji tsam dgos pa ma blangs kyi bar du mi 'byung bar gzhag go/ de nas til dang yungs kar

la rig pa chen mo'-i sngags 'di brjod par bya ste/ \u0f00 a mr-i te ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ ces lan bdun bzlas te/ sa'i phyogs su gtor bas/ sa'i phyogs de nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzhugs gnas dpag tu med

par 'gyur/ de ltar sa gzhi de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzhugs gnas su byin gyis brlabs te/ bgegs kyi bsam sbyor ngan pa las mtshams bcad de/ spos dang / me tog dang / gtor ma la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang sa phyogs

de na gnas pa'i lha dang / klu dang / lha ma yin la sogs pa rnams la mchod cing bsngos te/ bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs 'di bklags na/ sa phyogs de yang shin du bkra shis shing byin chags par 'gyur ro/ /de nas mchod rten gyi

'jim pa'i sa bsko ba'i tshe rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di bzlas te brko bar bya'o/ /\u0f00 badzra kha na kha na hU~M phaT/ ces bzlas shing sa gzhi de nyid rin po che sna lngar gyur par dmigs te bskos na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnam par

dag pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro/ /de nas sa gtsang ma blangs pa de dag gnas gtsang ma gcig tu bzhag nas sa brdung ba'i cho ga ni thob la bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i phyag rgya rdo rje rtse gsum pas mnan te/ rig pa chen mo'i sngags

'dis btab ste/ brdung ngo / /badzra mung+ga ra A ko Ta ya A ko Ta ya hU~M phaT/ ces lan bdun bzlas te/ rdo rje'i tho bar dmigs shing brdungs na nyon mongs pa dang / bag chags thams cad ma lus par byang zhing bcom par

'gyur ro/ /de nas 'jim pa rdzi ba ni spos chab la bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i phyag rgyas gtugs te/ spos chu de'i nang du yang chos nyid kyi yi ge a zhes bya ba dkar po las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od dang bcas par dmigs te

zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od zer chen po des spos chu de khyab par gyur nas/ spos chu nyid bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin du gyur par dmigs nas rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ /oM a mr-i te hU~M phaT/ ces bya ba lan bdun

bzlas te byin gyis brlabs pas/ de nyid kyang bdud rtsi chen po'i chu rgyun dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'jim pa rdzi ba'i sngags chen mo 'di brjod par bya'o/ /oM badzra pra marta na ya hU~M phaT/ ces lan bdun brjod de/

'jim pa de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'jim pa de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab par byin gyis brlab pa ni 'jim pa de nyid la bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i phyag rgya bcings te/ rig

pa chen mo'i gzungs 'di brjod par bya'o/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ tad+ya thA/ sU k+Sh+me sU k+Sh+me/ shAn+te shAn+te/ dan+te dan+te/ ni rA ku le/ ya she ya she/ ba ti te dzo shud+he bi shud+he/ sarba ta thA ga tA a d+hiSh+Tha na/ a d+hiSh+Thi te/ A na maHte hi te
swA hA/ zhes bdag nyid kyis rig pa chen mo 'di lan bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'dis byin gyis brlabs na 'jim pa nyid las ye shes kyi 'od zer sna lnga phyogs bcur

'phros par 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bcur 'phros nas kyang sems can thams cad kyi don ji ltar 'dul bar byas par 'gyur ro/ /'od zer de dag slar 'dus pas kyang 'jim pa nyid rin po che sna lnga'i rang bzhin du gyur nas/

de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyu rkyen dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar yid kyi kyang dmigs so/ /de nas 'bi 'bi byed pa'i tshe rig pa chen mo 'di brjod par bya ste/ \u0f00 badzra a yu She swA hA/ zhes lan bdun

bzlas te byin gyis brlabs na/ 'bi 'bi nyid las ye shes kyi 'od zer gyi sprin gyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas par 'khros shing khyab ste/ 'gro ba mang po'i don byed par 'gyur ro/ /'od zer gyi sprin phung

de dag slar 'bi 'bi'i nang du 'dus pas kyang de nyid ye shes rin po che'i rang bzhin shel sgong ltar yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so/ /de nas 'bi 'bi'i nang du bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i

snying po mu phyag rgyar byas pa 'am/ gro ga 'am/ ras sam/ shog shog gam/ shing shun la sngags bris pa dang / de'i nang du rigs lnga so so'-i snying po/ /oM hU~M trA~M hrIHAH/ de rnams phrugs su sbyar te/ mu dra'i phyag rgyar byas

pa 'am/ yi ger bris pa 'am gang yang rung ste nang du stsal na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs ye shes dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /nang du stsal ba'i tshe rig pa'i sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ /oM badzra gar+b+he swA hA/ zhes bya ba

bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ye shes de'i nang du 'dus shing zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /yid kyis kyang dmigs so/ /de nas tsai t+ye'i phor bu'i nang du yungs kar ram/ til mar gyis bsku ba'i sngags rig

pa chen mo 'di brjod par bya'o/ /\u0f00 a ra dze bi ra dze swA hA/ zhes lan gsum bzlas shing byin gyis brlabs na de nyid thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa las chos kyi dbyings nyid kyi mchod rten du 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du

yid kyis kyang dmigs so/ /de nas mchod rten 'debs pa'i tshe rig pa chen mo 'di brjod par bya'o/ /oM badzra mung+ga ra A ko Ta ya a ko Ta ya hU~M phaT/ ces bzlas shing mchod rten btab na dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med

par 'brel pa las chos kyi sku'i mchod rten du 'gyur ro/ /de nas bi ma la uSh+Ni Sha'i snying po gang nas byung bas kyang mchod rten btab na dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med par 'brel pa las chos kyi sku'i mchod rten 'byam klas par

'gyur ro/ /de nas mchod rten phor bu'i nang nas 'byung ba'i rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod la byung ngo / /\u0f00 d+harma d+hA hu ye swA hA/ d+harma d+hA tu gar+b+he swA hA/ zhes lan bdun bzlas te mchod rten phyung na thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med

par 'brel pa las mchod rten chos kyi sku 'byam klas pa 'byung ste/ 'gro ba sems can thams cad kyi don 'khor ba ma stongs kyi bar du phun sum tshogs par mdzad par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so/ /de nas

mchod rten snod nas phyung ba la 'khor lo gzugs pa'i rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ /\u0f00 pra ma na ye swA hA/ zhes bzlas nas 'khor lo btsugs na rin po che'i gdugs dang / rin po che'i tog dang / rin po che'i

rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che'i shar bu dang / dar gyi lhab lhub la sogs pa rnams kyis brgyan te/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan sna tshogs kyis brgyan te/ 'gro ba'i don yid bzhin du mdzad par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du yid kyis

kyang dmigs so/ /de nas mchod rten na bza' gsol ba'i tshe rig pa chen mo 'di bzlas la gsol to/ /oM d+harma d+hA tu swA b+hA ba bi shud+he d+harma te swA hA/ zhes lan mang du bzlas te btab na chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i don dang ldan

par 'gyur ro/ /de nas mchod rten btab pa'i dkyil 'khor mchod rten lngar btab na dkyil 'khor yang phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar bri bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du mchod rten gyi grangs brgya 'am/ stong ngam gang btab pa de'i grangs dang mchod rten

gyi shong tshad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi re'u mig rdo'i stegs bu brtsigs pa ni sa 'am/ rdo 'am/ shing la sogs pa la dkyil 'khor gru bzhir bgyis te/ 'og gi khri yang seng ge'i khri 'am/ rin po che'i khri 'am/ pad ma'i khri stengs su byas la

de'i steng du go ma yang dang / spos chus chag chag btab ste/ dbus dang phyogs bzhir mchod rten bzhugs pa'i sa kun du gur kum dang / tsan dan gyi chus zlum por bskus la/ srad bus thig btab la dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ste/

dkyil 'khor bri ba yang mchod rten lngar btab na dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar bri bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du mchod rten gyi grangs brgya 'am/ stong gang btab pa de'i grangs kyi mchod rten gyi shong tshad kyi dkyil 'khor re'u

mig rdo rje dra ba'i thig gis sa bcad par bya'o/ /mchod rten gzhag pa'i sa gzhi thams cad pad ma 'dab ma brgyad par bri bar bya'o/ /de nas mchod rten gyi dkyil 'khor du bzhugs pa'i tshe rig pa chen po'i sngags 'di

brjod la bzhugs su gsol lo/ /oM su pra tiSh+Tha stu be swA hA/ zhes lan gsum bzlas te mchod rten bzhag na bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs par spyod par 'gyur ro/ /de nas mchod rten dgod pa'i rim pa ni dang

po dbus su dgod/ de nas shar du dgod/ de nas lhor dgod/ de nas nub tu dgod/ de nas byang gi bar du rim pa bzhin du dgod par bya'o/ /dgod pa'i tshe rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ /\u0f00 badzra pad+ma sa ma

ye swA swA/ zhes lan gsum bzlas la rdo rje dang pad ma'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol/ zhes byas la sa gzhi dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rgya mtsho'i 'jings thams cad mchod rten gyis gang bar yid kyis kyang
dmigs so/ /gzhan yang mchod rten re re btab nas thal byung dkyil 'khor steng du bzhugs la/ spos dang / me tog la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod cing bzhugs su gsol/ mchod rten gyi kha dog
la sogs pa bsku ba ni zhi ba'i dkar po/ rgyas pa'i ser po/ dbang gi dmar po/ bsrung ba'i ljang gur dmigs te/ na bza' yang de de bzhin du gsol la yid kyis kyang de bzhin du dmigs so/ /de nas mchod

rten gyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge ra dmar po gnas pa las rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod par bya ste/ hU~M ra~M swA hA/ zhes lan gsum bzlas pas de nyid ye shes kyi

me dpung chen por rab tu 'bar nas gnas de dag gi rtog pa rnam par sbyangs te/ dkyil 'khor gyi gzhi de nyid rin po che sna lnga las grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du yid kyi kyang dmigs so/ /de nas dkyil

'khor le'u tshe lnga 'am/ brgya 'am/ stong ngam/ gang bris pa'i dbus rnams su yi ge a dkar po gnas pa las rig pa chen po'i sngags 'di brjod par bya ste/ oM a tsan+d+ra maN+Da la hU~M phaT/ ces grangs ji tsam ran

par bzlas na mchod rten gyi gdan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor re rer 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so/ /de nas mchod rten gyi cho ga mdzad pa'i tshe kha shar nub gang bder bltas la/ bdag nyid rdo rje

'dzin pa'i sku phyag rgya chen por ting nge 'dzin gyis bsgyur te/ snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rdo rje rtse lnga pa ye shes kyi 'od dpung 'phro ba gnas par byas la/ sku dang ba spu'i gseb thams cad nas kyang
ye shes kyi 'od zer dang / sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i sprin phung bzhin du mthar 'byam klas par 'phros shing sems can gyi khams thams cad du byin gyis brlabs shing don mdzad nas slar

sku'i nang du thim par 'gyur te de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so/ /de nas mchod rten gyi gzhal yas khang bskyed pa ni mchod rten dkyil 'khor du bzhag pa la rdo rje dbyings ma'i phyag rgya bcings nas

mchod rten gyi steng du reg par byas la/ rig pa chen mo'i sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ /\u0f00 badzra d+hA tu a d+hi tiSh+Tha hU~M/ zhes bzlas te byin gyis brlabs pas rin po che sna tshogs kyi gzhal med khang gi nang na

rin po che'i sa gzhi dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gyi steng na zla ba'i gdan gyi dbus na mchod rten bzhugs par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so/ /de ltar du mchod rten re re btab ste/ bzhag nas/

de la mchod pa'i rnam pas mchod nas ni seng ge'i rgyal mtshan dang / 'bras chan dang / spyan gzigs sna tshogs dang 'dra zhing dgod pa dang / bla re dang / 'phan dang / phreng ba dang / bdug pa dang / mar me dang / spos dang / mchod pa'i rnam pa rnaMs rnaM par dag

par sbyang ba'i rig pa chen mo 'di brjod par bya'o/ /\u0f00 sarba pU dza puSh+pe swA hA/ zhes bzlas te byin gyis brlabs pas kun du bzang po'i mchod pa'i sprin phung phun sum tshogs pas rnam par 'khrigs shing char gyi

rgyun bzhin du 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du yid kyis kyang dmigs so/ /mchod rten mchod pa rnam pa lnga po cha re res mchod cing / yon du dar ru chung dang / 'phan la sogs pa'i bla re dang / gdugs bu chung yang rung

ste re re dbul lo/ /de ltar cho ga bzhin du btab pa lags na dgongs pa rgyud kyi ting nge 'dzin gsal bar bya ba ni mchod rten gyis phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar rig lnga'i sangs rgyas sku mdog dang / rgyan dang / cha lugs dang / 'khor

phun sum tshogs pa tshul bzhin du dgongs te dmigs par bya'o/ /ye shes lnga las grub pa'i mchod rten de yang rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag cing gsal ba de dag gi bum pa'i dbus su bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs kyi snyi po dang /

rigs so so'i snying po 'bru re kha dog gser btso ma bzhin du dngas zhing 'tsher ba gcig tu dmigs la/ de dag las ye shes kyi 'od zer sna tshogs 'byam klas par rigs lnga phyogs bcur 'phros pa las de bzhin gshegs

pa'i sku'i sprin gyis nam mkha'i mthas klas shing chos kyi dbyings kyi mur thug par brgyan cing grub par gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad byin gyis brlabs te/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi don 'di mdzad

cing re ba bskangs nas slar 'dus te/ de nyid kyi dbu'i gtsug dang / thugs kar phog /phrin las kyi sgrib pa la sogs pa rnam par dag ste/ sku dang gsung dang / thugs rdo rje nyid du gyur par dmigs la/ dung phor gyi nang du

spos chab dang / dri sna tshogs sbyar ba'i argas gsol to/ /arga'i phyag rgya bcings la de'i steng du dung phor bzhag la spos chu'i nang du a dkar po las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa'i 'od zer gyis spos chu nyid ye shes

kyi bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin du gyur par dgongs shing dmigs te/ mchod pa 'bul ba'i rig pa chen po 'di brjod par bya'o/ /\u0f00 a mr-i te arga~M pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ zhes bzlas nas dbu'i spyi bor lan gsum du bdugs shing sbrengs te phul bas

'phags pa thams cad mnyes par 'gyur ro/ /tshig tu yang 'phags pa thams cad mnyes par gyur cig ces kyang brjod do/ /de nas phyag rgya'i rgya mtsho'i sprin gyis dbu'i gtsug tu bkram ste ye shes kyi sku'i nang du 'dus shing phun

sum tshogs pa'i dbang thams cad bskur bar dmigaso/ /de nas bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs 'di bklag cing lan ci mang du brjod par byas nas bsngo ba dang smon lam rgyas par gdab par bya'o/ /cho ga 'di bzhin du rdzogs par bya ba mi

bde na rang gi lha nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis skur bsgyur ba las dgongs pa ma nyams par bya ste/ mchod rten dang / mchod pa'i yo byad la sogs pa thams cad rang bzhin gyis chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag par dgongs te/ mchod

rten btab na yang cho ga rgyas par bya ba dang 'dra ste 'gal ba med do/ /de bzhin du ma gyur na yang bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs 'di klog pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / yi ger 'dri zhing 'chang bas mchod rten btab na cho ga rgyas par mdzad

pa nyid 'di yin te/ mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur bsgyur nas bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs par byed par 'gyur ro/ /bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs 'di ma brjod na mchod rten la mchod pa phul zhing mnga'

gsol yang mnga' phul bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gzhung las kyang 'di skad ces 'byung ngo / /rig sngags gsang sngags thams cad kyi/ /sngags kyi rang bzhin mi gsal zhing / /dgongs pa'i ting 'dzin mi gsal bas/ /mchod rten la sogs sku gzugs

rnams/ /btab kyang rdzogs par yong mi 'gyur/ /zhes 'byung ngo / /gang zhig gsang sngags dang dgongs par ldan pas mchod rten dang sku gzugs btab pa'i yon tan ni ji skad du/ mchod rten cho ga dam pa 'di/ /bsod nams bgyis pa'i

khyad par ni/ /gzungs 'di bzlas pa'i mchod rten gyis/ /gcig btab bye ba btab dang 'dra/ /yun rings dus nas 'khor ba'i/ /mtshams med lnga dang sdig dpung rnams/ /ji snyed yod pa ma lus 'byang / /tshe ring phun

sum tshogs par 'gyur/ /tshe rabs gzhan du skye ba na/ /rigs mchog dam par skyes nas kyang / /longs spyod mchog dang rab ldan zhing / /'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por skye/ /tshe rabs snga phyi dran par 'gyur/ /dus gsum 'jig

rten thams cad du/ /dkon mchog gsum dang mi 'bral zhing / /bgegs dang gnod pas de mi bskyod/ /bsam pa yongs su 'grub par 'gyur/ /mthar ni mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs/ rdzogas+ho// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya pra tI t+ya sa mud pA da hr-i da ya bi d+hi d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i snying po'i cho ga'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams

cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos gang rgyus byung de dag ni/ /rgyu las 'gog pa gang yin pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal te/ /de skad gsungs pa dge sbyong che/ /tshig 'di sgrub pa'i cho ga ni/ /sems can
rnams la phan byed pa/ /las kun grub par byed pa'i phyir/ /de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu gsungs/ /rigs kyi bu dag gang gis ni/ /dang por bcom ldan sangs rgyas la/ /gus shing dad pa'i sems
bskyed nas/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /rten 'brel zab mo'i cho ga bshad/ /thams cad las dang 'thun par gsungs/ /dang por 'jug pa'i tshig gsungs pa/ /'di ltar las dang nyon mongs yod gyur
na/ /sems can rnams ni 'khor bar 'gro 'gyur la/ /las dang nyon mongs med na 'khor ba las kyang ldog /bden pa 'di yis bdag gis bsam pa 'grub gyur cig /sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bzhugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dgra bcom
pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /brtul zhugs grub pa rnams la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can gyi sman pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nor bu grub pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di lta ste/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ oM ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha bA he tun+te ShA~M ta thA ga to h+ya ba data/

te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e ba~M bA dI ma hA shra ma NaH swA hA/ las rnams kun gyi cho ga la/ /tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag brjod/ /bsam rgyud rang gi lag mthil la/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku/ /

skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gyis brgyan/ /dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus spras/ /me'i khams la zhugs par bsgom/ /de ni lha dag rjes su dran/ /da ni sbyor ba'i las bshad de/ /rim pa bzhin du so sor bstan/ /
rims kyis btab nas na ba dang / /klad pa na dang mig nad dang / /khong nad la sogs nad rnams la/ /tshigs bcad 'di dang snying po 'di/ /mang por bzlas shing langs nas ni/ /lag pa g.yas pa'i khu tshur
gyis/ /byung pa'i thabs su byab par bya'o/ /nad rnams thams cad sos par 'gyur/ /nyin cig nyin gnyis nyin gsum dang / /nyin bzhi brtag pa'i rims rnaMs la/ /bu mo gzhon nus bkal ba yi/ /skud pa dkar po

sum sgril la/ /bzlas brjod nyi shu brgyad bzlas nas/ /mgul du brtags na bde bar 'tsho/ /nad la phan pa'i sman rnams la/ /gzungs sngags 'di dag bzlas shing gtang / /snying nad rtsib logs na ba dang / /khong na nad rnaMs ci yod la/ /chu la sngags 'di mang bzlas
nas/ /blud na phan zhing bde bar 'gyur/ /nad la phan pa'i sman rnams la/ /bzlas shing btang na 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /g.yan pa dang ni 'brum bu dang / /phol mig dang ni rma red la/ /grog tshang sa la

snying po 'di/ /mang du bzlas shing btab na 'tsho/ /gzhang 'brum gzhang nad za khu dang / /pho mtshan skrangs zhing na ba la/ /skyer pa'i kha 'da'i ri lu 'am/ /byang chub sems dpa'i ri lu la/ /nyi shu bzlas shing bskus na phan/ /nad kyi rnam

pa gang na yang / /nad tshabs che chung tshod brtags nas/ /tshigs su bcad pa'i bzlas brjod la/ /mang nyung nad dang sbyar nas kyang / /lu la byab cing bzlas na phan/ /'khru bag nad kyis btab pa la/ /sman nam rilu kha zas la/ /

bdun nam nyi shu bzlas nas kyang / /khong du btang na phan par 'gyur/ /de la bzlas brjod snga ma ste/ /'di dag rab tu bzlas par bya/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ oM ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha bA he tun+te ShAn+ta thA ga to h+ya ba data/ te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha

e ba~M bA dI ma hA shra ma NaH swA hA/ de dag bzlas na nad rnams 'tsho/ /de ni nad rnams 'tsho ba'o/ /de nas yang ni bka' stsal pa/ /nas dang gro dang sran ma dang / /'bras dang sran chung mon sran dang / /shing tog dgun 'brum a ru ra/ /

de dag kun la za ba'i/ /srin bu sbur bu phye ma leb/ /bye'u dang byi ba ne tso dang / /lo tog za ba kha bcing na/ /zhing gi khyon dang sbyar nas kyang / /phye ma sa dang thal ba dang / /bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsa brgyad bzlas/ /zhing dang shing tog gtor

byas na/ /de dag kun kyang kha bcings 'gyur/ /ha cang char pa ches pa na/ /bcom ldan 'das la phul ba yi/ /me tog dman ma re re la/ /bzlas brjod nyi shu rtsa cig bya/ /gtsang zhing gde ba'i gnas dag tu/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus

dag tu/ /bum pa gang ba'i steng dag tu/ /kham phor gtsang ma'i nang du yang / /me tog gtsang ma bzlas pa de/ /bsregs na char pa 'chad par 'gyur/ /ser ba drag po 'ong ba na/ /se ba nya mig lcug ma la/ /bzlas brjod

brgya ni rtsa brgyad bzlas/ /ser ba gang nas g.yo ngos su/ /klad la bskor zhing byabs na chad/ /yang na thal chen yungs kar la/ /bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsa brgyad bya/ /thum po byas te lcug ma la/ /btags te brtsugs

na ser ba 'chad/ /'byung po sha za yi dag dang / /brjod byed gdon gyi zin pa la/ /dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ /bum pa gtsang ma lnga bzhag ste/ /gu gul dud pas bdug nas kyang / /yungs kar ga pur

tsan dan dang / /gla rtsi la sogs sman sbyar te/ /bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsa brgyad bzlas/ /gos dang zas ni dkar po sbyar/ /dkyil 'khor de'i nang du bzhug /bum pa'i chu yis bkru bar bya/ /sangs rgyas sku bsil byas pa'i chu/ /
bkru zhing blud na rab tu phan/ /nad dang gnod pa kun las thar/ /'byung po brjed byed sha za yis/ /glags kyang rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /byis pa gdon gyis 'jigs pa la/ /gi'u wang la ni sngags bzlas

ngas/ /snying po stobs chen 'di bris gdags/ /oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la/ ha na da ha/ pa tsa bi d+h+wa na sa ya/ dza ti la la~M b+ho d+ha ra/ u ts+tshuSh+ma kro d+ha hU~M phaT swA hA/ gtsang sbra byas te mgul par gdags/ /de bzhin yang kar
dag la yang / /bzlas brjod byas te gtums la gdags/ /mkha' 'gro'i gdon gyis zin pa na/ /yung kar dang ni gu gul la/ /sngags gnyis lan ni bdun bdun bzlas/ /dud pas bdugs na tsho

bar 'gyur/ /de la the rtsom mi za'o/ /byis pa gdon dang nad las thar/ /bud med bu ni thogs gyur na/ /chu la bzlas brjod lnga bdun byas/ /blud na legs par btsas par 'gyur/ /bud med mo sham bud med la/ /

sangs rgyas sku bsil byas pa'i chu/ /de la sngags brjod nyi shu bya/ /khrus byas lus ni gtsang ma la/ /chu de blud na bu tsha phan/ /rigs rgyud dag ni 'phel bar 'gyur/ /lam du zhugs te 'gro ba na/ /skud pa dang ni gos

kyi grwar/ /bzlas brjod bdun bzlas mdud pa bdun/ /mdud bcing bzlas te song ba na/ /bde bar 'gro zhing don yang 'grub/ /dgra dang nye zho med par 'gro/ /yid ni gzhungs par 'dod pa na/ /shu dag tshon gang

tsam pa dang / /mar srang sum brgya drug cu la/ /bzlas brjod byas te bsres nas kyang / /bum pa cig tu blug la dkrug /nyi ma re re lo gcig tu/ /shu dag gi ni dum re dang / /mar srang dag ni re re la/ /bzlas brjod re re bya zhing

bza'/ /des ni yid gzhungs blo ldan 'gyur/ /de bzhin pa ni ser skya ma'i/ /mar dang 'o ma dag la yang / /bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsa brgyad du/ /bzlas te 'o thug dkrug cing bza'/ /yid gzhungs pa'i mchog tu 'gyur/ /

mi dang 'grogs shing mdza' 'dod na/ /gang dag yid dang 'thad pa la/ /me tog dang ni rtswa shing la/ /'bras bu 'am ni 'ji ba dag /lag pa g.yas pa'i chang bar bcug /bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsa gcig gdab/ /gang gi lag

tu byin pa na/ /de dang rtag tu mdza' bar 'gyur/ /rta la sogs pa'i phyugs rnams kun/ /'chi bar nye bar gnas pa na/ /chu dang yungs kar bcas pa la/ /bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsa brgyad bya/ /de la gtor na sos par
'gyur/ /yang na yungs kar brgya brgyad la/ /bzlas pa'i thum po mgul du gdags/ /de ni nad med bde bar 'gyur/ /mi rnams 'chi bas 'jigs gyur na/ /yungs kar la ni bzlas brjod bya/ /thum po byas te

sgo la gdags/ /bzlas brjod brgya stong 'bum yang bzlas/ /mi nad dang ni phyug nad kun/ /ming yang med cing bde bar 'gyur/ /de dag kun gyis bzlas brjod ni/ /'di dag kun du rgya ched gsungs/ /na mo rat+na

tra yA ya/ oM ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha bA he tun+te ShAn+ta thA ga to h+ya ba data/ te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e ba~M bA dI ma hA shra ma naH swA hA/ rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na ni/ /bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ /gnod pa cis

kyang tshugs mi 'gyur/ /dam chos yongs su gzungs bar 'gyur/ /tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag ni/ /mthu dang rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab/ /cho ga 'di dag thams cad ni/ /gang la dad pas yid ches na/ /'grub par the tsom med

par 'gyur/ bzlas brjod 'bum ni byas gyur na/ /dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /'phags pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i snying po'i cho ga'i gzungs/ ston pa shAkya'i thugs rje 'di/ /dge slong ner ban rak+Shi tis/ /

tho gar yul nas rnyed pa ste/ /'gro ba kun gyi dpal du shar/ /rdzogs s+ho// // @/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya pra tI t+ya sa mud pA da nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zhes bya
ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das sum bcu rtsa gsum lha'i gnas na ar mo ni ga lta

bu'i rdo leb la/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la sogs pa nyan thos chen po rnams dang / 'phags pa byams pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po yon tan rin po che dpag tu med pas brgyan pa rnams dang / mi 'jed gyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po dang / srid med kyi bu dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha rnams dang / lha'i dbang po brgya

byin dang / dri za'i rgyal po zur phud lnga pa la sogs pa dang / thabs gcig tu gzhugs te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa cig
tu bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga ri rab kyi rtse mo la btsug te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
'das lha 'di dag ni mchod rten bgyid par 'tshal ba sha stag ste/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir mchis na/ ci nas tshangs pa'i bsod nams 'phel ba dang / lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa

dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu las dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag bsod nams shin du mang tu 'phel bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar bcom

ldan 'das kyis de dag la chos bstan du gsol zhes zhus pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pa bka' stsal pa/ ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha bA he tun te ShA~M ta thA ga to h+ya ba data/

te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e ba~M bA dI ma hA shra ma NaH chos gang rgyus 'byung de dag gi/ /rgyu dang de 'gog gang yin pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal te/ /dge sbyong chen po de skad gsungs/ /spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug 'di lta ste/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi sku yin te/ sus rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mthong ba des de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo / /
spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can gang la la zhig gis mi gnas pa'i sa phyogs su mchod rten ni skyu ru ra'i 'bru tsam/ srog shing ni mo khab tsam/ gdugs

ni bak+ku la'i me tog tsam zhig byas la/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba chos kyi dbyings kyi tshigs su bcad pa nang du bcug na/ des tshangs pa'i bsod nams bskyed par 'gyur te/ 'di nas shi 'phos shing 'chi

ba'i dus byas nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ nyan thos de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang /
mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo

rdzogs so// //@/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya pra tI t+ya sa mut+pA da hr-i da ya nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i snying po zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

chos gang rgyus 'byung de dag gi/ /rgyu dang de 'gog gang yin pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal te/ /dge sbyong chen po 'di skad gsungs/ /ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha bA he tun te ShAn+ta thA ga to h+ya ba data/ te ShAny+tsa yo

ni ro d+ha e ba~M bA dI ma hA shra ma NaH snying po 'di lan gcig brjod pas sdig pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/ /mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad zhi zhing bzlog par 'gyur ro/ /dngos po gang la dmigs te brjod na
sangs rgyas kyi sku'am/ mchod rten du byas par 'gyur mchod pa gang la dmigs te/ brjod na 'jig rten gyi khams gang ba tsam phul bar 'gyur ro/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i snying po rdzogs so//

dkon chog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM sma ra sma ra/ bi sma na ska ra ma hA dza ba hU~M zhes brjod cing rin po che brdar bas rin po che'i gdugs dang rgyal mtshan la sogs pa'i char dpag tu med pa nam mkha'i
khams gang bar bsam la dbul lo/ /rin po che brdar ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// // bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha d+hi nA~M/ a pra ti ha na shA sa na nA~M/

\u0f00 kha kha khA hi khA hi/ hU~M hU~M/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ pra dz+wa la pra dz+wa la/ tiSh+Ta tiSh+Ta/ phaT phaT/ sarba dur ni mit+te/ duHswap+na shI n+ta~M ku ru swA hA/ sangs rgyas stong gi sngags 'di ni/ /gtsug tor 'bar ba zhes grags te/ /las rnams
gang dag stong phrag ni/ /brgyad bcu dang ni dgu phrag lnga/ /rnam pa sna tshogs las rnams dang / /bkra shis dpal grags thams cad byed/ /rmi lam ngan dang mtshan ma ngan/ /lan cig bzlas pas
sel byar byed/ gtsug tor 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas

sman gyi bla bai d+'u r+ya 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ oM b+he Sha dz+ye b+he Sha dz+ye/ ma hA b+he Sha dz+ye/ b+he Sha dz+ye sa mung+ga te swA hA/ sman gtong ba'i tshe sman la sngags kyis gdab pa/ rdzogs s+ho// // @/ bcom ldan 'das de

bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /na mo b+ha ga ba te rat+na ke tu rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar ha te sa myag sa~M bu d+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/

oM t+ner t+ne ma ha rat+ne rat+ne bi dza ye swA hA/ 'di brjod cing bskor ba gcig byas pa yang dpag tu med pa byas par 'gyur ro/ bskor ba'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// // @/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya pra dak+ShA rad na tra yA nA ma d+hA ra
NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dkon mchog gi rten la bskor ba bya ba'i gzungs/ zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag

'tshal lo/ /oM na mo da sha dig tri ka la sarba rat+na tra yA ya/ na maH pra dak+ShA su pra dak+ShA/ sarba pa pA pa bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/ gzungs 'di lan cig brjod pas phyogs bcu dus sum gyi dkon mchog
gsum la phyag 'tshal zhing / /bskor ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /thog ma med pa nas bsags pa'i sdig pa thams cad dag par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi byang chub myur du thob par 'gyur ro/ /

dgra dang bgegs kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /nad dang gdon thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /bskor ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// // @/ /rgya gar skad du/ dak+Shi NI pa ri sho d+ha nI nA ma/ bod skad du/
yon yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun nas 'od

kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa blo gros dang ldan pa'i 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /na maHsa man+ta pra b+ha rA

dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ a ra ha te b+h+yaH/ saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/ na mo many+dzu shri ye/ ku mA ra b+hU tA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ni rA la/ ni rA b+hA se/ dza ye
dza ya la/ ma hA mA te dak+She dik+ShA NI me pa ri sho d+hA ya swA hA/ 'di lan cig brjod pas sdig pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/ /yon mang po la spyad pa yang byang bar 'gyur ro/ /yon bdag de
'i yon yongs su 'phel bar 'gyur zhing tshogs thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /'di brjod pas bar du gcod pa thams cad kyang mi 'byung ngo / /'dul ba lung las rnam par nges pa'i
mdo las byung ba yon yongs su sbyong ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// // de nas yon yongs su sbyong ba'i gzungs/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ su me ru kal pa rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar ha te/
sa myag sa~M bud+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM kal pe kal pe/ ma hA kal pe kal pe pa ri sho d+ha ni swA hA/ gzungs 'di lan cig bzlas pas ri rab tsam gyi yon yongs su sbyong bar byed par gsungs pas/ lan
lnga'am drug tsam bzlas so/ /yon yongs su sbyong ba'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan

ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ smr-i ti ma ti ma ti/ te dz+wo bid+yA/ hu ru me hu ra hu ru me kr-iSh+Na hu ru me swA hA/ shu dag nag po la sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod
byas te zos na gdon mi za bar thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /thos pa 'dzin pa'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra

bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ ma ti ba hu l+ye/ ta thA ga tA dz+nyA na/ dar she ne pradz+nyA pata/ gam+b+hi re/ bo d+hi maN+Da nu sa ri Ni/ a bid+d+ha/

ta mon+d+ha/ kA ra bi d+ha ma ni/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ pradz+nyA dI pi/ me d+ha pa di ni sarba a d+hiSh+Thi ta/ su ru su ru/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ me d+ha a na ya swA hA/ cho ga ni nang par zhing bzlas brjod byas na lobs skyen par 'gyur
ro/ /sman bram hi snyims par bcug ste dud pa byung gi bar du bzlas pa byas te zos na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /thos pa 'dzin pa'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// // @/ /rgya gar skad du/
pradz+nya bar d+ha ni nA ma d+hA rA nI/ bod skad du/ shes rab bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gi thos pa dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das byang

chub sems dpa' blo ldan zhes bya ba ri rab kyi ngos la bzhugs te/ ri rab la gnas pa'i lha'i bu thams cad kyi bskor nas mdun du byas te chos ston to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhon nu'i
gzugs can gyis thal mo sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan la sogs pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can shes rab rtul po/ blo zhan pa/ yid mi gzhungs pa rnams kyi slad du shes rab bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i

gzungs bshad du gsol/ bshad pa/ hU~M pi tsu pi tsu/ pradz+nyA bar d+ha ni dz+wa la dz+wa la/ me d+ha bar d+ha ni/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ bud+d+hi bar d+ha ni swA hA/ gang zhig gzungs 'di 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa dang /

chung ngu ni yi ge 'bru gcig tsam thos na yang de'i tshe 'di nyid la shes rab chen po 'gyur ro/ /gang gi zla ba drug gi bar du nyin re zhing rtsabs khyor gang la rig pa 'di lan bdun btab te nyi ma shar ba'i tshe 'thung na tshigs su

bcad pa stong stong 'dzin to/ /lan cig 'thung na lnga brgya 'dzin te nyin cig bzhin shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur nyin cig bzhin du rjod pa tsam gyis dran pa dang yid bzhungs par 'gyuro/ /shes rab bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogas+ho// //

rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang / lo ts+tsha ba ban de klu'i dbang pos bsgyur/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+ya ka ra siM ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de de ba tsan dras zhus te gtan la phab pa/ /
@/ /rgya gar skad du/ pradz+nyA bar d+ha ni nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ shes rab skyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ na mo rad na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/

bo d+hi swA ta ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tad+ya thA/ s+kha la te s+kha la te ma ni te swA hA/ rig sngags 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te khyor chu la lan gsum bzlas te/ 'thung na zhag bdun nas thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab bskyed pa zhes bya

ba'i gzuMs/ rdzogas+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na garba dang / lo ts+tsha ba ban de klu'i dbang pos bsgyur/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra siM ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de dA+e ba tsan dras zhus te/ gtan la phab pa/ /

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ pradz+nyA ba ra d+ha ni nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ shes rab skyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA ka ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/

a bi ba bi ba/ pradz+nyA bar d+ha ni/ dza ra dza ra/ mi d+hA bar d+ha ni/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ bud d+hi bar d+ha ni swA hA/ rig sngags 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ nang re zhing rtsab mo khyor gang la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ zla ba gcig gi bar du

'thungs na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab skyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang / lo ts+tsha ba ban de klu'i dbang pos bsgyur/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra si~M ha dang / zhu chen

gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de dA+e ba tsan dras zhus te gtan la phab pa/ / @/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug

la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ a ba lo ki ni/ ba li ki ni/ pra b+ha lo ki ni/ dzi ba ha pa ri sho d+ha ni/ d+hi da ni ya ga me/ a sha pa ri sho d+ha ni/ sarba sa twA ma no ra the/ ka ya sid d+he shru ti d+hA ra NI smri ti d+hA ra NI swA hA/ cho ga zhag bdun gyi

bar du shing a ba ma rga'i so shing la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te nang re zhing zos na nyin cig la shu lo ka brgya brgya lobs so/ /zla ba drug gi bar du byas na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /shu lo ka brgya lobs pa/ rdzogs s+ho// //

dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ kha li kha li ba li te swA hA/
gdong 'khru ba'i tshe chu khyor gang la sngags 'di bdun bzlas te 'thungs na nyin gcig kyang yi ge shu lo ka brgya lobs par 'gyur te/ sngon lobs pa rnams kyang brjed par mi 'gyur ro/ /shu lo ka brgya
lobs pa/ rdzogs s+ho// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bI re

bA+e re/ ma hi te dze/ te dza ma ti d+hA ra NI/ shru ta d+hA ra NI/ dza yan ti bi dza yan ti ma ti d+hA ra NI swA hA/ /sman bram hi zho gnyis zhib tu btags te/ 'o ma'i nang du bskol la sngags 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ zhag
bdun gyi bar du 'thungs na gdon mi za bar thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa 'am/ bstan bcos kyang rung ste/ thos na nyin zhag gcig la shu lo ka stong lobs par 'gyur ro/ /

shu lo ka stong lobs pa'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// // @/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/

tri shA tri shu la shA khi/ Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ adz+nyA pa ya ti/ ba re na bu ha la/ mrid d+hA tu swA hA/ cho ga ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du dkyil 'khor byas te/ ci 'byor pas mchod pa byas la chu

la sngags kyis btab ste bzhag nas/ nang par chu la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te dro khar kha zas 'o ma dang spags te zos na zhag bdun lon na nyin gcig kyang shu lo ka stong lobs par 'gyur ro/ /yid ches
pa'i rtags yod do/ /shu lo ka stong lobs pa'i/ gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas kun nas thogs med ston la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ ka ba tsa karna la la te swA hA/ chu la lan bdun bzlas te gdong
bkrus na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i cho ga la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar chu bzhag la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te 'thungs la/ dro khar kha zas 'o ma dang
spags te bza' ba de lta bur zhag bdun gyi bar du byas na nyin gcig kyang yi ge shu lo ka stong lobs par 'gyur ro/ /shu lo ka stong lobs pa'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// //

dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ \u0f00 mu ni kan te mu ni pra b+ha

swA re swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar dkyil 'khor byas te/ shu dag mthe bong tsam blangs la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas zos na thog ma'i nyin mo
yi ge shu lo ka stong klags pa tsam gyis lobs par 'gyur ro/ /zhag gsum lon pa'i nyin mo shu lo ka sum stong lobs par 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun lon pa'i nyin mo thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /
shu lo ka sum stong lobs pa'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras

gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ smri ti ma ti ma ti/ te dz+wa bid+yA hu ru me ha ra hu du kr-iSh+Na hu ru me swA hA/ shu dag dkar po la sngags 'di bzlas brjod byas te zos na gdon mi za bar thos pa
'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /mi brjed pa'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi rten la sngags 'di lan re brjod cing brkyang phyag re byas te/
phyag gsum byas na sde snod gsum thos pa dang / bsams pa dang / bsgoms pa'i bsod nams dang mnyam par 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma re re phyag gsum gsum byas na tshe 'di nyid la mthong ba'i lam gyi ye shes

kyi ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/ /de ma thob kyi bar du mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / 'byung po dang / nad rims kyi gnod pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /oM na mo many+dzu shrI ye/ na maHsu shri ye/ na maH ut+ta ma shri ye
swA hA/ /phyag bya ba'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /i ri mi ri/ d+ha da~M me/

b+ha hu pha la~M b+ha ba tu swA hA/ gos phrugs gcig la lan stong bzlas brjod byas te/ mi ya rabs sam/ slob dpon nam/ gzhan gang yang rung ba gcig la byin na/ zla ba phyed phan chad kyis gos phrugs brgya thob par 'gyuro/ /
de bzhin du nor zas sam/ rkang 'gros gang yang rung ba rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o/ /gos brgya thob pa'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
oM na maHsha pa ra na ma swA hA/ so rtsi la sngags 'dis btab ste/ khar bcug na gang la bltas pa de dag dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /mi dga' bar byed pa'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// //
dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma'i spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ oM ta ra ta ra/ ti ri ti ri/ tu ru tu ru/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/

b+hi ri b+hi ri/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ b+ha ya b+ha ya/ ku ru ku ru/ sarba karmA a bar Na dza ni me sha pra b+ha ya swA hA/ dz+wa la ni bi d+ha ni bi swA hA/ ku ru pa~M tsa li swA hA/ sA ga ra sa~M bi ro swA hA/ sarba ta thA ga tA a d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA/ gzungs

'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ nang par lang nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig lon pa'i tshe las kyi sgrib pa thaMd zad par 'gyur ro/ /spyan lnga yang rnam par dag par 'gyuro/ /de la mig nad

'byung bar mi 'gyuro/ /lus la nad 'byung bar mi 'gyuro/ /yid kyi nyes pa 'byung bar mi 'gyuro/ /spyan lnga yang rnam par dag par 'gyuro/ /de bzhin du yid rnam par dag pa lnga yang thob par 'gyuro/ /tshe rabs thaMd du sang+yas

'byung ba dang phrad par 'gyuro/ /byang chub kyi snying po la gnas kyi bar du sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / chos thos pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / seMs can thaMd yongasu smin par byed pa dang 'bral bar
mi 'gyuro/ /lus mdzes par 'gyuro/ /sems dang bar 'gyuro/ /'phags pa pad ma'i spyan zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// // @#/ / bcom ldan 'das ngan song thaMd yongasu sel ba'i

de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ oM sho d+ha ni/ bi sho d+ha ne ma ma sarba pA pa~M bi sho d+ha ne/ shud+d+he bi shud+d+he/ sarba karma A ba ra Na bi shud+he swA hA/
rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis gzungs 'di'i yi ge 'am/ tshig gam/ ming ngam/ thaMd chub par 'dzin na mi de bskal ba 'bum phrag bcu bzhir tshe rabs dran par 'gyuro/ /las kyi sgrib pa

thaMd kyang 'byang la myur du phyir mi ldog pa nyid kyang thob par 'gyur/ byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du bsod nams zad par mi 'gyuro/ /ngan song thaMd yongasu sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// //

dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo/ /oM mo kha mu khi/ twi mu khi/ tri mu khi/ ma hA sra mu khi/ ta thA ga tA mu kha s+t+wi ha na/ ts+tshin+d+ha ts+tshin+d+ha/ b+hin+d+ha b+hin+d+ha/ swa thA nA~M gats+tsha slA he swA hA/ mad se dang / pa rta ka dang / ga gon
ring po la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa byas te gshegs na mtsher pa'i skran zhi bar 'gyuro/ /the tshom med do/ /skran zhi ba'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo/ /
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bsreg gsol 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo/ /tad+ya thA/ hu re hu re/ hu Ta ga ta ni swA hA/ cho ga ni
lag pa la bzlas brjod byas nas lto mnyes na ma zhu ba'i nad 'byang bar 'gyuro/ /ma zhu ba'i nad 'byang ba'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo/ /bcom ldan 'das
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu gzigs la phyag 'tshalo/ /tad+ya thA/ dI ri d+hiSh+Ta/ ta skar bad d+ho si/ ma tsa la ma tsa la swA hA/ lan bdun brjod
de/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal la gsol ba btab na mi thaMd byams par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa sdang ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag

'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM ku mA ra r+'u pa d+ha ri Ni bi shwa sa~M b+ha A ga ts+tsha A gats+tsha/ la g+hu la g+hu/ b+h+rU~M b+h+rU~M/

hU~M hU~M/ dzi na dzi ka many+dzu shrI ye/ ta ra ya mA~M/ sarba duH khe b+h+yaHphaT phaT/ sa ma ya sa ma ya/ a mri tod b+ha bod b+ha ba/ pA pa~M me nA shA yi swA hA/ sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i
gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo/ /oM ba ka ba tse/ dza~M b+ha ni/ sta~M b+ha ni/ mo ha ni/ sarba ro sha pra sha ma ni swA hA/ shar phyogasu bltas te 'dug la/

sngags 'di brjod cing rang gi lag pas lan bdun gdong la byugs nas tshogs kyi nang du song na khros pa dga' bar 'gyuro/ /khro ba zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// // 'phags pa khro ba zhi bar byed

pa'i gzungs/ dpal chen mo la phyag 'tshalo/ /ka te bi ka te/ ro sha pra sha ma ni swA hA/ gang khros pa'i mdun du brjod na/ de'i khros pa zhi nas nges par 'ong ngo / /khros pa zhi ba'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// //

dkon mchog gsuM la phyag 'tshal lo/ /na mo b+ha ga ba te/ uSh+NI Sha ya d+ha re/ /ran+te swA hA/ ma bsgrubs kyang las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te/ gi'u wang la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas dpral bar

thig le byas na gang bltas pa de dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /mig rtsi la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags te mig la bskus na gang dang phrad par bya ba de dga' bar 'gyuro/ /chu khyor gang la lan bdun bzlas te 'thungs na
ma bslangs par zas rnyed par 'gyuro/ /tshogs pa'i nang du 'gro na bdag gi gos kyi mtha' ma nas lag pa g.yon pas bzung la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas nas tshogs pa'i nang du song na tshigs
btsan par 'gyur ro/ /tshig btsan pa'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ oM a le kA li a le kA li mud tsi te swA hA/ kha nyi ma la
bltas te/ chu la sngags 'di lan bdun btab ste/ phyogs bcur gtor na bdag bsrung bar 'gyuro/ /bdag bsrung ba'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// // 'phags pa yid du 'ong ba zhes
bya ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phyag 'tshal lo/ /na mo b+ha ga ba te/ /uSh+NI Sha ya/ d+hA re da ra Na ti ye swA hA/ ma bsgrubs kyang bklag pas 'grub ste/ gi'u wang la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
te dpral bar thig le byas na kun gyi yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /ti tsa la sngags te mig la bskus na/ gang bltas pa mig sprad pa 'thun no/ /chu la sngags te mthung na gzhan rnams zas ster snying 'dod

do/ /yid du 'ong ba'i bzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM b+ha ga ba ti shru ti smri ti/ ba la ba pa ra ma sid+he swA hA/ cho ga ni zhag bdun gyi bar du nang re zhing 'phags
pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar chu khyor gang la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste mthung na/ nyin gcig kyang yi ge shu lo ka sum brgya lobs so/ /zla ba gcig gi bar du byas na mi 'am ci
dang 'dra bar mgrin snyan par 'gyur te the tshom za bar mi bya'o/ /mgrin pa snyan pa'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gash+yes

pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshes grangs dang / rgyu skar dang / yud tsam gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ na k+Sha tre/ sarba ti thI mUr te/ sarba ta thA mUr ta/

na sha tra ni/ mi sa mi ta d+ha ni/ b+ha ban+tu swA hA/ de'i cho ga ni phyogs gang du 'gro 'dod kyang rung ste/ des lan bdun brjod nas song na don thams cad 'grub par 'gyuro/ /don thaMd 'grub pa'i gzungs/
rdzogs s+ho// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /na mo ha ri d+hi ye ha ri d+hi ku ma

ri/ gau ri/ gan d+hA ri/ tsan+Da li/ ma taM gi/ ka li ki li/ che ge mo zhig gi mo he hi/ khar khar/ pa tsa pa tsa/ a ba d+ha ya/ mu ra tsA ya/ che ge mo zhig gi me sha ma nA ya swA hA/ oM bur bu bA/ dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa li ma nA ni/ de bi sarba saM ka

ra ka ri Ni dza/ ta le ta le/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ swA hA/ 'di'i cho ga ni bklags pa tsam gyis ma bsgrubs par las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te/ klad nad dang / rims ldang du ba can dang / ro langs dang / gdon rnams pham par

'gyur ro/ /dran pa rtsam gyis de dag thams cad kyis btang bar 'gyur ro/ /bkres na grong du song ste lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te gdong la byugs na zas rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /lce la bzlas brjod byas na shags
'gyed pa'i tshe lan thebs par 'gyur ro/ /lo ma 'am/ me tog gam/ 'bras bu la bsngags nas su la byin pa de dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /las grub pa'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// // dug zhi bar

byed pa zhes bya ba/ bdud brtsi sman gyi lha mo nor gyi rgyun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ oM su ru su ru ka /ba ra ba ra ke/ bi ri hi ri/ shud+he bi shud+he swA hA/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bden
pa dang / gzi brjid kyis klu'i dug dang / sbrul gyi dug dang / sbyar ba'i dug dang / kha rlangs kyi dug dang / rtsa ba'i dug dang / gcan zan mche ba'i dug bcom mo/ /dug nges par bcom mo/ /

zhes brjod par bya'o/ /dug thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ta re ta re ta rA ya/ b+ha ga ba te/ ban+d+ha mo tsa ni swA hA/
'phags pa'i sngags de bzlas brjod byas na bcings pa las grol bar byed do/ /bcing pa las grol ba'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// // @/ /'phags pa bdud thams cad skrag par byed pa zhes bya ba/

bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma Ni sha ta dIb+ti/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ d+harma d+hA du gar+b+he/ ma Ni ma Ni ma hA ma Ni/ hr-i da ya ma Ni swA hA/ sngags 'di brjod pas dkar po'i phyogs
kyi lha rnams dga' zhing bsrung ngo / /nag po'i bdud thams cad dngang zhing brgyal po/ /dregs pa ma rungs pa rnams skrag pa dang brgyal lo/ /bdud skrag par byed pa'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// //
rma 'byor bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs sngags/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM ubs ubs/ sum sum/ sarba nan rbad swA hA/ hU~M phaT/ sha ma shAn+ti
ku ru swA hA/ lan gsum brjod de rma la mchil ma byugs na rdos phog pa dang / mtshon brgyab pa dang / rtsa chad pa dang / klad pa chad pa rnams sos par byed do/ /rma 'byor bar byed pa'i gzungs
